neighborhood_overview: I LOVE my neighborhood; the park accessibility, the convenience of public transportation, my neighbors, the great places to eat and hear live music just around the corner, the quietness of my apartment and how I can connect to bike trails from here!
host_about:
Being a world traveler myself and having lived abroad many years, I know what is important to provide my guests to make them feel comfortable and at home. Before joining  AirBnB, I had many house-guests through personal referrals who have enjoyed staying here. 

I am a former classroom teacher and now offer guided bike tours and facilitate activities and games at children's functions. I am trilingual (English/Spanish/Italian...and a sprinkle of Hindi). I have always biked in every city I've ever lived in and LOVE biking in NYC and sharing that with my guests!

I would like all my guests to enjoy their time here and respectfully ask that you treat me and my home with respect and consideration. I will do the same.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Habiendo viajado por todo el mundo y habiendo vivido en el extranjero durante muchos años, sé lo que es importante para mis huéspedes para que se sientan cómodos y a gusto como si estuvieran en casa. Antes de formar parte de AirBnB, he tenido muchos huéspedes a partir de contactos  a través de amigos y todos han estado muy bien en mi apartamento. He sido maestra y ahora me dedico a entrenar y tengo una empresa de servicios educativos. Soy trilingue (Inglés, Español, Italiano y hablo un poco de Hindi).
 Me gustaría que mis huéspedes disfrutaran de su viaje y pido que me traten tanto a mi como a mi apartamento con respeto. Yo haré lo mismo con vosotros.

name: Aluguel de Lancha no Rio de Janeiro
description:
Iate Intermarine 440 Full Gold c/ Fly p/ até 12 pessoas, c/ ar condicionado, 1 suíte master, 1/4, dois banheiros, salão c/ mesa centro, poltronas, TV, Wi-fi, som blouthouf, cozinha completa c/ freezer, geladeira, micro-ondas, fogão, e cafeteira, ampla proa, popa c/ mesa e assentos, fly amplo c/ assentos, equip. básicos p/ mergulho, jogos, churrasqueira à carvão e elétrica. períodos horas c/ 2 tripulantes, combustível incluído, e cooler p/bebidas. Caso ocupado, disponibilizamos outra embarcação!

The space
Os visitantes poderão desfrutar durante 6 horas de bons mergulhos nas limpas águas das ilhas Cagarras, ou degustar sa delícias dos pratos de restaurantes na Praia de Itaipú servidos no barco, ou apreciar os pontos turísticos na baía de Guanabara, Cristo Redentor, bonzinho, e Praia Vermelha.
Poderá optar também pelo completo de churrasco levando apenas a carne!

name: Mar da Barra - Conforto, Sol e Praia!
host_about:
Olá! Bem vindos!

Somos a Yes Temporada, Anfitriões Profissionais desde 2008!

Imagina que você pode se hospedar com Qualidade de Hotel e Preço de Temporada? Privacidade, Higiene e Qualidade associadas ao Preço. É o melhor dos mundos!

Todos os nossos apartamentos são destinados a hospedar viajantes e gerenciados de Segunda a Sábado por uma equipe que trabalha com muito carinho para garantir a melhor experiência aos hóspedes!

Pensamos que os espaços devem ser exclusivos, confortáveis e equipados, com tudo a seu serviço! Queremos que cada hóspede seja um amigo que possa contar conosco para tudo que precisar na cidade e se sinta em casa! Nada como contar suporte ou ajuda quando se está fora de casa, né?

Se você é uma empresa e precisa de nota fiscal ou fatura, podemos emitir!

Somos um orgulhoso membro do BNI, no Rio de Janeiro. Se você é do BNI também, nos avise e teremos um prazer enorme me lhe presentear! Se puder, visite nossa reunião na terça feira? Se precisar ajuda com a cidade, não hesite em pedir!
 
Entre e experimente o Rio de perto!

***

Hello! Welcome!

We are Yes Temporada, Professional Hosts since 2008!

Imagine you can try Hotel Quality in a Holiday Apartment? Privacy, Cleaning and Quality associated with Price. It's the best of all worlds!

All of our apartments are designed to host travelers and managed from Monday to Saturday by a team that works with great care to ensure the best experience for guests!

We believe that spaces shall be exclusive, comfortable and equipped, with everything at your service! We want each guest to be a friend who can count on us for everything in the city and feel home! Nothing like counting support or help when you're away from home, right?

If you´re a company and need a ticket or invoice, please let us know, we can print it for you, ok?

We are a Proud BNI member at Rio de Janeiro. If you are a BNI Member also, let us know and we will grant you with a gift! Can you visit our meeting on Tuesday? We will be delighted to serve during your stay and help with the city!
 
Get in and experience Rio up close!

***

¡Hola! ¡ Bienvenido!

¡Somos Yes Temporada, Anfitriónes Profissionales desde 2008!

¿Imagina que puede alojarse en un apartamento de vacaciones, pero tiene la certeza de un estándar de hotel? Privacidad, Aseo y Calidad asociadas con el precio. ¡Es el mejor de todos los mundos!

Todos nuestros apartamentos son propiedades diseñadas para recibir viajeros y administradas de lunes a sábado por un equipo que trabaja con gran cuidado para garantizar la mejor experiencia para los huéspedes.

¡Creemos que los espacios deben ser exclusivos, cómodos y equipados, con todo a su servicio! ¡Queremos que cada huésped sea un amigo que pueda contar con nosotros para todo lo que necesita en la ciudad y sentirse como en casa! Nada como contar apoyo o ayuda cuando estás lejos de casa, ¿verdad?

Si eres una empresa y necesita factura, hablanos y teremos placer en emitir!

Somos un miembro orgulloso del BNI en Río de Janeiro. Si usted también es un miembro BNI, háganos saber y tenemos um regallo para usted! Visite nuestra reunión el martes. ¡Estaremos encantados de visitarlo durante su estadía y ayudarlo con la ciudad!
 
¡Entra y experimenta Río de cerca!

name: Quarto ilha do fundão
description:
Meu espaço é próximo da UFRJ, ilha do fundão. Aqui você estará perto do aeroporto, tem atividades para família, pequenos comércios, praça de alimentação, parque infantil, bares, a praia de Copacabana fica cerca de 30 minutos de carro e há transporte gratuito dentro do campus.
Você vai amar meu espaço! Ambiente familiar, bem ao estilo mineiro de ser.
Segurança, bem-estar e encantos em uma charmosa ilha carioca!
Ideal para quem vem estudar na UFRJ ou passear.
Te esperamos nessa agradável visita!

The space
Quarto com cama de solteiro, colchão, guarda roupa e mesa de cabeceira.

Guest access
Acesso a todos os cômodos da casa.

Other things to note
Habitam 2 adultos, 1 criança de 9 anos e 1 cachorro porte pequeno.
neighborhood_overview: Bairro tranquilo, familiar e petfriend, com parquinho, igrejas, bares, restaurantes e pequenos comércios.
host_about: Sou universitária, falo fluente dois idiomas (Português/Francês), mas também arrisco no Espanhol e Libras, sou bem humorada, simpática e amigavel. Adoro conhecer novas pessoas e fazer duradouras amizades. Meus hobbies são: ler, estudar, sair com os amigos. Me considero uma  pessoa sonhadora e bem intencionada, acho que o mundo inteiro é um bom lugar para se recomeçar!
host_neighbourhood: Cidade Universitária da Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

name: Porto Real Resort cobertura espetacular
description:
Cobertura moderna, toda revitalizada, impecável, com vista para mar frontal dos 3 quartos e 2 salas, ambientes climatizados com cozinha equipada com utensílios completos, espaço gourmet multiuso, inclusive com churrasqueira na parte superior com toldo retrátil. A sala inferior possui TV de 60'' modelo 4K interligada a internet, quartos e sala superior com TV à cabo.
Condomínio com estrutura completa, possuindo 2 praias, piscina oceânica, quadras esportivas, saunas, várias piscinas, ofurôs.

The space
Período de Ano Novo, Carnaval, alta temporada e Feriados os preços são diferenciados, favor consultar.

Guest access
irrestrito o acesso e caso interesse tenho embarcação 31 pés, nova, para locação com marinheiro e combustível para passeios a combinar.

Other things to note
Passeio de lancha para os hóspedes, termos e preços a parte devem ser discutidos com o anfitrião. Passeio saindo da Marina Porto Real Resor
neighborhood_overview: temos praia particular, segurança 24 hs, facil acesso por terra ou mar, já que temos marina dentro do condomínio bem como áreas de lazer com piscinas, saunas, salas de jogos ou seja, entretenimento garantido. Gastronomia variadas em restaurantes dentro e fora do resort. Estamos a 20 KM de Angra dos Reis no Centro e ainda 15 Km do Centro de Mangaratiba.

description:
Bem vindos: não fazemos EVENTOS!

Please do not make reservations before send me message to confirme AVAILABILITY.

O boutique home localizado na ponta do Joá em uma villa cinematográfica com vista única e exclusiva para as ilhas e 360 graus de mar, praia, montanha. Temos diversos serviços dentro de pacotes de hospedagem ou mini receptivos até 20 paz.
NAO FAZEMOS EVENTO/festa!
hotspot queridinho das celebs, marcas famosas e quem curte natureza com modernidade e serviço impecável. 🔑🍀

neighborhood_overview: Joatinga
host_about:
Welcome to my listing! Please text me BEFORE BOOK to check the status and availability.

My name is Janara Morenna. I’m doing Airbnb as pioneer since the beginning in Brazil, 2011. Superhost consecutive times as result of the pleasure to receive people, offer the best experiencies and tips as a local “Carioca”. 

You can also find my business searching for  “Hosting Rio”  .
Is also easy to find at insta  @hostingrio or @dra.Janara to follow my tips and recommendations (restaurantes, bars etc.)

I’m designer/marketer, living in Leblon, also researcher doctorate with my PhD’s in “beach culture of Rio”. For me is a pleasure mix the reception with my knowledge of culture. 

Services plus VIP GUEST:
I like to be a host in a very artisanal way, to receive the guest “face by face”, to show the house, I also give my personal number and connect with my partners for personal chef, fashion services, vip personal concierge, helicopter trips, boat services, beauty saloons etc.  

For me, quality comes before quantity, I like to have only what I can manage with a quick response and taking care about my guests. 

Best wishes 
Janara Morenna.:

name: Apartamento Frente praia no melhor ponto do Leblon
description:
Amplo apartamento com exuberante vista para o mar. Basta atravessar a rua para usufruir do que a praia do leblon tem de melhor. Otima localização, apenas há alguns metros de bares, restaurantes, farmácias, supermercados, etc. O apartamento também é próximo do metrô, fica há uns 10 minutos de caminhada. Temos WiFi de 120 Mbps. Para quem desejar, temos uma mesa com Internet cabeada em uma das salas, que pode ser utilizada de escritorio. Basta plugar seu notebook no cabo para conectar

The space

neighborhood_overview:
A Gamboa é hoje considerada uma região rica em história e Cultura, evidências da herança africana. Em franca ascensão, fruto também da aposta de vários comerciantes que lá se estabeleceram nos últimos anos e mais recentemente o Poder Público com investimentos, a Zona Portuária tem projetos que visam ao seu crescimento e expansão. A retomada da parte turística do Porto do Rio de Janeiro tem gerado grande movimento e atraído investimentos para o local, com a chegada de transatlânticos que aportam no bairro, trazendo milhares de turistas de todo o mundo anualmente. Além disso, a reurbanização da Gamboa vem causando um efervescer cultural, com a abertura de galerias de arte e a realização de eventos sociais e culturais na Zona Portuária.

A Gamboa é esta localizado no coração do Rio de Janeiro, com muitas opções de lazer, pois é próximo ao Cais do Valongo, do Museu de Arte do Rio(MAR), Museu do Amanhã, Galeria Providência, Boulevard Olímpico, Painel do Kobra entre outras.

O quarto Leblon da Mansão Lissandron é um dos 4 quartos com a mais bela vista para o mar. O quarto é extremamente aconchegante, claro, ventilado, e tem colchões de primeira linha além do ar condicionado. Com apenas um 3 lances de escadas o quando tem banheiro privativo sento assim uma linda suíte. Aceita cama adicional ou reservas de mais quartos na mansão.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
Urca é um bairro nobre e descolado, localizado no meio da Zona Sul da Cidade, próximo de Copacabana, Botafogo, Flamengo e do Centro da Cidade, com fácil acesso à vários tipos de transportes públicos, tais como ônibus, metrô e táxi.
O bairro possui linha de ônibus integrada ao metrô (Botafogo é a estação mais próxima) e linha de ônibus direta ao centro da Cidade.
Estamos localizados próximos a farmácias, supermercados, agências bancárias, restaurantes e bistrôs, fica a 100 metros de uma ótima padaria que oferece Brunch, restaurantes e farmácia em frente à guarita da Polícia.

Estamos próximos dos principais pontos turísticos do Rio de Janeiro, como a Praia Vermelha, o Forte, Pão de Açúcar, Instituto Europeu de Design que possui um ótimo Bistrô, ficamos a 300 metros da estação do Bondinho do Pão de Açúcar.

Estamos ao lado da Praia Vermelha, onde está localizada a estação de embarque do Bondinho do Pão de Açúcar, podendo ir a pé.

neighborhood_overview:
O que mais gosto do meu bairro : meu apartamento é na frente da praia , no posto 3 da barra da Tijuca .
Adoro o fato de ser um bairro residencial calmo e completo , mas ao mesmo tempo ser pertinho do posto 2 aonde se localiza a praia do Pepê, que trás agito e badalação ao local .
Quando estou passando alguns dias no meu apartamento faço tudo a pé , vou no supermercado , padaria , saio para jantar , e faço muitos exercícios na praia e no calçadão . Acho bacana que no Pepe possui aulas para todos os tipos de esportes aquáticos e jetski.
Vou caminhando até a a Rua Olegario Maciel , aonde há muitos restaurantes , bares e pizzarias , além de comércio , Farmacia e bancos .

description:
Cozy and stylish, this flat is located in one of the most residential streets in Ipanema, at Rua Joaquim Nabuco, very close to the luxurious hotel Fasano

The space
With an area of 377 sq. Ft, it is only one minute walking distance from the beach and one block from the Vieira Souto, near the subway station General Osório, restaurants, supermarkets, bakeries, bars, pharmacies, and all trade of the Neighborhood, close to the upscale 5 stars Fasano hotel. It is also just 5 minutes walking distance from the most noble area of Copacabana (Posto 6). A perfect location for those who want to live a unique moment in this wonderful city.
The property has capacity for up to 6 people and is equipped with two single beds, plus two extra beds, a sofa bed super comfortable that turns into a beautiful and comfortable double bed, air conditioning with 21,000 BTU's, TV Led 47 ', Cable TV, Wi-fi broadband, fridge, washing machine and tumble dryer, iron, cook top stove, microwav
neighborhood_overview: Most people who visit Rio for the first time end up returning to the city.  And when they return, they choose Ipanema to stay.  Sophistication, beautiful, cool people, the most renowned brands and restaurants of the most varied types of menus are what you will find in Ipanema and what makes the neighborhood the top place for you to enjoy the best that Rio can offer you.
host_about:
Leonardo was born and raised in Rio de Janeiro, along with his multilingual skills, has enabled Leonardo to form an international career.  He speaks English, French, Spanish, German, his native Portuguese and a little bit of mandarin, and has travelled to over 50 countries - dealing with many different cultures, people and markets - where he has given marketing and sales lectures, presentations, all the while developing his own sales strategies.  Leonardo lived in Switzerland working in the fashion industry, and upon returning to Brazil he worked for Brazil's top multinational jeweler in a sales capacity, 2 years of which was managing its international store about the Queen Mary 2 luxury cruise ship.  
Leonardo and Archanjo are the best friends for the last twenty three years.
Archanjo was Advertisement/Marketing Execute Manager and Teacher of the biggest private University in Brazil.
 He taught several disciplines such as Creation, Art Direction, Experimental Projects Orientation, Graphic Computing, Strategy Plans, Sales, CRM, Customers Behavior, etc. He speaks English, Spanish, French and Italian.
His career was developed since a trainee to the High Administration of the University.
They did decide to join in the segment of rentals like partners.
Both of them are graduated in Publicity and Media, MBA in Marketing and Executive Management experience.
'We don't sale a simple stay. We provide excellent experiences.'

name: LEBLON OCEANFRONT MANSION APT.1
description:
The space
Stay in an oceanfront apartment located in a famous Rio landmark! Set in Upper Leblon, "The Zeppelin" mansion was for decades one of the most renowned hotspots in Rio for live music and mingling with Brazilian celebrities. Today it has been converted into a gorgeous tropical albergue' but it still retains the mystique and charm of its wild glory days. The lush tropical gardens which surround the Zeppelin are the home to many species of birds, butterflies, and tiny monkeys. And the huge upstairs terrace provides one of the best ocean views in the city! This studio apartment has a full ocean view from your own window, a private bathroom, and kitchen. It is just minutes away from all the best nightlife of Ipanema, Copacabana, and Leblon. Buses, vans, and taxis across the street take you everywhere in the city easily.
Amenities include:
-private outdoor entrance
-private bathroom and kitchen
-WIFI internet
-free gated parking
-free access
host_about: Hi, I'm Jake. I love to travel and I've been living in Rio for 10 years. I hope to see you down here in Rio soon!

name: Ipanema Residence with ocean view!
description:
Charming apartment in Ipanema close to the beach.

One block away from Ipanema beach with morning sun and partial ocean view.

Very airy, the apartment is located on a residential building a few steps from Arpoador.

The space
Cozy and very airy, the apartment is located in a familiar and exclusively residential building just a few steps from Arpoador, Hotel Fasano and several restaurants such as the Astor Restaurant. Many bars and nightclubs are also nearby.

Furnished, the apartment has 1 bedroom with double bed (for 2) and a foldable couch-bed (for 2).

Guest access
Everything on the apartment is there for you to use!

Also, everything inside the minibar is for your use free of charge as well as the Nespresso.

Other things to note
Most of art work displayed in the apartment it's for sale. You can find the list of items and their prices on the card index inside the right drawer
neighborhood_overview:
Ipanema is where things happen in Rio.

You did your you job, you did your research, you looked around and you know it's Ipanema the right place for you to stay in Rio!

From the early morning jogging to the joyful evenings
From the fancy restaurants to the cool fashion lounge bars, bistrôs, pubs
and nightclubs Ipanema never stops and has an amazing nightlife.
From the magnificent sunset at the Arpoador's stone to the

Everything happens in Ipanema.
After all the girl in that famous song is from here.
host_about:
O resultado do somatório de tudo e todos (uns mais outros menos) que cruzaram o meu caminho, desde o momento da minha concepção até esse exato instante, segundo após segundo, acrescido de uma constante, minha condiçao inicial, inata e essencial. E, ainda assim, "ao fim e ao cabo, não passo de uma particula da Natureza".

"Todas as artes, todas as ciências, todas as espiritualidades..."

name: Navegar a  Bordo de um Veleiro Francês no Rio!
description:
Confortável Veleiro Francês Beneatou 43.3 pés
Experiência única de contato com a bela natureza do Rio, onde você, sua família e seus amigos viverão momentos de grande felicidade.
Com total segurança e com um Comandante com mais de 30 anos de navegação, levará você aos melhores passeios aos melhores mergulhos do Rio de Janeiro e a um pôr do sol cinematográfico na Urca.
Momentos de Prazer celebrados com bebidas e petiscos feitos pelo nosso Comandante e Cheff Luciano.

The space
Com três cabines, três banheiros, cozinha, churrasqueira o nosso veleiro proporciona o conforto que você merece. Fazemos de petiscos a pratos elaborados da gastronomia nacional e internacional, assim como famoso risoto de pato a moda Thay.

Guest access
Toda a parte externa da embacação, convés, rede de balanço, espaço lounge do cockpit, duas suites, stand-up, bóias.

name: Beautiful Modern Decorated Studio in Copa
description:
Our apartment is a little gem, everyone loves staying there! Best location, 2 blocks to the subway, 3 blocks to the beach, close to bars, restaurants, supermarkets, banks, public transportation, movie theatre and all you need! Wi-fi, cable TV, air con and fan!

The space
This newly renovated studio (last renovations Oct 2016) is in the best location of Copacabana, situated on a quieter street but just off the main streets, right in the middle of everything, 2 1/2 blocks from the beach, 1 block from the subway (Cantagalo station which places you just a stop away from Ipanema! --> you can just walk there too, no need to hop on the subway really), very close to all local bars and restaurants, and very close to Ipanema and Lagoa (walking distance) where true cariocas exercise in the mornings.

The place is colorfully decorated, modern, with lots of natural light, on the 3rd floor of a leafy greet shady street, in the summer it is great, as any shade helps!
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana is a lively neighborhood and the apartment is located very close to an area in Copa full of bars, cafes and restaurants at Rua Bolivar and Domingos Ferreira. Copacabana never sleeps, there is always movement and it's a great mix of all kinds of people.
host_about:
Hi guys, We're a lovely team of 2 people:

Viviane is a photographer for Lonely Planet. And also a former photographer for Airbnb and an Airbnb host. And a free lance photographer for other wonderful clients. She loves life.

Eduardo - you may occasionally bump into him for your check ins/out - is a M.I.T. (Musicians Institute of Technology) graduate from Los Angeles and plays the best guitar you'll ever hear. Just ask him! Fluent in English, a true carioca full of stories to share.

We  work together in providing the best accommodation to people.

We're great at what we do because we care and we like the type of people Airbnb brings to us. And with almost 500 positive reviews (wow!), we kind of know by now that guests like us too. 

Just like you, we're also independent travelers always looking for the new next thing.

Voila!

We can't live without: love, travel, cameras, movies, music, a good laugh and cool people. Did we say dark chocolate?

Firm believers of enjoying the moment as a prime attitude towards life!

name: Bright 6bed Penthouse Seconds from Beach
description:
Enjoy being part of the Bossa Nova history by staying in the very street where the real-life Girl From Ipanema used to "each day walk to the sea".

» Penthouse with side ocean view
» Six ensuite bedrooms
» 6* Location, first beach-block
» Heart of Ipanema
» Exceptional comfort
» Beachy, modern mid-century style
» Designed for digital nomads
» Remote-Work ready
» Lightning-fast Internet 240m/s
» Locally rooted
» Experience-driven
» Dedicated team
» Authentic and unforgettable Rio story

The space
Located on the first beach block, this beachy, modern mid-century styled Penthouse was designed in a thoughtful way for modern travellers.

More than having a place to sleep, we understand that guests look for remote-work ready, locally rooted, and experience-driven properties with a dedicated team taking pride in going the extra mile to help our guests live an authentic and unforgettable Rio s
neighborhood_overview:
Enter Bossa Nova history by staying in the very street where real-life 'Girl From Ipanema' inspired Vinicius de Moraes to write the worldwide famous song, "each day when she walks to the sea".

Located seconds from Ipanema Beach's best spot Posto 9, on the first beach block in the heart of Ipanema’s very best neighbourhood, enjoy staying in this elegant and modern hideaway in a peaceful residential street.

Ipanema and Leblon are by far the safest locations in Rio, with popular restaurants, cafes and boutique stores walking distance to the apartment.
host_about:
Bom dia! 

Thank you for checking our page!

The well-being of our guests is our top priority.  Goitaca's team brings history and local roots into spaces designed for modern travelers. 

Our properties are all remote-work ready, locally rooted, and experience-driven with a dedicated team taking pride in going the extra mile to help our guests live an authentic and unforgettable Rio story.

Let's build together the future of hospitality. One where people do not have to choose between the experience they want and what they can afford. We believe in delivering hospitality that’s both remarkable and accessible. Because everyone should be able to afford an extraordinary place to stay.

By developing and designing and operating ourselves we have the ability to create uniquely special properties and do it at a fraction of the cost and we pass those savings back to our guests.

We have had the amazing chance to host over two thousand guests on Airbnb since 2011, learned so much from them, and made countless friends around the world. 

Hopefully, you will be the next one to join our wonderful community and live an authentic and unforgettable Rio story.

Make sure you check our website: goitacastay com

Best wishes and safe travels!

name: Apartamento frente mar para a praia de Ipanema e pedra do Arpoador.
description:
Other things to note
Lindo apartamento de 188 m2 de frente para a praia de Ipanema e pedra do Arpoador.

Sua ampla Janela frente mar transmite a verdadeira sensação do verão carioca.

Dois espaçosos quartos, um com uma cama King e outro com 4 camas de solteiro, ar condicionado, cozinha totalmente equipada, 2 banheiros, 2 salas de estar em ambiente amplo, confortável e finamente decorado.

Inclui 2 lounges, com um escritório que delimita os 2 espaços. O escritório pode ser facilmente transformada em um 3º quarto, o que permite que este apartamento alugado acomode até 10 pessoas.

Sua ampla sala possui um escritório reversível equipado com sofá cama.

Com portaria 24hrs e localização excelente, próximo de bares, restaurantes, metrô, supermercado 24hrs, lojas, farmácias e do Forte de Copacabana.

name: Walk to Joatinga Beach/PedraDaGávea View Casa/Pool
description:
This private 4 bedroom/4 bathroom home is located in the prestiges neighborhood of Joatinga. This is considered the Beverly Hills of Rio de Janeiro. It is a gated, 24 hour security neighborhood with it's own beach. This home had a Brand New pool and barbecue area. The kitchen has everything you need. All appliances are imported from the US. You will sleep well in high quality cotton sheets and enjoy the plush comfort of imported towels. Come live like a Carioca in this beautiful home.

The space
The house sits on the side of the mountain in the jungle where you will live harmoniously in nature with the monkeys, toucans and other rain forest life. Your view will be of the very famous Pedra da Gavea mountain. Quite spectacular! All this within a few minutes of our small town.

The house was build by the famous Brazilian Architect Zanini who was ahead of his time using mainly recycled demolition wood and other materials. Most of the furniture and fur

and more!
host_about:
Hello,
I am an American married to a Brazilian and we have a multiculti daughter.  We live part of the time in Rio de Janeiro Brazil and part in La Jolla California.   Then the rest of the time we love to travel!

I first came to Rio in 2003 for work in the Fashion industry.  It just so happened my now husband was my then agent.  He showed me the local style of Rio and I instantly feel in love.  Well, at first with the City and the country and later him. : )  

 Andre, is a huge water guy, he surfs- stand-up, Kite and short board.  He is a triathlete.  Needless to say we spend most of our time outside, at the beach or around the beach life style.  I on the other hand, love Yoga, meditation, cooking, gardening, a good book, dance, good wine, fashion, interior design and most of all travel! 

We are fortunate to be a family that travels internationally many times each year.  My daughter is bilingual and working on her third language, (mandrin).  

In one of my many past careers I was a professional Dancer and had the good fortune of working for a famous band.  I traveled all over the world for 5 years.  It was a special time and an honer and a pleasure to have the experience of knowing so many incredible placed and people.  It would be very hard to pick one but I must say the Magical Island of Bali is my all time favorite.  

We hope to see you here in Rio Soon
Peace and Blessings,
Sherri, Andre and Bella

name: Beach Block 3bed Penthouse, Ipanema Best Location
description:
Enter the Bossa Nova history by staying in the very street where the real-life 'Girl From Ipanema' used to "each day walk to the sea".

» Penthouse with side ocean view
» 3 ensuite bedrooms
» 6* Location, first beach block
» Heart of Ipanema
» Exceptional comfort
» Beachy, modern mid-century style
» Designed for digital nomads
» Remote-Work ready
» Lightning-fast Internet 240m/s
» Locally rooted
» Experience-driven
» Dedicated team
» Authentic and unforgettable Rio story

The space
Located on the first beach block, this beachy, modern mid-century styled Penthouse was designed in a thoughtful way for modern travellers.

More than having a place to sleep, we understand that guests look for remote-work ready, locally rooted and experience-driven properties with a dedicated team taking pride in going the extra mile to help our guests live an authentic and unforgettable Rio story.
neighborhood_overview:
Enter Bossa Nova history by staying in the very street where real-life 'Girl From Ipanema' inspired Vinicius de Moraes to write the worldwide famous song, "each day when she walks to the sea".

Located just seconds from Ipanema Beach's popular spot ‘Posto 9’, this first beach block apartment is located on a peaceful residential street in the heart of Rio’s best neighbourhood.

Ipanema and Leblon are by far the safest locations in Rio, with popular restaurants, cafes and boutique stores within walking distance.
host_about:
Bom dia! 

Thank you for checking our page!

The well-being of our guests is our top priority.  Goitaca's team brings history and local roots into spaces designed for modern travelers. 

Our properties are all remote-work ready, locally rooted, and experience-driven with a dedicated team taking pride in going the extra mile to help our guests live an authentic and unforgettable Rio story.

Let's build together the future of hospitality. One where people do not have to choose between the experience they want and what they can afford. We believe in delivering hospitality that’s both remarkable and accessible. Because everyone should be able to afford an extraordinary place to stay.

By developing and designing and operating ourselves we have the ability to create uniquely special properties and do it at a fraction of the cost and we pass those savings back to our guests.

We have had the amazing chance to host over two thousand guests on Airbnb since 2011, learned so much from them, and made countless friends around the world. 

Hopefully, you will be the next one to join our wonderful community and live an authentic and unforgettable Rio story.

Make sure you check our website: goitacastay com

Best wishes and safe travels!

name: Studio espaçoso no centro de Duque de Caxias
description:
Aconchegante studio equipado com mobília e utensílios para estadas curtas ou longas.

O studio fica numa residência de três andares divididas em unidades semelhantes totalmente independentes e privativas, algumas com moradores. A entrada é comum mas só você terá acesso ao seu studio.

Você será recebido(a) pelo Sávio, que mora próximo ao local e lhe dará todas as informações necessárias.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
Ficamos no bairro Jardim 25 de Agosto, em frente ao Fórum de Duque de Caxias, com uma pequena praça arborizada no meio. É uma área residencial com alguns outros prédios do judiciário (MPRJ, OAB e Defensoria Pública) e Departamento de Polícia próximo. Uma área bem tranquila e segura.
Há um Carrefour a 7 minutos de distância na Av. Brigadeiro Lima e Silva, onde também há bastante comércio, bares e restaurantes.
Aos domingos, acontece uma das maiores feiras tradicionais do estado do Rio, situada em ruas próximas à casa, com comidas nordestinas, roupas, e outros artigos disponíveis .

You can also rent a bike and cycle to Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, one of Rio’s postcards!

name: Garden Studio - Home away from Home
description:
Studio apartment with garden and awesome views on a quiet cul-de-sac street in the artsy Santa Teresa neighborhood, with a park and cultural centre right across the street. Owned by A Brazilian-Canadian couple. Local Rio de Janeiro at its best!

The space
A studio apartment on Rua Murtinho Nobre in Santa Teresa is available for short term rentals. The studio is owned by a Brazilian-Canadian couple who work in the arts. It has a bathroom with large shower and kitchenette with all the basics. The apartment overlooks a garden which guests are free to use, boasting hibiscus plants and a pitanga tree and flanked by jambu and avocado trees. The garden has an outdoor shower for cooling off on hot summer days. As we are on a hill, the apartment has a fabulous view of greenery as well as of the Centro, arches of Lapa, Cathedral, Bay of Guanabara & bridge to Niteroi. The studio has been a home away from home for visiting journalists, musicians, architects, as well as to h
neighborhood_overview: Once a place for upper-class homes, the neighbourhood of Santa Teresa nowadays is home to many residents  who work in Rio de Janeiro's thriving cultural and artistic  scene.   There are no stoplights in the quiet, winding streets  - many of which preserve the historic cobblestones -   and this combined with the fact that Rio de Janeiro's only streetcar route  still survives here gives Santa Teresa  a small town feeling even though we are in the heart of the city.
host_about: The studio is owned by myself, a  Canadian who has lived in Rio for 15 years, and my husband, a native carioca (local from Rio de Janeiro). We both work in the arts, are passionate about the city, and love to recommend off the beaten track  places and events that most tourists never hear about.  We are spending some time back in Canada so Daniel and Amanda a will be on hand to greet and help guests with  whatever they need to enjoy the studio and the city! This is an  awesome city is if you know a few people and your way around. Daniel and Amanda live right above the studio so are close at hand to provide assistance when needed, but also know that some guests need little advice and prefer to discover the city on their own.
neighbourhood: Santa Teresa, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: GREAT VIEW -Guesthouse "CASA 48"- Santa Teresa  #1
description:
If you want to experience something different and more authentic than classical hotels during your stay in Rio : welcome in our GuestHouse "Casa 48" in Santa Teresa. Be ready for a unique relationship with the Sugar Loaf!

The space
-----------------------------------------------------
BREAKFAST / WiFi / TOWELS INCLUDED -
NO EXTRA CLEANING FEE
ALSO INCLUDED : OUR DAILY GOOD PLANS TO ENJOY RIO BY DAY & BY NIGHT
----------------------------------------------------
NEW ! little Swimming pool on the roof top!
------------------------------------------------------
CAUTIOUS: this listing is to rent ONE room, and not the entire floor/house. If you want the entire floor or house, please contact us. One floor can welcome up to 10 people.
If the website indicates that the room is booked please contact us we may have other rooms available on another listing.

Casa 48 is a 7 private rooms GUESTHOUSE, there is no dormitor
host_about:
Casa 48 is situated in the bohemian and colonial district of Santa Teresa, in the centre of Rio de Janeiro. The story began in 2009 when Raphaël and Axel arrived from France to do an exchange program, later Valentin and Clément joined them to take part to the adventure. Step by step, the 4 of us have been improving the house to turn it in a nice 7 bedrooms guesthouse in front of the Sugar Loaf. 

Axel and Valentin are living in the house, Valentin is in charge of receiving you, he will give you the keys of your room and of Rio! Axel is always around and he is an oficial tour guide, you can rely on him to discover Rio from all angles. 

Raphael and Clément live in France, they come often to take part of our new projects and to enjoy Rio. 

We speak english, french, spanish and portuguese, we are in our thirties and we have been experiencing Rio for many years. We are very pleased to make you sharing our passion for this amazing city, we will give you our best tips by day and night so you can really feel the Carioca way of life. 

Axel, Valentin, Raphael, Clément

name: ❤Unique RIO | retreat w/ forest view in hot spot
description:
Discover Rio in this unique setting!

Relax in the balcony and enjoy your view of verdant forest and abundand wildlife while planning your next full day and having a drink.

Very convenient area close to numerous beaches, restaurants, bars and supermarkets but at the same time a true hideaway for your busy days in Rio.

Ipanema & Leblon are only a 10/15 min. walk away.

The space
The apartment itself is the best place you can rest after a grand day touring around the city. There's a balcony where you can sit and enjoy the forest while enjoying one of your meals or just relaxing before resting for the day.

If you dont feel like staying in, there are plenty restaurants and snack bars just a few minutes walk away. Gavea is a very safe neighborhood with lively nightlife and easy public transportation to all places in Rio. Beaches, Pao de Acucar, Christ, Downtown are all reacheble by buses you can access at the central bus sto
neighborhood_overview:
The building is in a very quiet area of Gavea but very close to Leblon & Ipanema. In about 15 min walk you can reach Leblon beach! For Ipanema and Copacabana its just a quick bus ride.

A Gávea é um dos bairros de maior luxo e tranquilidade do Rio de Janeiro, estando ao mesmo tempo inserido num braço da Mata Atlântica e a poucos minutos de centros comerciais e lazer.

A Zona Sul do Rio tem o privilégio de estar entre o mar, com belíssimas e famosas praias, e os parques florestais que dão o frescor e beleza inspiradores. O bucolismo e a urbanidade estão equilibrados nessa região, muito bem servida de todo tipo de comércio, restaurantes, entretenimento e cultura.
host_about:
Oi, tudo bem? Meu nome é Silvia e sou a sua anfitriã. Sou do Rio de Janeiro e adotei Floripa como minha cidade em 2011. Me mudei procurando mais qualidade de vida, tranquilidade e para poder ter mais espaço e tempo para trabalhar como free-lancer. E foi uma decisão super acertada, Florianópolis é uma cidade apaixonante. ,As vezes ainda me pego admirando a cidade, as vistas extraordinárias e pluralidade como se fosse turista!! Mas gosto, principalmente, do meu canto, pertinho da deslumbrante praia Moçambique e num bairro com uma carinha de interior com bastante verde e canto de pássaros.

Sou casada e eu e o meu marido adoramos viajar, conhecer novos lugares, culturas e viver aventuras. Principalmente se a viagem for de moto. Já tivemos a oportunidade de visitar o norte e o sul do estado, o Uruguai e temos planos de fazer uma long trip muito em breve. Destino ainda não 100% definido. 

Essa vontade de conhecer mais sobre outras culturas e lugares e também compartilhar um pouco do nosso canto tao diferente  onde vivemos foi o principal motivo que nos levou a abrir uma hospedagem. 

Sou formada em Jornalismo, apaixonada por cinema, fotografia,  seriados e também gosto muito de ouvir música e caminhar pelo bosque pertinho de casa. Adoro cavalos, cães, fazer trilhas e estar rodeada da minha família e amigos! Quer saber mais sobre mim? Só perguntar!

neighborhood_overview: Centrally located, next to Ipanema and Copacabana beach (2mn walk). Supermarkets, restaurants, bars, metro bus stops right around the corner.
host_about:
Rio is my love with its beautiful people on the beach, streets, shopping malls, art galleries, museum. Love the night life, its restaurants, clubs. I spend my time between Rio de Janeiro and Paris. When i am in Rio i am happy to go out with my guests and show them some hidden parts of the city. I am a musician playing the flute. You can find my music Vivaldi's Revenge or Bach in Blue by Pierre Saint-Denis, in stores and on the net. Here i am playing with various musicians and also with ballet dancers. 
In Rio you don't need to go to movies the City offers the best movie on Earth. Come to visit Rio de Janeiro and i hope to make your stay memorable.
See you soon,
Pierre

name: Unbelievable Ocean View Apartment
description:
The space
This lovely 2-bedroom duplex in the fascinating neighborhood of Vidigal has a mind-blowing view of the Rio coastline and islands, Leblon/Ipanema, and even the Corcovado. Come wake up to the sun, sea, and mountains with a view that you can only get from Vidigal!

This is a third-floor walk-up, with an old-fashioned spiral staicase from the kitchen/living/dining rooms up to the bedrooms and bathroom. With both rooms and the large and comfortable sofa bed, this place can accommodate up to four people.

Vidigal is a unique neighborhood; formerly an upscale suburb of Ipanema/Leblon, the favela slowly crept down from up on the hill over many years, making the area a lively mix of middle- and lower-class citizens with very good building stock. Recently, however, the Rio police have completely pacified the neighborhood and cleared out all traces of criminal influence, and the hill is experiencing a wonderful renewal.

A short walk to the
neighborhood_overview:
If you like hiking, you have to get on this track to the top of "Dois Irmãos" hill, one of Rio's most beautiful view. It's not difficult and not a long way up there.
http://rioforyou.com/

Se você gosta de trilhas, o Vidigal é o lugar certo para se hospedar. Um das vistas mais espetaculares do Rio está na trilha ao topo do "Dois Irmãos", aquela montanha que parece inacessível que você avista da praia do arpoador, ipanema e leblon não é tão dificil de acessar quanto parece. Ficando no bairro do Vidigal você já tem acesso a trilha com muito mais facilidade e mesmo sem guia, perguntado aos simpáticos moradores da comunidade você cherá ao topo com facilidade.
http://trilhadoisirmaos.com.br/

Public and beautiful Park in Vidigal:
Sitiê
http://www.parquesitie.org/

Restaurants in Vidigal:
Barlacubaco restaurante
Av. Presidente João Goulart, 686.

Art and Theatre:
Nós do Morro
www.nosdomorro.com.br

name: Comfort em Copacabana
description:
Other things to note
Bem vindos, sintam-se a vontade em nossa casa, mas atentem para algumas orientações:
1- Os fumantes são bem vindos, mas não podem fumar dentro de qualquer ambiente do apartamento, apenas em áreas externas como no corredor do prédio.
2- Na cozinha , os hóspedes poderão usar a geladeira e o microondas para aquecimento rápido.
3- Não é permitido usar o fogão e nem cozinhar alimentos.
4- O banheiro é exclusivo para os hóspedes e pode ser compartilhado na alta temporada ou em grandes eventos.
5- A sala é comum a todos e disponibilizamos a mesa de jantar para refeições ao longo do dia, bem como pratos, copos e talhares.
6- A louça usada pelos hóspedes ao longo do dia deverá ser devidamente lavada.
7- Não é permitido retirar louças ou alimentos armazenados no armário sem permissão.
8- É possível pedir refeições por aplicativo para serem consumidas em nossa sala.
9- Não é permitido trazer convidados para o quarto.
host_about:
SOU PROFESSORA DE HISTÓRIA. 
ADORO MÚSICA E LIVROS. GOSTO MUITO DE  VIAJAR E DE PREPARAR E SABOREAR BONS PRATOS.

OBS. Falamos um pouco de inglês e francês

The room to be rented is closed to the bathroom.We are close to the main streets, and also close to Atlantic forest, and to Corcovado Tram Station. We have visitors like mico sagüi, exotic birds like Tucano and others.
In the backyard you have a privileged view of Corcovado.
In the region you can find bakeries, pharmacies, supermarkets, shops, banks and others.
With easy access to all areas of Rio de Janeiro, since the distance is a small bus stop and taxi. And bus that takes you straight to the subway.
We are two adult people living in the house and both speak English, Spanish and some French.
We welcome people for short stay or long stay. Breakfast optional.

neighborhood_overview: Santa Teresa é um lugar único e muito interessante no Rio de Janeiro. Está situada na região central e o alto da colina oferece uma vista privilegiada da cidade, da Baia de Guanabara e do Pāo de Açúcar. Este bairro parece ter parado no tempo, com as suas casas antigas, palacetes, ruas estreitas com paralelepípedos e o famoso bondinho que leva os moradores e turistas ladeira abaixo.
host_about: Somos um casal, Carmen e Fernando, ,que desde 1998 compartilhamos a nossa casa localizada em Santa Teresa, próximo ao Largo do Curvelo. Priorizamos a empatia e o respeito às diferenças! Como cariocas sentimos felicidade em divulgar a vida cultural e sugerir passeios na cidade. A casa possui um terraço com uma pequena piscina e uma vista panorâmica do centro da cidade e da Baía de Guanabara. Os quartos possuem cama de solteiro ou cama de casal, banheiro privativo, além de uma cozinha totalmente equipada para uso exclusivo dos moradores. Estão incluídos nos serviços oferecidos a internet wi-fi! É fácil chegar na casa, que está localizada a 4Km do Aeroporto Santos Dumont(vôos domésticos) com conexão de ônibus para o aeroporto Internacional (20 Km) e a 7Km do terminal interestadual de ônibus. Além disso, estamos a 10 minutos caminhando até a Lapa, bairro da boemia carioca, com vários opções de música e restaurantes, e a 10 minutos a pé da estação Glória do Metrô, de onde é possível chegar em Copacabana e Ipanema em 15 minutos. name: Luxury Accommodation in Hip Leblon
description:
In Rio's best location, this luxury and fully equipped apartment is your best option to stay at home or for sightseeing.

Enjoy relaxing moments in this apartament and lots of fun in their surroundings.

The space
Cozy four-room apartment (office, living room and 2 suites - one with a queen-sized double bed and the other with a bunk bed) located on the third floor (without lift) in a charming and quiet building in the heart of Rio's best neighborhood: Leblon. The owner is renting his own home, so it is a real "home sweet home"! It is very well furnished and there is complimentary wi-fi internet access.

It is located only three blocks away from the Leblon Beach and at walking distance to Ipanema Beach. It is also close to the beautiful Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon as well as to many restaurants, snack bars, night clubs, supermarkets, drugstores, convenience stores, retail stores, movie theaters, theaters and malls. It is also very close to Copaca
neighborhood_overview:
Leblon is one of the most exclusive and safe neighborhoods in Rio. It is an affluent neighborhood just west from Ipanema. In the north it is bordered by Gávea and in the west by a towering hill (where people do hang gliding) which connects to São Conrado and Barra - where you can find the best spots for surfing and kite surfing in Rio.

It´s very much like Ipanema but even more exclusive. In the opinion of most “cariocas” - term used for people that are born in Rio - Leblon is the Rio's best neighborhood with lots of restaurants and bars; some of them are open 24 hours a day. People use to go there to enjoy life and eat late at night.

In a recent research for a big magazine, cariocas said that Leblon is the place where you find more pretty people per square foot.
host_about:
We are a couple that loves to travel and to learn about other cultures. 
Music, Art, History and Gastronomy are the treasures we always search.
Mountains, beaches, forests, deserts and beautiful lakes are landscapes that we love to see.
Cultural and enjoyable nightlife makes us happy.

O apartamento comporta até 4 pessoas no quarto, 2 pessoas na cama e duas num colchão casal ou também pode ser duas na sala (sofá cama).

O apartamento fica próximo ao "Rio Scenarium", "Lapa 40 º", "Fundição progresso", "Circo Voador" e muitos outros ótimos bares, restaurantes, lugares para dançar e ouvir música brasileira ao vivo. Há muitos festivais de rua livre, eventos, pontos turísticos na área imediata, incluindo os "Arcos da Lapa", "Escadaria Selarón", bairro histórico de "Santa Teresa" , "Museu Nacional de Belas Artes" , "

Private room with spectacular views to both the beach in the front and to the mountains with their rain forest in the back, a truly stunning location. Taxis, buses and vans within 100 yards of front door. Walk to the beach in only 3 minutes! See it from the front varanda.

name: 5 min a pé - Praia de Copacabana, Metrô, WiFi II
description:
Estudio independente c 30m2, banheiro privativo, Wi-Fi alta velocidade (aprox 100 Mbps). Ar Cond., frigobar, cafeteira, torradeira, liquidificador, microondas, utensílios básicos, TV, lençóis e toalhas. Localizado em frente à favela do Pavão-Pavãozinho e muito próximos a praia de Copacabana e do metrô de Ipanema. R. Saint Roman é o principal acesso à favela e o início da subida para acesso à comunidade. Veja a nossa localização no GMaps: R. Saint Roman, ANTES de confirmar pagamento/reserva.

The space
Uma casa tradicional da década de 50, em Copacabana, foi reformada e convertida em 7 apartamentos totalmente independentes e funcionais. O estudio deste anúncio é um deles, e os proprietários vivem em outros 2, na mesma propriedade.
O estudio possui banheiro privativo e cozinha compacta com geladeira, microondas, cafeteira, torradeira, liquidificador e utensílios básicos necessários para preparar refeições simples (café da manhã e refeições rápidas), não tem fog
neighborhood_overview:
Estamos em Copacabana no limite com Ipanema, a 2 quadras de distância da praia e a poucos passos do metrô e da principal avenida comercial do bairro, Avenida Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, com farta oferta de restaurantes, bares, farmácias, supermercados (abertos até 10:00 PM), cinema e intenso movimento 24h por dia.
A Rua Saint Roman é uma rua especial porque é o principal acesso a uma das favelas de Copacabana. O hóspede, além das experiências normais de um turista na cidade, pode viver uma experiência adicional e única.
host_about:
*French version below 

We host international business & leisure travellers since 2009 - vacation and corporate housing.

Renato is the architect (responsible for the 5-story house design) and Louri is your main host, as well the manager of the place. We are the owners.

If you like outdoors sports, biking, running, swimming, hiking, climbing, stand-up paddle (SUP), or just want to try Rio in a different and original way, we are waiting for you.

Architecture & Design can connect us, as well. if you are interested to know more about architecture in Rio, we could take you deeper in this world. Renato has some cool projects in town and he will be more than happy to give you some information and guide you, if you are interested, of course.

We are Smoke-Free/Drug-Free/Drink Responsibly

Every aspect of your stay is important to us and we can tailor any request to your individual needs ensuring you have a unique experience in Rio.

We are available in English, French, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

Nous accueillons des voyageurs internationaux depuis 2009 dans le cadre de leurs déplacements professionnels ou touristiques.

Renato est l'architecte à l'origine du design et de la conception des 7 suites et Louri votre interlocuteur et manager des lieux. Nous sommes tous les deux associés et propriétaires.

Si vous aimez les sports extérieurs, vélo, course à pied, nage, randonnée, escalade, stand-up paddle ou si vous souhaitez tout simplement découvrir Rio différemment nous vous attendons!

L'architecture et le design à Rio peuvent également être des sujets d’intérêts en commun que nous pourrions vous faire découvrir plus en détail. Renato pilote actuellement plusieurs projets dans la ville qu'il serait plus que ravi de vous expliquer, si bien entendu cela vous intéresse.

Nous sommes non fumeurs, non consommateurs de drogues et peu consommateurs d'alcools.

Chaque aspect de votre séjour est important à nos yeux; c'est pourquoi nous nous efforcerons de répondre à vos attentes afin que votre expérience à Rio soit unique et inoubliable.

Nous sommes à votre disposition en Anglais, Français, Espagnol et Portugais Brésilien, bien entendu.

name: Quarto confortável com vista panorâmica
description:
It is a bedroom comfortable and is located on the terrace with a special feature: you can exit out through the window directly to the terrace and see a beautiful view of downtown and the Guanabara Bay and enjoy our small pool to relax and cool off!

The space
Our happiness is to share our home with all the people who are in the movement of construction of love and respect for differences. We have a lot of gratitude to meet people from all over the world.

Guest access
We shared our terrace.

Other things to note
We have a very sweet cat who likes affection and a special place under the mango tree to rest with a beautiful view of Guanabara Bay and Sugar Loaf.
neighborhood_overview: Santa Teresa is a unique and very interesting place in Rio de Janeiro. It is located in the central region and the hill offers a great view of the city of Guanabara Bay and Sugar Loaf. This neighborhood seems to have stopped in time, with its old houses, small palaces, narrow cobbled streets and the famous cable car that takes residents and tourists slope below.
host_about: Somos um casal, Carmen e Fernando, ,que desde 1998 compartilhamos a nossa casa localizada em Santa Teresa, próximo ao Largo do Curvelo. Priorizamos a empatia e o respeito às diferenças! Como cariocas sentimos felicidade em divulgar a vida cultural e sugerir passeios na cidade. A casa possui um terraço com uma pequena piscina e uma vista panorâmica do centro da cidade e da Baía de Guanabara. Os quartos possuem cama de solteiro ou cama de casal, banheiro privativo, além de uma cozinha totalmente equipada para uso exclusivo dos moradores. Estão incluídos nos serviços oferecidos a internet wi-fi! É fácil chegar na casa, que está localizada a 4Km do Aeroporto Santos Dumont(vôos domésticos) com conexão de ônibus para o aeroporto Internacional (20 Km) e a 7Km do terminal interestadual de ônibus. Além disso, estamos a 10 minutos caminhando até a Lapa, bairro da boemia carioca, com vários opções de música e restaurantes, e a 10 minutos a pé da estação Glória do Metrô, de onde é possível chegar em Copacabana e Ipanema em 15 minutos. Próximo a casa, temos supermercado, restaurantes, farmácia e banco 24 horas. Ficaremos muito felizes em recebê-lo(a).

Cortinas black out nos quartos e Cortina Solar na
neighborhood_overview:
A Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas fica no coração da Zona Sul, e em sua orla há diversas opções de lazer e gastronomia. Essa é a combinação perfeita para passar um dia neste cartão postal do Rio.

Às margens da lagoa. existem vários restaurantes badalados de diversas nacionalidades para agradar todos os gostos. . A “dobradinha” inclui atrações diversas de lazer como arte, contato com a natureza, gastronomia, música e até atividades esportivas. Para as crianças, o programa também é um prato cheio.

A região dispõe de transporte público fácil e rápido para toda a cidade e táxis em abundância, além de ponto para aluguel de bicicletas e 2 estações de metrô: Estação Cantagalo e saída estação General Osório.

name: Ipanema WOW!  for 6+2
description:
The View from the apartment's balcony of the Two Brother's Mount is the Ipanema Beach's true symbol.
Don't Miss the Ocean view and The Christ Redeemer from your own home in Rio.
The pool belong to the condo But is shared with few people.
Do not hesitate to contact me for more details.

The space
READ THE FULL DESCRIPTION :
On the beach! The apartment fits 3 couples +2 children+ 1 Baby.
As well comfortably fits 6 adults + 2 children
Enjoy a Comfortable apartment with direct view on Ipanema Beach and Christ Redeemer on the best point of Ipanema Beach,
It's also a short walking from groceries, pharmacies, restaurants, subways etc.
Why would you walk even a block when you can just step outside, roll out your towel, and be on the golden sands of Ipanema?
This lovely tenth floor unit isn’t called “Ipanema's Most Beautiful View” for nothing.
On the Apartment There is a balcony where you can see 80% Ipanema's beach,
neighborhood_overview:
The building is between Hotel Fasano and Boteco Boa Praça and in front of "Posto 8" at Ipanema beach.
Bargain hunters will love the Arts and Craft Market " Feira Hippie" right on the square, which is on Sundays all day long.
The Food market is every Tuesday.

Rio carnival
Every February millions of people celebrate Brazilian's biggest street Carnival – the Ipanema's band start 30 meters from the building. The Carnival's theme brings a welcome splash of colour to Ipanema, and the huge parade performers is a spectacular sight and You'll also be able to enjoy Samba music from your balcony.

Anything you may need is just very few minutes outside the building.
You don't need to walk more than 2 minutes to:
- Supermarket
-Change your money
-good, chip and expensive restaurants
-taxi/bus/sightseeing bus/ Subway
-Pharmacy
-International Newspaper
-Bars/Pubs
-The Beach
-Shops
-Grocery's
-Fruit mark
host_about: Born in Rio de Janeiro, proud of the beauty and charms of my city, but above all of Rio's humor and the cheerful, colorful and lively atmosphere that only Rio de Janeiro knows how to offer.  Unfortunately I don't live here anymore but I love to share my home that I consider a kind of sanctuary in the midst of this extraordinary beauty of nature.

name: Casarão histórico em frente à praia dos Tamoios
description:
Casarão em frente à praia dos Tamoios, rápido e fácil acesso a partir da estação das barcas e centro comercial (há 350m, aproximadamente 4 minutos a pé). Muito próximo aos principais restaurantes, mercados, farmácia, lojas.
O casarão fica em frente ao canhão que saudava a chegada de Dom João VI e a poucos metros da famosa árvore "Maria Gorda", um baobá símbolo da ilha. Os outros principais pontos turísticos também se encontram nas redondezas.
Casa super espaçosa, silenciosa e tranquila.
host_about: Biomédica e viajante! Adoro viajar na mesma proporção que gosto de fazer parte das experiências de viagens das pessoas! O casarão é um patrimônio histórico, parte da história cultural e arquitetônica da Ilha de Paquetá e do Rio de Janeiro, reformado e adaptado aos dias de hoje para proporcionar conforto a todos que tiverem a experiência de se hospedarem!

name: Xenia's Room Casa São Conrado
description:
Our house is near the beach (400m) (surf, wind surfing, kite surfing, 40 km of bike paths), Tijuca National Park (trails, abseiling, waterfalls, tandem paragliding, cycling), Fashion Mall Shopping (restaurants, boutiques, theater, cinemas), Italian gastronomy kiosk, 15 minutes from Copacabana, Maracanã, Sambódromo, Ipanema by metro, supermarket, discos of Barra da Tijuca (Armando Lombardi Ave.) .... You will just love it!

The space
Even though located in the South Zone of Rio, above the Gávea Golf Club, the house has a very quiet farmhouse atmosphere in the midst of the Atlantic rain forest of the Tijuca National Park, and is close to the tourist attraction points of Rio by subway, BRT and buses (our street crosses one of the largest transit arteries of the south district of Rio between the neighborhoods of Gávea / Leblon and Barra da Tijuca).
The house is situated directly below the "Gávea Rock" which is part of a series of mountains (basaltic rocks) covere
neighborhood_overview:
Nature and landscapes

"Pepino Beach" of São Conrado: white sand beach 3 km to about 400 m from the house.

The "Pedra da Gávea" is an imposing basalt stone of 844 meters of altitude (2,769 feet) composed of granite and gneiss that dominates the House San Conrado. It is the largest sea coast stone block in the world. From the top of the stone, the view reaches the entire stretch of shores of the South and West Zone of Rio de Janeiro.

At the top of the "Pedra Bonita" is the free flight takeoff ramp. A 20-minute trail takes tourists up to an exceptional viewpoint on the sea shore of São Conrado.

The view from the house is breathtaking ... and reaches the tops of the Tijuca National Park covered in subtropical forest (Atlantic Forest)

The house is separated from the Gávea Golf Club only by a small mountain creek with clear sound of running water and intense animal life. From the house, you can observe various species of birds such as to
host_about: I am 69 years old, was born in Paris France, lived 20 years in Germany where I founded a family  and worked for various companies of the sector of industrial machinery and in these functions I traveled quite considerably  around the world. I have been spending the last 25 years in Brazil leading the daughter company of an European group and later as an independent salesman representing North American companies. I speak English, French, German, Spanish and Portuguese, enjoy very much contacts and to get the visit of foreign travelers in my house of São Conrado in Rio de Janeiro. I turned a great fan of Brazil and like to chat with my guests about what I know about it, passing on to them the marking cultural places that I visited and my experiences with typical bars, restaurants, museums and beaches of Rio. I bought this big house 21 years ago and transformed it progressively according to my taste to  the comfortable place it is today  and it grew to be my delight and hobby ... I like people to feel at ease there just like I do myself and feel happy when they return home with nice remembrances of their stay ...

neighborhood_overview:
Barra da Tijuca has the biggest beach of the city, with 16kms of distance. Great neighborhood for families, with a lot of options of programs during the day.

The best shopping malls of Rio are located here, with good restaurants and bars ofering a great nightlife.
host_about:
A gente sempre pensa que um dia algo de estraordinário vai acontecer do nada em nossas vidas e que tudo vai se transformar em um éden!
Bem amigos , se pensarmos com maturidade , veremos que se não fizermos nada e só ficarmos esperando, não haverá merecimento e pior, estaremos deixando a vida passar sem atitudes que mesmo indiretamente ou não, poderiamos ter tomado , não só para ajudarmos a nós mesmos como também ao amigo ou parente ao lado que necessita e voce só ficou olhando com pena.
Tome uma atitude de movimento e ação mesmo que erre de vez em quando, é melhor do que se ausentar!
Vamos nos transformar em indivíduos de atitudes , solidariedade e responsabilidade pelos atos assumidos e pelos não assumidos também.
Omissão não é solução!
Vamos partir para movimentos de luta, solidariedade, ajudar com palavras e ações que trasnformem .

Beautifully-designed studio 5 minutes walk to Copacabana beach in tree-lined residential street with personal touches and high quality finishes. You'll receive our detailed written guide to Rio, welcome food, benefit from our local knowledge and feel at home before you even arrive!

The space
CARNIVAL NOTE: Please note that our minimum stay for Carnival is 4 nights. So, please don't use Instant Book for Carnival if your stay is less than 4 nights. Carnival 2019 prices are already in the calendar, so just enter your dates!

We do hope you will come and stay - we'll do all we can to make your stay special!

Our beautifully-designed and renovated studio is located in a lovely, tree-lined, residential street in
neighborhood_overview:
Everything is on your doorstep here: local shops, supermarkets, the original 'City of Copacabana' Shopping Centre, great cafes, bars and restaurants. Every Wednesday morning there's a lovely fresh food market 3 minutes walk away at the end of our street. When you see all the marvellous things in our neighbourhood set out in our guide you will see why we think we are in the best area and best street in Rio!

Copacabana Beach for us is much more interesting, day and night, than Ipanema and the range of shops and quality of life in Copa somehow seems much more real-world...a fantastic experience living like a true Carioca (native of Rio)!

We have everything on hand, but perhaps what we love most best is the ease of just a 5-minute walk home to our residential tree-lined street feeling you are escaping from the lively beach area, or the big parties at New Year and Carnival!
host_about: We're a happily married Scottish couple who fell in love with Brazil when we lived in Sao Paulo a few years ago. We love Rio so much we decided to buy a little studio here so we could spend some months a year in Copacabana, working from here and enjoying the city.  We sometimes rent it out when we're not here.  We hope you enjoy Rio and living in our studio as much as we do.  We'll do as much as we can to make your stay easy and memorable.

neighborhood_overview: Gavea é um bairro residencial da Zona Sul do RJ com muita área verde, localizado entre os Morros Dois Irmãos e a Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas e estudantil pela proximidade com a PUC. Muitas atrações próximas ao apartamento como o Shopping da Gavea com 5 teatros, 2 cinemas e vários restaurantes,  muitos bares abertos até de madrugada no Baixo Gavea, Jardim Botânico, praia do Leblon, Jockey Clube, Instituto Moreira Sales, Planetário da Gavea  e Clube de Regatas do Flamengo ( O mais popular time de futebol do RJ) . A Gavea é dividida informalmente entre Alto Gavea e Baixo Gavea, o apartamento fica localizado no Alto Gavea a curta distância do Baixo Gavea que é conhecido como um local boêmio muito frequentado pelos cariocas.

neighborhood_overview:
Duque de Caxias é um município brasileiro do estado do Rio de Janeiro, localiza-se na Baixada Fluminense, na Região Metropolitana do Rio de Janeiro, estando situado a 15 km da capital estadual.
O hotel é um dos principais da região que atende o público corporativo ou aqueles que estão de passagem pela cidade, sendo um hotel próximo ao Aeroporto Internacional do Galeão. O Hotel está localizado à margens da Rodovia Washington Luiz, em Duque de Caxias-RJ, uma das principais rodovias do Rio de Janeiro, com saídas rápidas para as principais vias rodoviárias do Rio de Janeiro, próximo a Avenida Brasil, Linha Vermelha, Linha Amarela, Rodovia Dutra e Centro do Rio.

Leme is a great, quiet and safe location in Rio at walking distance from Copacabana beach and with great transport connections; buses and links to Rio´s metro system. There are great bars and restaurants in the area with good food and the traditional beer.

Sugar loaf mountain is around the corner, and as Leme is the end of the Atlantic Av there´s amazing views of Copacabana and even the Christ Redeemer.

The flat is located on the second line from the beach so access to the beach is quick and safe.

The city was the capital of Brazil for nearly two centuries, from 1763 to 1815 during the Portuguese colonial era, 1815 to 1821 as the capital of the United Kingdom of Portugal, Brazil and Algarves, and 1822 to 1960 as an independent nation. Rio is nicknamed the Cidade Maravilhosa or "Marvelous City".

Rio de Janeiro is the most visited city in the southern hemisphere and is known for its natural settings, carnival celebrations, samba, Bossa Nova, balneario beaches such as Barra da Tijuca, Copacabana, Ipanema, and Leblon. Saint Roman é o principal acesso à favela e o início da subida para acesso à comunidade. Veja a nossa localização no GMaps: R. Saint Roman, ANTES de confirmar pagamento/reserva.

The space
Uma casa tradicional da década de 50, em Copacabana, foi reformada e convertida em 7 apartamentos totalmente independentes e funcionais. O estudio deste anúncio é um deles, e os proprietários vivem em outros 2, na mesma propriedade.
O estudio possui banheiro privativo e cozinha compacta com geladeira, microondas, cafeteira, torradeira, liquidificador e utensílios básicos necessários para preparar refeições simples (café da manhã e refeições rápidas), não tem fog
neighborhood_overview:
Uma casa tradicional da década de 50, em Copacabana, foi reformada e convertida em 7 apartamentos totalmente independentes e funcionais. O estudio deste anúncio é um deles, e os proprietários vivem em outros 2, na mesma propriedade.
O estudio possui banheiro privativo e cozinha compacta com frigobar, microondas, cafeteira, torradeira, liquidificador e utensílios básicos necessários para preparar refeições simples (café da manhã e refeições rápidas), não tem fogão e nem forno. A janela é voltada para um pequeno jardim verde.
No salão de acesso que leva a todos os estudios, localizado no terreo da propriedade o ambiente interior é relaxante, contrastando com a vida intensa da Rua Saint Roman, que é o principal acesso para a favela do Pavão-Pavãozinho, uma das primeiras favelas fundadas no Rio de Janeiro, há 60 anos, quando migrantes de brasileiros do norte e do nordeste vieram morar na cidade para trabalhar na construção civil da cidade. É comum ouvir música muito alta provenie
host_about:
*French version below 

We host international business & leisure travellers since 2009 - vacation and corporate housing.

Renato is the architect (responsible for the 5-story house design) and Louri is your main host, as well the manager of the place. We are the owners.

If you like outdoors sports, biking, running, swimming, hiking, climbing, stand-up paddle (SUP), or just want to try Rio in a different and original way, we are waiting for you.

Architecture & Design can connect us, as well. if you are interested to know more about architecture in Rio, we could take you deeper in this world. Renato has some cool projects in town and he will be more than happy to give you some information and guide you, if you are interested, of course.

We are Smoke-Free/Drug-Free/Drink Responsibly

Every aspect of your stay is important to us and we can tailor any request to your individual needs ensuring you have a unique experience in Rio.

We are available in English, French, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

Nous accueillons des voyageurs internationaux depuis 2009 dans le cadre de leurs déplacements professionnels ou touristiques.

Renato est l'architecte à l'origine du design et de la conception des 7 suites et Louri votre interlocuteur et manager des lieux. Nous sommes tous les deux associés et propriétaires.

Si vous aimez les sports extérieurs, vélo, course à pied, nage, randonnée, escalade, stand-up paddle ou si vous souhaitez tout simplement découvrir Rio différemment nous vous attendons!

L'architecture et le design à Rio peuvent également être des sujets d’intérêts en commun que nous pourrions vous faire découvrir plus en détail. Renato pilote actuellement plusieurs projets dans la ville qu'il serait plus que ravi de vous expliquer, si bien entendu cela vous intéresse.

Nous sommes non fumeurs, non consommateurs de drogues et peu consommateurs d'alcools.

Chaque aspect de votre séjour est important à nos yeux; c'est pourquoi nous nous efforcerons de répondre à vos attentes afin que votre expérience à Rio soit unique et inoubliable.

Nous sommes à votre disposition en Anglais, Français, Espagnol et Portugais Brésilien, bien entendu.

host_about:
My husband used to live in this apartment when he was single. That's also where we first lived when we got married 4 years ago. That's when we renovated the place. We spent a wonderful time there and we definitely have many cherrishble memories about it. 

In 2011 we spent 2 weeks in Paris in a rented apartment. We loved the experience because it was cozy, it was charming, it made us feel like we were one of the locals and it was also cheaper than a hotel. Then, later that same year we moved to another place, and based on our wonderful experience in Paris, we decided to rent our apartment.

We hope you can feel as good and have a memorable time in it, just like we did.

name: Charming Urca Apartment in Front of the Bay
description:
On the top floor of a 3-stories house of the 30ies, this 70m2, newly renovated apartment, is a little treasure with a spectacular view oft he Bay of Guanabara just across the street.

The space
Sunny, airy apartment overlooking Guanabara Bay.

Modern, clean designer, mix of old and new with decoration details that make the apartment cozy and charming. Perfect for couples accommodating up to 4 people.
  Queen bed and a comfortable sofa bed in the living room.
Area with gardener of tropical plants and net hook.
The fully equipped kitchen with crockery, family size fridge, oven and hob, electric coffee maker and all necessary cooking utensils.
In addition to a guest toilet there is a small additional toilet near the patio.

Almost every day there is a constant breeze from the bay. Living room and office with ceiling fan and air conditioning for the double bedroom.

Guest access
All the apartment
neighborhood_overview:
435/5000
Prime neighborhood of the south of Rio de Janeiro.
Beautiful landscape, contact with nature, magnificent view of Guanabara Bay, Christ the Redeemer, Niteroi, Pao de Açucar.
Meeting point for those seeking harmony with nature. Residential neighborhood with beautiful houses. Access to the beach where you can practice team sports such as kayaking, canoeing, playing volleyball, taking classes with personal coach.
5 nearby restaurants and 1 seafront bar.

name: Copacabana, Cozy and Central
description:
Living with a true "carioca" who loves the city is the best way to know Rio. I will be glad to give you tips and help you to enjoy my beloved city.
My rooms are confortable and cozy, with good quality matress and linen.
Welcome to my house!
:-)

The space
I live with my boyfriend in a spacious penthouse in the very heart of Copacabana and i rent TWO bedrooms for travelers. There is a well equiped kitchen (you may use it) and the washing machine is available. Good Wi-fi conection all around the house.

The place is cozy, near the Copacabana Beach and also to all shops, markets, bars and the subway. There is a nice veranda where you can smoke, have some drinks and meals, or just relax at the hammock. The neighborhood is safe, familiar and the building has 24 hours secutity. The rooms are very confortable and with good quality linen, as well as the towels i provide (100% cotton).
Both rooms have a nice powerful ceiling fan, air conditio
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is safe and there are many shops, restaurants and bars all around. 5 minutes walking and you are at Copacabana Beach. More 20 minutes walking and you are at Ipanema Beach. There is a very nice bakery just at the corner and the subway is two blocks away.
host_about:
Sou uma jornalista viajante inveterada e já viajei várias vezes alugando casas do Airbnb. Gosto muito mais desta forma de hospedagem do que ficar em hotel, pois assim tenho a chance de entrar em supermercados diferentes, comprar coisas diferentes e cozinhar coisas diferentes. Ou, então, de ficar em casa simplesmente, caso esteja cansada de passear, sem me sentir trancada dentro de um quarto na maioria das vezes sem personalidade.
Estarei a seu dispor para lhes dar dicas de onde ir e o que fazer, se assim o desejarem. Sou bastante comunicativa e amo minha cidade, será um prazer ajudá-los.

name: Cozy apartment located in a safe area of Rio
description:
Privileged location with excellent connectivity in an authentic, safe and trendy neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro.

Reliable and super fast internet, full furnished and well-equipped, eccentric and artistic interior. Excellent place for developing creative and concentrated work.

Everything close. Nice walking under big trees. GREEN!

The Metro is 3 blocks away and you have a taxi point downstairs the apartment, bus lines everywhere and public bikes one block away.

The space
It's a 50's apt. Original wood floor, wide walls, high roof, nice and functional spaces, modern, eccentric and artistic decoration, big cabinets and closet. No sound from the street. Second interior floor in a building of 4 floors. Very friendly concierges. You will experience the authentic Rio life of a truly Brazilian resident.

Those are the great things about the apartment. The not so good thing is that you won't get a great view from the windows, s
neighborhood_overview:
Praça São Salvador is one of the most charming Rio's squares. Full of chorinho, samba and a local market during weekends, visited by locals.
The neighborhood has become a trendy point of Rio, plenty of nice restaurants, bars, art galleries, parks and amazing architecture spots, like Palacio do Catete, the Dakota building and Palacio de Guanabara. You will feel living at the real Rio de Janeiro.
host_about: I'm a free-lance travel writer & photographer. I'm from Argentina and I lived in Rio de Janiero  from 2007 to 2017. Then I moved to Santiago, Chile, where I live now.

name: Studio no centro de Duque de Caxias
description:
Aconchegante studio equipado com mobília e utensílios para estadas curtas ou longas.

O studio fica numa residência de três andares divididas em unidades semelhantes totalmente independentes e privativas, algumas com moradores. A entrada é comum mas só você terá acesso ao seu studio.

Você será recebido(a) pelo Sávio, que mora próximo ao local e lhe dará todas as informações necessárias.

The space
Cozinha equipada com: geladeira com freezer, microondas, cafeteira, sanduicheira e liquidificador.
neighborhood_overview:
Ficamos no bairro Jardim 25 de Agosto, em frente ao Fórum de Duque de Caxias, com uma pequena praça arborizada no meio. É uma área residencial com alguns outros prédios do judiciário (MPRJ, OAB e Defensoria Pública) e Departamento de Polícia próximo. Uma área bem tranquila e segura.
Há um Carrefour a 7 minutos de distância na Av. Brigadeiro Lima e Silva, onde também há bastante comércio, bares e restaurantes.
Aos domingos, acontece uma das maiores feiras tradicionais do estado do Rio, situada em ruas próximas à casa, com comidas nordestinas, roupas, e outros artigos disponíveis .
