name: Studio em Santa Teresa/Lapa
description:
The space
Stay in a real studio restoration of artworks. Independent Studio in century-old house in the more traditional, historic and charming neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro, Santa Teresa. Located on the main street of the neighborhood, with direct access to Lapa. Security, tranquility and privacy. Garden with fruit trees and unobstructed. We received with care and attention we like to be received. We are a couple of men, (a historian and other restorative / artist), like history, music and fine arts mainly. We love our neighborhood and our city. We reject any kind of prejudice. And illicit drugs.

Our house is centenary building dated 1911, is located in the more traditional, historic and charming neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro Santa Teresa. Located on the main street of the neighborhood, with direct access to Lapa, the bohemian center of Rio with its many restaurants, bars and samba.
The property comprises an architectural one in the city of Rio de Jane
host_about:
Somos um casal, um historiador e outro restaurador/artista plástico.
Vivemos na casa dos nossos sonhos, no bairro dos nossos sonhos,
na cidade dos sonhos de muitos. Entre livros, amigos e nossos cães.
Gostamos de conhecer pessoas, fazer novas amizades, turismo cultural, gastronomia, artes plásticas, arte urbana, arquitetura...
Recebemos como gostamos de ser recebidos: com carinho, atenção e respeito.

name: Charming 2 bedroom flat in Leblon
description:
Meu espaço fica a cinco minutos a pé da Praia do Leblon e a dez minutos da Gávea e do Jardim Botânico. Aconchegante, claro e silencioso, fica pertinho do metrô Antero de Quental e do comércio, com supermercados, bares e restaurantes muito próximos - recomendo o Chico e Alaíde e a Academia da Cachaça.

O bairro é um dos mais charmosos do Rio - e também um dos mais boêmios. O apartamento é perfeito para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios e famílias (com crianças).

The space
Apartamento muito aconchegante no Leblon, perto de bares e restaurante mas localizado numa das ruas mais calmas do bairro. Próximo ao metrô e a dez minutos da praia.

Guest access
apartamento inteiro para o hóspede.

Other things to note
você vai se sentir em casa 😉

gosto tanto de viajar quanto de ficar em casa.

neighborhood_overview: A vizinhança é ótima. Ipanema tem toda comodidade de um bairro acolhedor com lindas praias, lojas, bancos, drogarias, bares, pubs e restaurantes.
host_about:
Sou organizada, não fumante, extrovertida, adoro praticar atividades  físicas e velejo em um barco de 32 pés com mais 6 tripulantes e participamos de competições em Regatas Náuticas e este é o meu esporte favorito.
Faço ginástica todos os dias em Academia e quando posso ando de bicicleta pela Orla da praia de  Ipanema ou Ciclovia na Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas.
Sou cinéfila, musicalmente eclética, adoro ler, dançar e frequentar bons restaurantes.
Também adoro viajar e conhecer novos lugares e pessoas.
Fiz algumas viagens internacionais e dentre elas estive em Nova York, Miami, Portugal, Fuengirola, Málaga, Sevilha, Madri, Buenos Aires e Paraguai, as quais aproveitei bastante e me diverti muito.

name: Rio-2 Bedroom-Minutes from it all
description:
The space
A spacious condo for rent in the wonderful city of Rio de Janeiro.

A two-bedroom condo, with a large living room and a spacious kitchen, a small office, hanging/drying area with wide windows. All furnished. Kitchen has basic appliances ( no stove): small fridge, microwave, coffee machine, blender ,juice maker, and sandwich grill. Bathroom has a spacious shower with hot water, and a bidet. Master bedroom is air conditioned.

Conveniently located within a walking distance to one of the trendiest night life, bar and restaurant areas. It is a 10-minute walk to Lapa, and in the lower part of the historic neighborhood of Santa Teresa. Public transportation, taxis, supermarkets, bakeries (we recommend for a yummy, low cost breakfast including pastries and juice or shake), and lots of small commercial stores a few meters from the building. Located in the safe historical and residential downtown area with easy access to the beaches of Copacabana (l
neighborhood_overview: A very residential area with all of its traditions, plus an intense cultural/night life with bars, restaurants and music.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Rio De Janeiro.  I speak English, Portuguese, and Spanish and am a college professor. I live in Massachusetts with my family and go to Brazil once a year.
I  like to read, write, hike and travel.  I know Rio De Janeiro like the back of my hand and can fully answer any questions concerning Brazil.

name: Suite in a beautiful house-Lagoa/RJ
description:
Very comfortable and spacious suite with some 30 m, it is on the third floor with total privacy, with balcony and a beautiful view of the Christ Statue and Tijuca forest. The bathroom is very modern and spacious, we also have a walk-in closet and the room has a queen size bed, minibar and air conditioning.

The space
The ad is for 1 suite for 2 people. We live at the above the Lagoon with views of Christ the Redeemer, Botanical Garden, Lagoa and all the Tijuca forest, the largest urban forest in the world. The House has 3 floors, and a leisure pool, kitchen with bar, all in a beautiful area of more than 200 m in front of the Christ, the suite is located on the second floor with balcony and beautiful view of Christ. queen bed air conditioning private bathroom, all well decorated, as you can see in the pictures. The whole House is very clean, with a white porcelain tiled floor. The House is very airy, it is inside the forest, often we are visited by beautiful birds,
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the Hill, it is very peaceful and safe, near all the touristic attractions, beaches, as well as restaurants, supermarkets ...
host_about: Sou uma jovem senhora mineira, casada, vim transferida a trabalho para o Rio de Janeiro no ano de 1977,   me apaixonei por esta cidade e pelo meu marido,   pretendo ficar aqui ate o dia que Deus quiser. Tenho três filhos, dois homens adultos e uma jovem de 21 anos Adoramos receber amigos, hospedes....Os dois filhos se foram e a minha  casa esta vazia, por isso resolvi dividi-la com outros.

name: Sleek, luxurious, in Copacabana
description:
Beautiful apt for rent in the heart of Copacabana.

The space
Beautiful apt for rent in the heart of Copacabana.

After many visits to this beautiful city I found that rental apts are often overpriced and poorly maintained, so I built this 34 sq meter loft apt from the ground up to be the perfect holiday retreat.

Located 100 meters from the beach in a festive neighborhood near the Copacabana Palace hotel, close to metro, theatre, gym, great restaurants, and a friendly street scene.

The apt is on the 7th floor. The bldg has a 24 hour door man, security cameras, AC, TV, acoustic windows, ceiling fan, Wifi internet, comfortable high quality queen size bed, and ample storage for clothes and luggage.

Built in the studio/ loft style with large open room and fully equipped american style kitchen.
Sleek, modern style with Brazilian antiques, marble, and mirrors.

It is easy to walk to the Sugarloaf at one end of C
neighborhood_overview:
Legendary, historic, Copacabana!
Several local street markets for fresh seafood and produce on alternating days.
Nearby parks for soaking up the local color.
Theatre across the street with live concerts.
Numerous excellent restaurants in walking distance from the apt.
I have a restaurant guide to share with my favorites.
host_about:
I am an international chef and caterer. 
I have been around the world nine times. Meeting people and experiencing new cultures is my passion.

Rio is one of my favorite cities and so I chose it for my holiday home. The spectacular setting, the people, the music, and the food make it one of the worlds great destinations. Whenever I choose a place stay, my first consideration is the location. I like to be in the center of the most interesting part of town.

I believe in offering value for money with no surprises. I think you will enjoy your stay in this beautiful apt.

Great location on Avenida Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, One Block from the Famous Copacabana Beach and One Block from the Copacabana Palace. Walking Distance to many Shops, Restaurants, Boardwalk, Parks, and Pubs. Public transportation right outside the front door and 2 blocks from the Subway.

This Top Floor Suite shares (with my customers only) a Roof Top Terrace with a Swimming Pool, Grill, Pool Table and a View of the Christ Statue, for Relaxing after a Long Day or Night or just for enjoying the sun in Rio.

The Suite has a Full Size Bed, Private Bathroom with Hot Shower, fold out Sofa/Bed, A/C, Flat Screen TV, WiFi, Security Safe, Kitchenette (w/ Refrigerator, Microwave and Induction Cooktop), Towels and Linens included.

The Suite and Building has an Open Guest Policy and 24 Hour Door

A proximidade com as praias da Barra, Grumari e Prainha fazem todo o diferencial, além da facilidade de estar perto de shoppings e vastos comércios. Os flats estão localizados em hotéis próximos às belas praias da Barra da Tijuca e das praias do Pontal, Prainha e Grumari, no Recreio dos Bandeirantes, áreas onde o mar ainda preserva suas águas cristalinas e que estão a menos de 15 minutos do centro de convenções Riocentro, da vila Olímpica, do Parque dos Atletas, do Barra Shopping, e de grandes casas de espetáculos como o HSBC Arena e o Citibank Hall.

If you are looking for a unique, classic “airbnb” home stay accommodation, off the beaten track but yet super convenient location, you can stop here!!

Someone who share a meal together or just relax and chat over a glass of wine. There is a cleaner who comes around weekly to ensure the house is always clean and tidy. The cleaning charges will be covered in the rent.

name: Heritage Apartment Room near Orchard
description:
A basic simple small room for solo traveler in a heart of Singapore's central area- with easy access to buses and MRT train- Located in a heritage district.

The space
Experience staying in Singapore's Straits Peranakan conserved unit with modern amenities.

The unit is part of a 3-storeys shop-house and an exclusive 33 - boutique apartment complex, with separate different units. This is the ground floor with a front porch and a backyard. The land title was from the British Colonial's 19th century (1841) of 999 years, and the original building was built before the World War. It has been renovated and retrofitted in 2011 with modern amenities while keeping the outside preserved.

It is suitable for a solo traveler, single traveler whom needs place to crash after exploring Singapore, or transiting to other destination.

Please note this is a small study place converted to guest room. Amenities in the room:
- This is a bright study
host_about:
I like travelling a lot, as well as good food. 

Singapore is not only a place for the future, but has an incredible rich history, which I think people should know about. Contact me if you have any questions!

name: Ensuite room, pool, near airport, expo and sutd.
description:
Cosy, spacious double room in a quiet and pleasant neighborhood. Wi-fi, tv. Big common pool and gym. 12 min. walk to suburban mall and MRT station. Also near Expo and SUTD, both about 20 min. walk. Especially great for lady travellers.

The space
Bright and spacious ensuite double room in a quiet neighbourhood. Bed is queen size.

Guest access
TV, Wi-Fi in room. Tea/ coffee, bread and butter in the pantry. Washer/ dryer is available but try not to wash everyday ok?

While simple toast is fine, no gas cooking please. Lots of food places near MRT Station and suburban mall, 10 min. walk away. Food-courts, cafes, fast-food, etc. Perhaps try local food during your short stay here? Singapore is quite known for its streets food.

By the way, I live in the house. You will have own bedroom and bathroom. You will have access to living area and pantry.

And you will have access to common external facilities such as pool
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and pleasant neighbourhood. MRT, suburban mall with big 24-hr supermarket, 12 min. walk away. Plenty of food-courts, cafes, coffee-shops and fast-food chains in and around the mall and mrt station.

name: East Coast Boutique
description:
Our premier suite is a lovely large room with high ceilings and your own private bathroom suite with bath and large walk in shower.
Situated above a great little local restaurant, café & bar - Rabbit Carrot Gun & The Trenchard Arms.

The space
Eclectic mix of modern art, contemporary and antique furniture are the foundation of this delightful large suite. High ceilings with fans, aircon and lots of light. Encapsulated in a 1925 traditionally built Singaporean shophouse, this is 1 half of a 2 bedroom apartment.

Guest access
Guests will have access to their own bedroom suite including shower facilities. In addition you have access to a shared living room with kitchenette.
neighborhood_overview:
Local temples, great places to eat and drink, 10 min walk to the beach.
Many of Singapore's major attractions are within a 10 min taxi ride including Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, Singapore National Gallery, National Stadium, Boat Quay/Clarke Quay
Further afield, Sentosa, National Museum of Singapore, Fort Canning, Orchard Road are all within a 15 min taxi ride.
host_about:
Enjoyed saving, refurbishing  and re-developing one of Singapore's heritage shophouses so much, decided to go one step further. Refurbishing another 2 shophouses nearby which includes 3 suites and an eclectic modern British restaurant - Rabbit Carrot Gun - and gastro bar - The Trenchard Arms. Been based in Singapore for 16 years, my interests are very broad and include; architecture, interior design, rugby and things culinary. 
Founding partner in a management consultancy group, international property developer, restauranteur, landlord and boutique hotelier.
All wonderful and still my proudest achievement are my two children.

name: Awesome Yellow Room in the City! Near Orchard Rd!
description:
Awesome place to stay

The space
Centrally located between 2 major green line mrt (Redhill & Queenstown), Mins to city and to most suburban location including NUS, SGH, SMU Most suitable for those intern medical or business students and working adults.

Our home is a place safe for those travelling alone and far away from home . You have an opportunity to experience local living with our family and some international housemates . its fun and exciting to be here as you read from our reiews, its a home of love and peace and happiness where everyone here is nice and considerate . So we do expect our guest to help us upkeep this tradition :)

All my rooms comes with clean sheet, single bed , (extra mattress available on request for double bed room only. ) , a study desk, cloth drawers and tastefully furnished and warm, Feel free to use the kitchen to prepare your meals and you will need to use our common bathroom and toilet.

Food outlets
host_about:
K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse 
Kay

name: Amazing Sunset Home @Central Area
description:
Home sweet home. That's exactly you will feel when you're at Yuan's cozy apartment!

Guest access
Use of the swimming pool & gym (7th Level)
neighborhood_overview: I like this neighborhood as it's famous stretch for food with Whampoa Market is just a few minutes walking distance. You can see the local market and try many famous Singapore food such as bah kut teh, chicken rice, fish steamboat, hokkien mee and chicken wings with some operating for 24 hours! There are a few great cafes around the corner, Wheeler's Yard, Non Entree Desserts, Old Hen Coffee Bar,Jewel's Cafe and Apartment
host_about:
A Malaysian living in Singapore for more than a decade.  I love to eat, cook and bake since I was from this island famed for food, Penang. During my weekends, I venture out to try new cafes and eating spots. I’m sucker for sunsets (if you’re lucky on some days, you can see beautiful sunset from my balcony), the stars, good coffee & music, road trips, clear blue sea and fine sushis. I've traveled quite a bit mostly around Asia. I prefer the road less taken, wandering around the streets because the journey is more important than the destination. My yearly resolution is to travel to a country that I've not been before. Happy to say that I am on track, visited 30 countries over 140 cities to date. I hope I am able to share my adventures with you likewise to see the world through you. Airbnb definitely helps us to fulfilled this dream of US!

*I am in the midst of putting a book together of my experience as a host for the last 8 years. It  would be nice if you would like to pre-order the book! Just write to me :)

name: Super Host Apartment
description:
A beautiful apartment conveniently located along Robertson Quay, with proximity to facilities like restaurants and night-spots. Soak in the nightlife at popular entertainment pubs and restaurants along Mohamed sultan road, Boat Quay, Clarke Quay all within walking distance.

Fully furnished with functional kitchen, 1 bedroom, 2 balconies. Do check out my guests reviews of my apartment

The space
Robertson Quay and its surrounding are safe. 24 hours self-service access to the apartment and there is a lift and staircase in the building.

Modern interior decor with a cozy ambience offers the comfort you need after a long day out exploring along Robertson and Boat Quay.

Cosy studio apartment located in a tranquil street of the Robertson Quay district, very close to Fort Canning park, Singapore River, Robertson and Boat Quay.

The place and its surrounding are safe with 24-hours surveillance CCTV. Access to the building is via
neighborhood_overview:
The accommodation is close to the Fort Canning Park and the Orchard Road shopping and entertainment belt. Close proximity to the aforementioned Orchard Road shopping belt means a myriad of amenities are available including major one-stop shopping destinations like Ion Orchard, The Paragon, Takashimaya, and Orchard Central. Alternatively, residents can head down to the nearer malls such as Great World City and UE Square. Schools, such as Chatsworth International School and the Singapore Management University, are located within reasonable driving distance. Numerous restaurants are located at the nearby Robertson Quay, Clarke Quay, and Havelock Road. In addition, Alumni Medical Centre is also in the vicinity.

The nearest MRT from the studio is indicated below:

Somerset MRT Station (0.88 km)
Clarke Quay MRT Station (1.09 km)
Chinatown MRT Station (1.1 km)
Fort Canning MRT Station (1.1km)

Kindly refer to tripadvisor of the area of Robertson

name: Deluxe Quad-sharing room
description:
A huge, spacious quad-sharing common bedroom. There's even a couch and still lots of space to spare. You can also book this room as a group and get a discount. With aircon, wifi, and fully furnished. Daily breakfast and weekly housekeeping. Light cooking allowed. Laundry facilities.

The space
Newly renovated.

Guest access
You can borrow books and boardgames from our mini library. There is also a pantry area where you can cook light meals using the toaster oven, microwave oven, induction cooker and electric kettle. There are snacks available too.

Other things to note
The house is run by a group of Catholics but open to all. We have a prayer room that is open to those who want to spend some time in quiet reflection and prayer. Above all, we seek to provide a safe, friendly and cosy environment for students.
neighborhood_overview: It's very accessible by MRT and bus to town and many parts of Singapore. It's located in historic Balestier which has it's own heritage trail. There are many shops and eateries within a short walk. You will find quaint old shops that are the last of their kind in Singapore like a traditional bakery and a coffee powder shop.

name: Life Impact Coaching
description:
An old-world sanctuary about 5 mins walk from the Kallang MRT designed to make you pause, think, and regain your centre. We are a Christian retreat house dedicated to mission, formation and service for the common good.

The space
What makes your stay with us unique? Will it be our friendly staff, freshly baked breads, shabbat soups, a safe and caring oasis in the midst of the madness outside? There is a place where you can find your purpose, discover who you are and have a whole lot of fun with new friends who speak your language.

Guest access
A prayer chapel for quiet reading, meditation and a place to think and reflect yet near enough to the city centre to connect with family and friends. Want to learn how to bake bread, pick up another language, play the piano or guitar, climb a mountain or paint a portrait of yourself, - possibilities are endless at the Secret Gardens 5:00am where sun, air, water and a good night's sleep all conspire tog
neighborhood_overview: Originally a settlement outside of the city proper 100 years ago, Geylang got its name from the "grinding" of coconut meat used by local malay housewives to thicken curries. As Singapore developed its CBD, much of the rustic lanes ('lorongs') and shophouses were left behind in the push toward modernity. This void was filled by colorful migrants speaking a variety of dialects and tongues that makes Geylang what she is today, a hodge-podge of streets crammed with all the flavors and opportunities to learn from cultures other than your own, and to taste and see all the good reasons why you chose to stay with us
host_about: Aim higher. Go further. Grow deeper.

host_about:
My husband and I have recently moved back to Singapore after living in New Zealand for 10 years. We have two older children who are both living overseas now and therefore have rooms available to let.

We were inspired to join air bnb after learning , from our daughter who have had overseas friends living in Singapore, the exceptionally high rental prices our there.

We are a friendly and quiet couple who enjoy relaxing at home in the weekends.
We would appreciate those who would treat our home like their own.

It is a private room, small, simple, clean and air-conditioned. It has a bunk bed for ONLY 3 persons, a small wall table shelf, a ceiling light and a reading light. Each room may or may not have a window or TV set, subject to availability.

The space
It has a space of at least 2m x 3m. It may have a window or a TV set. The bed type is usually a 2-decker bed. However, at times, it may be different. All requests are subject to availability. The picture is only a sample.

We have 3 fibre optics broadband networks accessible to our guests. The washing machine, clothes dryer, iron and iron board, a printer are chargeable. However, you may wash your clothes in the open basins and air dry in our drying balcony for free. There is a free hair dryer to share in the common area. name: Ladies-Only Shared Room @ Chinatown
description:
Wink is the flashpackers’ (budget) accommodation of choice, innovating beyond conventional hostels in design, quality and conveniences. Balancing both privacy (sound-resistant pods, contained lighting, private nooks) and communal space (library, lounge, kitchenette), Wink also juxtaposes its heritage building/location against its technology investments to cater to its varied guests.

The space
Each custom-made pod is uniquely put together with unmatched features:
· Custom-designed and spacious
· Sound resistant walls in-between pods
· Dedicated ambient backlight that turns on automatically to guide you to your assigned pods, without disturbing others
· Adjustable reading LED light for your glare-free reading pleasure
· Cushy back-rest
· Power socket to charge your gadgets and accessories
· Side-ledge and hook for your personal effects
· Superior 260 thread-count soft linen and sumptuous duvets
· Lockers with smartcard
neighborhood_overview:
Housed in a three-storey historic shophouse with a Chinese baroque façade, Wink exudes charm and local flavors. It resides right in Chinatown – a must-see cultural enclave of Singapore’s largest ethnic group – which is a convenient pivot to access the country’s attractions. Within minutes in the North lies Clarke Quay, a premium nightlife destination to unwind. A hop away in the South is Sentosa, an island resort getaway, and the distinctive skyline of Singapore’s Central Business District. Club Street and its bohemian vibes is an easy walk away to the East. Also in close proximity is the renowned Marina Bay Waterfront, which houses the Marina Bay Sands Integrated Resorts & Casino, and the Singapore Formula 1 Grand Prix night race circuit.

And it does not get more convenient than having Chinatown’s Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station a mere 3-minutes stroll from Wink. From here, guests easily access all of Singapore’s popular sights (and less ‘touristy’ ones too that only we re
host_about:
Housed in a historic shophouse that’s nestled in the cultural heart of Singapore, Wink is a premium Pod hostel that offers travellers private sleeping sanctums that are inviting and decked in plush designer finishing. Want to indulge in a little luxury while on a budget? Looking to meet new friends while mixing it up with fellow travellers in a friendly environment? Then Wink is perfect for you!

Our secure tap card system grants access to spacious dorms that are air-conditioned, fully carpeted and furnished with cushy couches, perfect for kicking back and just chilling with pals. Ladies dormitories are available and come complete with vanity counters. All dorms have Wi-Fi access.

You will find our custom pods come in unique designs with plentiful headroom and side-allowances, presenting you with a comfortable and individualised space that caters to your needs.

Every pod is fitted with ambient backlight, sound resistant walls, a cushy backrest, reading LED light, power socket and smartcard access locker located right at the foot. A 6 inch orthopaedic mattress draped in lush soft linen and accompanied by a sumptuous duvet rounds out the experience. 

Breakfast is served daily in our guest kitchenette that comes fully equipped with cooking hob, microwave oven, grill and refrigerator. Other facilities include showers & toilets, a relaxing café lounge, internet stations, laundry & ironing and 24 hour reception.

Centrally located in bustling Chinatown, Wink is mere minutes away from numerous must-see heritage and cultural attractions. Nearby Clarke Quay and the bohemian Club Street also serves up an exciting array of nightlife and dining destinations.

With Chinatown’s Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station and several bus-stops a short walk away, you will find Wink the perfect location from which to start exploring Singapore.

name: Private Room for 6pax @ Chinatown
description:
Our hostel is close to Chinatown. You’ll love Wink because of the Chinatown neighbourhood, it is merely 2 minutes away from the subway yet it is just 1 street away from the noise of the bustling Pagoda Street. You can rest assured of our high standard of cleanliness throughout, our comfy capsule-type beds. Privacy and security are ensured with our keycard access to your room and locker. Wink is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, groups and families.

The space
Each custom-made pod is uniquely put together with unmatched features:
· Custom-designed and spacious
· Sound resistant walls in-between pods
· Dedicated ambient backlight that turns on automatically to guide you to your assigned pods, without disturbing others
· Adjustable reading LED light for your glare-free reading pleasure
· Cushy back-rest
· Power socket to charge your gadgets and accessories
· Side-ledge and hook for your personal effects
neighborhood_overview: Housed in a three-storey historic shophouse with a Chinese baroque façade, Wink exudes charm and local flavors. And it does not get more convenient than having Chinatown’s Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station a mere 3-minutes stroll from Wink. From here, guests easily access all of Singapore’s popular sights (and less ‘touristy’ ones too that only we recommend).

name: Beautifully renovated cosy room
description:
The space
Single room at 2nd storey with Q-size bed, wardrobe and dressing table that is compact but surely cosy. With a small charge of $25.00 per night, it can accommodate a couple.

The room is just a step near a shared bathroom with another single room neighbour. At a slight premium it can be an attached.
The extra premium charge is $30.00 per night.

Very convenient with a feeder bus-stop just a few houses away that will bring you to Kembangan MRT in 7minutes.

The a running track is just as near as the busstop that can lead you to the our favourite east coast beach.

Restaurants of all kind are just within walking distant including convenience stores and supermarkets.

With the serene environment and beautiful house, it will be a place to keep your memories alive even after parting this small city state called SINGAPORE.

It is just 5 minutes drive to popular Orchard Road, Velocity Shopping Mall, Little India and the 24-hour Mustafa Shopping Centre. Changi International Airport is only a 30-minute drive away!

name: Cozy, Many Guests Loved It Here
description:
You have tranquility and convenience. The bus is just downstairs , the mrt and Hougang Mall are both 6 mins walk away. Plenty of food stalls, doctor and dentist clinics within 5 mins walk. Our house is newly renovated. I am a teacher by profession and loves to travel and host.

The space
Very clean and private

Guest access
Cable TV, wireless internet. Plenty of cheap and decent food just 3 mins walk from apartment block.

Other things to note
Exercise in natural and serene environment. There are several outdoor physical exercise stations where you can workout. There's also a river opposite and you can jog along it, hike or bike, roller-skate or fish. It goes kilometres round the north eastern part of the island.
neighborhood_overview: It's quiet, convenient, fully facilitated with amenities and just 15 mins train ride to Orchard Road.
host_about:
Dear Guests,

I am 55 and I am a teacher. I love to travel and over the years I have visited the continents. I find Prague in Eastern Europe most charming and Wanaka in New Zealand most idyllic. Being a host is an extension of my love to travel. I get to know people from different countries. Over the years, I have guests who have become my friends. My guest room is available to only one guest at a time. Besides my 26 year old son who is also a teacher, I do have Cotton. She's a friendly cat. House rules are regular, no smoking, no guests, definitely nothing illegal and light cooking only. 
We love to have you here while you are in Singapore.

Lots of value for the rent. Amenities made available to guests are the main draw. Location isn't bad either.

name: City 1-Pax Private Room, Shared Toilet
description:
Family-run hostel: Clean, comfortable and homely accommodation. Private Cabin-sized room with sharing toilet, lounge and pantry area. Rooms are partitioned with folding doors & communal air-con.

Near city, direct green line MRT train station to Changi Airport.
5 - 10 minutes walking distance to 3 MRT stations i.e. Lavender/Bendemeer/Farrer Park MRT.

You Tube video, search: "DRMaemeuP1U".
YOUKU: search “Blanc Inn Singapore"

The space
Our space is similar to train private cabin room i.e. bigger than Hostel Pods but smaller than normal room size. Furnished with standard Singapore-sized single bed for one person only. There are lockable cabinets and safe box for the safekeeping of your belongings.

Facilities:
- Common Toilets
- Communal Lounge/ Pantry.
- Air-con available
- Laundry Services (24Hr Return/ Fees applicable)
- Clothes Ironing Services
- Reception (Hours differ)
- Hot/Cold
neighborhood_overview:
In Lavender and Jalan Besar district, our neighborhood is rich in history, this area looks like it has not changed a lot since the late 1980s. Due to its proximity to the heart of the city, the Lavender area also attracts many travelers staying in the vicinity.

This neighborhood is well-developed. There are supermarkets, shopping malls and various eateries, from non-air-conditioned food courts to hippy cafes to restaurants/bars. One would be truly spoil for array of food choices available.
host_about: Hi there, My name is Peggy and my dad's Tommy. We are a father and daughter team running a hostel in Singapore. We love travelling ourselves and hosting people from all over the world. Do stay with us when you drop by Singapore, we enjoy interacting with people of diverse cultures, sharing personal experiences, travelling tips or simply anything under the sun.

name: 10 Min Walk to HawParVilla MRT - INSEAD (A)
description:
K2 Guesthouse is situated near NUS / NUH and Buona Vista. Nearest MRT is Haw Par Villa, a 15 mins walk from hotel. All rooms are beautifully furnished with complete clean linens and clean with shared bathroom.

There’s a shared lobby pantry area for sitting and mingling after work, it's a nice outdoor area for a beer after the hot weather cool off!

Please note, what you see may be different from what is given to you, we assign to our availability.

$60 a month for weekly housekeeping

The space
There is a patio/gazebo where guests can relax, eat and have a drink. Right across us there is a supermarket, asian food and bars.

Guest access
Guest’s are permitted to access these places outside their room:
- Common kitchen at the first floor lobby
- Outdoor gazebos at the first floor lobby
- Hallway / Corridor

Anywhere else is strictly not allowed and will be considered as trespassing.
neighborhood_overview:
Charming and comfortable, perfect for travelers and nature lovers. Experience the Kent Ridge and Hort Park nature walks just behind the property and see some of our British colonial heritage.

Right across us there is a supermarket, asian food and bars. Near us is Haw Par Villa, Mapletree Business Center, INSEAD, NUS and NUH.

1-2 minutes walk to the bus stop.
host_about:
K2 Guesthouse is designed for guests who want a truly local experience with local people. Experience eating local food in a local home away from home! 

We love meeting new people, exchanging cultures, food, language and most of all spending some time in the evening after work to relax with a glass of wine or a can of beer when the weather becomes unbearable!

Read my reviews and when you get here, ask for the guest book, you will get to know heaps of great friends across the globe! 

Also - Finally being an Airbnb host since 2011, we obtained our Hotel License to legally operate in Singapore for short term stays!

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate all our faithful long term guests who have stayed and support us during all these years.  Please come back to experience our the new K2 Guesthouse at South Buona Vista. 

We'd love to have you with us :) 

K2 guesthouse 
Kay

name: Central quiet serviced master bedroom (>3 months)
description:
Fully-furnished master bedroom w attached bathroom in centrally-located large designer flat.
For a professional seeking the convenience of residing in the heart of Singapore, walking distance from transport, shops & malls, restaurants & bars, park.

Minimum 3 months duration and preference for longer arrangement.

The space
Quiet and bright (large window overlooking the tree lined back of the condo, window in bathroom)
Pleasantly furnished with large glass desk, armchair, full size cupboard and lots of shelf space.
160x200 cm comfortable bed

Bathroom has full bath and shower attachment
Halogen down-lights in both rooms (with dimmer in bedroom)
Recent air con unit (extra quiet) and ceiling fan

Guest access
Fully equipped kitchen, microwave, oven, gas hob, fridge/freezer, stainless steel counter
Pantry equipped with washer/dryer, at the back (balcony area)
Store for suitcase, sports equi
neighborhood_overview: In the heart of Orchard downtown, next to shopping malls, food courts, 24/7 supermarket, the lively restaurants/bars of Emerald Hill, Clarke Quay, Robertson Quay, as well as Fort Canning Park, museums etc

name: Cozy 1 BD linked to MRT (Heartland)
description:
Feel right at home! 1BD with attached Bathroom has 100% privacy. Location of the apt is conveniently linked to the Subway, local food court( Hawker centres), a mall & supermarkets.
Experience the locals' & neighbourhood's livelihood & atmosphere.

The space
Cozy 1 BD with attached bathroom.
- Recent newly renovated bathroom and refurbished bedroom.
- The room is ideal for 1 person stay. Extra person possible but it will be sleeping on floor mattress with additional $15 nett charge per night
- Free Fibre optic Wi-Fi
- Shower Amenities provided
- Bath towels provided
-Located on the top floor with bird's eye view of neighbourhood(at Balcony ONLY)
-Be greeted by our mascot: a Golden Retriever (Sky)when you take your first step in.

Guest access
-Security keycard
-A fitness gym
-Swimming pools w/ jacuzzi
-Sauna
-Steam Bath
-A Basketball Court
- 2 Tennis Courts
- A Fit
neighborhood_overview:
Living, eating and fashion. Not a worry. Heartland Mall is located right accross the road, along with a supermarket, conveniece stores and restaurants that cater to any and every individual's taste. Along the same stretch of road to the APT, more Cafes and restaurants await your (website hidden).
A Bak Kuht Teh ( Local Pork's bone soup) Restaurant runned by ex-prisoners (totally worth visiting)
-All time Favourite with locals: Punggol Nasi lemak
-Old School Hawker Centre with famous -Wanton Noodles.
Lola's Cafe- Known for it's tech savvy reservation system
Ice Edge Cafe- Homemade ice cream with eccentric flavours such as Salted Egg, Bak Kwa etc
Dominoe's, Pizza Hut, McDonald's, KFC,
-Bakeries: Both traditional and modern
-A DURIAN store.
Healthcare:
Several Clinics and pharmacies available 5 min away.
host_about:
I am a avid traveller as am in the profession of hospitality and tourism.

A person who likes to meet new people but of course during your stay, it will be 100% privacy as I have my own room.  As an animal lover, there are 2 furry kids in the apt but no worries they are very friendly.  Also, not to worry as I do keep my place clean, and they will not enter your room unless you allow them to.  Therefore, it is important to dispose your daily gabbage, and do not leave any before you depart.

Drop me a mail should you have further queries of the room or others.

name: Private Room - min.6months
description:
Private room with 2 single beds, shared wardrobe, common toilet, minimum 6 months rental

4 bus stops / 25mins walk from Pasir Ris MRT.
4 bus stops / 15 min walk from e!Hub@Downtown East, public swimming pool and gym

The space
DOCUMENTS REQUIRED:
Upon check-in, kindly give us a copy of the personal particulars page of your passport and also the valid traveling Visa entry permit if applicable.

ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE:
Airport pick up and departure, two ways, fee is SG$40 or SG$25 for single trip. You can take a taxi from airport to our place for about SG$12 to $25 depending on the timing.

Guest access
Air-conditioning is limited to 8 hours per day.
You can use the washer to wash your clothes twice a week.
TV is available in common room.
No cooking except for instant meals, you can use the dining table for your meals

Other things to note
We have a small dog staying
neighborhood_overview:
Pasir Ris is a quiet neighbourhood at the far east of Singapore with a Mall at the Mrt area, consisting of a supermarket, library, bookstore, lots of retail outlets and sufficient Fast food restaurants, eg. KFC, Burgerking, McDonalds, etc.
There's a sports hall nearby with swimming pool and tennis court.
Catch a movie or Bowl at Downtown East!

description:
Ideally located steps away from Chinatown MRT Station. Find a wide range of local food and shopping at your fingertips. There are also many money changers and tour agencies in this area.

> 4 stops to Orchard Road.
> 2 stops to Harbourfront (Sentosa)
> 2 stops from Little India
> 3 stops to Marina Bay Sands.
> An easy stroll to nightlife of Clarke Quay (1 stop).

* CONTACT US DROP TO ENQUIRE ABOUT FEMALE DORMS OR PRIVATE ROOMS. We respond within 12 hours. *

The space
Our Mixed Dormitory has 12/13 beds. Your bed has a charging point and bed light. A personal locker is provided for your valuables. (Do bring along your own padlock). Shower gel/shampoo and toilet paper provided. Laundry service is available for a fee.

Complimentary coffee & tea during reception hours. Complimentary cereal and toast during breakfast hours (8am to 1030am). Hot and cold water dispenser.

Same-day luggage storage for early c
neighborhood_overview: Immerse yourself in Singapore's rich Chinese Heritage and Culture. Explore streets and lanes like Chinatown Food Street, where you can taste Hainanese chicken rice, noodles and satay. Check out souvenir shops and indie boutiques, offering clothes, crafts and antiques. Nearby, Club Street boast trendy eateries and wine bars. Stop by the famous Sri Mariamman Temple and the ornate Buddha Tooth Relic Temple and Museum.
host_about: As backpackers, we believe in cheap and affordable lodging as part of every backpacker's goal to stretch every dollar's worth in our mission to explore the world. That is why we provide simple accommodation at reasonable prices for sufficient facilities/amenities. Find out more about us in our photos, website, social media pages ["royalhostelsingapore"] or simply drop us a message/email if you have any questions :)

There are near mosques, temples, churches, museums, Chinatown,  and Little India.

name: City 1-Pax Private Room, Shared Toilet
description:
Family-run hostel: Clean, comfortable and homely accommodation. Private Cabin-sized room with sharing toilet, lounge and pantry area. Rooms are partitioned with folding doors & communal air-con.

Near city, direct green line MRT train station to Changi Airport.
5 - 10 minutes walking distance to 3 MRT stations i.e. Lavender/Bendemeer/Farrer Park MRT.

You Tube video, search: "DRMaemeuP1U".
YOUKU: search “Blanc Inn Singapore"

The space
Our space is similar to train private cabin room i.e. bigger than Hostel Pods but smaller than normal room size. Furnished with standard Singapore-sized single bed for one person only. There are lockable cabinets and safe box for the safekeeping of your belongings.

Facilities:
- Common Toilets
- Communal Lounge/ Pantry.
- Air-con available
- Laundry Services (24Hr Return/ Fees applicable)
- Clothes Ironing Services
- Reception (Hours differ)
- Hot/Cold
neighborhood_overview:
In Lavender and Jalan Besar district, our neighbourhood is rich in history, this area looks like it has not changed a lot since the late 1980s. Due to its proximity to the heart of the city, the Lavender area also attracts many travelers staying in the vicinity.

This neighbourhood is fairly well-developed. Within the vicinity are supermarkets, shopping malls and various eateries, from non-air-conditioned food courts to hippy cafes to restaurants/bars. One would be truly spoilt for array of food choices available.
host_about: Hi there, My name is Peggy and my dad's Tommy. We are a father and daughter team running a hostel in Singapore. We love travelling ourselves and hosting people from all over the world. Do stay with us when you drop by Singapore, we enjoy interacting with people of diverse cultures, sharing personal experiences, travelling tips or simply anything under the sun.

description:
Ideally located steps away from Chinatown MRT Station. Find a wide range of local food and shopping at your fingertips. There are also many money changers and tour agencies in this area. Complimentary wi-fi and daily local breakfast (food only) is included.

> 4 stops to Orchard Road.
> 2 stops to Harbourfront (Vivocity and Sentosa)
> 2 stops from Little India
> 3 stops to Marina Bay Sands.
> A short walk to vibrant nightlife of Clarke Quay

* We also have FEMALE DORMS & PRIVATE ROOMS. *

The space
Your bed has a charging point and bed light. A personal locker is provided for your valuables. Please bring along your own padlock. Shower gel/shampoo and toilet paper provided. Laundry service is available for a fee.

Complimentary coffee & tea during reception hours. Hot and cold water dispenser. Daily breakfast of toast and cereal is offered from 8am to 1030am.

Same-day luggage storage for early check-ins
neighborhood_overview: Immerse yourself in Singapore's rich Chinese Heritage and Culture. Explore streets and lanes like Chinatown Food Street, where you can taste Hainanese chicken rice, noodles and satay. Check out souvenir shops and indie boutiques, offering clothes, crafts and antiques. Nearby, Club Street boast trendy eateries and wine bars. Stop by the famous Sri Mariamman Temple and the ornate Buddha Tooth Relic Temple and Museum.
host_about: As backpackers, we believe in cheap and affordable lodging as part of every backpacker's goal to stretch every dollar's worth in our mission to explore the world. That is why we provide simple accommodation at reasonable prices for sufficient facilities/amenities. Find out more about us in our photos, website, social media pages ["royalhostelsingapore"] or simply drop us a message/email if you have any questions :)

name: Within a stone's throw from Orchard
description:
The apartment offers a perfect base for visitors who need quick access to the city centre as well as options to explore all corners of the island. Located within a 3 minute walk to major shopping centers, supermarkets, food courts and restaurants.

The space
Cosy and homely. Guests can enjoy their own en suite bathroom and many other amenities.

Guest access
Kitchen - Gas stove, refrigerator, microwave, washing machine.
Ensuite bathroom, Air conditioning, Wifi.
Swimming pool, gym, table tennis table.

Other things to note
I am not usually home during working hours.
neighborhood_overview:
- 3 mins walk to United Square shopping mall.
- 3 minute walk to the bus stop and an 8-minute bus ride away from Orchard.
- Near major shopping centers, supermarkets, restaurants and eating establishments.
host_about:
I have been living and working in Singapore for a little over 4 years.
This is a new AirBnB account, although I have been using the website for a while and have enjoyed staying in many places around the world, as well as hosting many great guests.
From here in Singapore I have had the pleasure of visiting other great destinations in Asia such as Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand and Malaysia. 
My hobbies include travel, playing guitar, catching up with friends, skateboarding, live music shows and nerdy things like maths and chess. 
Upon greeting my guests I give them resources and useful information about places to eat, transport and attractions. I speak English, Bulgarian and a little Russian. I honestly think there is plenty to do in Singapore, you can easily pack a week full of activities! My presence at home is somewhat limited due to my job, but I thoroughly enjoy having people over to share their stories and experiences.

name: Heritage Collection on Seah Premium Loft
description:
Centrally located in City Hall, this apartment is a stone's throw away from the Suntec Convention Centre, Raffles Hotel, National Library and Raffles City Shopping Centre. Perfect for business and leisure travellers!

Apartment size: Approximately 190 sqft

Booking policy: The booking is strictly non-amendable.

The space
Newly renovated loft type space. It is fully furnished with modern and luxurious fittings. It is a self-contained apartment with the bed on an upper loft deck, separated from the living space for additional privacy. There is a fully equipped kitchenette ideal for light cooking. The bathroom comes equipped with European rain shower for a spa-like experience! There is also an Apple TV or Cable TV connected to the TV for guest's enjoyment.

The photos used in the listing are of a sample apartment in the building, and may not reflect the actual apartment that will be allocated subjected to availability. The allocated
neighborhood_overview: Cityhall is located just minutes from the Central Business District and a stone’s throw away from the Suntec Convention and Exhibition Centre. A short stroll away from popular shopping malls and various food places, Cityhall is the place to be for an exciting and convenient stay in Singapore.
host_about:
Hi everyone! 

We are the management team behind Heritage Collection! We offer clean and well-maintained accommodation in the heart of Singapore's Central Business District. Experience living in a lovingly conserved Heritage building equipped with modern amenities!

We have a dependable Guest Experience team comprising our Guest Experience Managers, housekeepers, and maintenance technicians who will try their best to respond promptly to your needs.

If your first listing choice is not available for your dates of stay, please do check out our many other listings or send us a message to enquire!  We also welcome long-term apartment stays for our business travellers.

Do check out the reviews from our past guests and contact us should you have any further enquiries!

There are no strangers, only friends we haven't met yet. We would love to host you!

Cheers,
Heritage Collection

Surrounded by 3 mrt stations, 2mins Telok Ayer, 5mins Chinatown & 7mins Raffles Place. Restaurants right at your doorstep! Perfect for single, couple, business Travelers.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
Modern classic charm with a quirky twist

A short stroll away from Chinatown, Raffles Place and Shenton Way leads the curious wanderer to a charming little area of colourful shopfronts, old window shutters and streetlamps from an era long ago. Club Street, once the home ground of traditional Chinese clan associations and exclusive social clubs, now hosts a variety of quirky shops, cafes and watering holes – making it the perfect place to while the day away. Besides pastry/confectionery shops, wine bars, vintage clothing outlets, retro toy stores, alfresco restaurants and the like, be mesmerized by beautiful architecture and elegantly-restored classic details that are bound to draw out the creative shutterbug in you.
host_about: Providing Expat accommodation. neighborhood_overview:
Everyone loves my home, as it is not in the crowded town center, but within easy reach, in a generally peaceful and "quiet" neighbourhood.
I'm on a High floor, nice and breezy with an unblocked view, lots of local food shops nearby, fresh-market, two 24-hr supermarkets, bakery, clinic, professional dry-cleaners, 24hr coin-operated laundry shop, hawker food center.
You'll enjoy GOOD LOCAL FOOD at great prices, there's even a 24hr fast food outlet nearby... you'll never go hungry here !!

The Central Nature Reserve and the TREETOPS Canopy Walk is just a 20 min walk away, and Bishan Park is just across the road at the back of my place, with lush greenery and a meandering stream to enjoy an evening stroll or just to watch the sunset from the Lotus pond. There's a good jogging track and public
fitness equipment too.
There is a public swimming pool a short walk down avenue 1 (2 bus stops).
There are two 24hour GYMs, Anytime Fitness and GYMBOXX a short w

I'm Eco-Friendly and do my best to recycle and be energy efficient in my home,  to protect and save the environment.

CYA  Soon !!

host_about:
Hi everyone! 

We are the management team behind Heritage Collection! We offer clean and well-maintained accommodation in the heart of Singapore's Central Business District. Experience living in a lovingly conserved Heritage building equipped with modern amenities!

We have a dependable Guest Experience team comprising our Guest Experience Managers, housekeepers, and maintenance technicians who will try their best to respond promptly to your needs.

If your first listing choice is not available for your dates of stay, please do check out our many other listings or send us a message to enquire!  We also welcome long-term apartment stays for our business travellers.

Do check out the reviews from our past guests and contact us should you have any further enquiries!

There are no strangers, only friends we haven't met yet. We would love to host you!

Cheers,
Heritage Collection

name: Cat Lovers: Quaint Vintage House
description:
An original landed house with vintage furnitures. The simple garden with tropical fruit trees re-enact the good old 'kampong' days when Singapore was still a tiny farming village. A rare authentic experience in a modern city. Purrfect for cat lovers.

The space
A rustic 2-storey house located in peaceful residential neighbourhood. The original house have not be re-built since 1960s. An unique experience in an urban city of Singapore.

The house has a front and back yard. I have a mini BBQ pit, guests are welcomed to use.

The house is spacious, can fit a lot of people, but I prefer to give more personal attention to guests, hence I can accommodate 2-3 guests at each time.

Guests are welcome to enjoy the house in a reasonable way.

I am an entrepreneur in creative industry, working from home mainly. I enjoy meeting new people, and will be happy to hang out a bit depending on my schedule.

In Singapore, due to lan
neighborhood_overview:
In Singapore, due to land scarcity, only 2% of the residential properties are landed housing.

The neighbourhood is located in an older residential estate. It has a famous night hawker with authentic local Chinese fares. One the other side of the neighbourhood, there are popular Malay/Indian eateries. Both within 10 minutes walk.

There is a wine bar, gastrobar and a fantastic Japanese buffet within walking distance.

The house is located near the airport, about 15 minutes drive.
host_about:
I am 100% pure cat lover, an entrepreneur, a drinker, cigar smoker. I am born and bred 100% Singaporean, who speak perfect Singlish. (Singlish is a mix of various local languages and dialects, that give the language a deeper meaning.) I love travelling and have been to 5 continents. My favourite destination is China, been there 6 times and still wanting to go back for more. 

I appreciate good food, and will be glad to reveal the secret locations of real authentic local food. (I dislike commercial craps!) And maybe join my guests for dinner sometime.

name: HVIr2-Holland Village Condo
description:
Swoop into Singapore’s alluring “Bohemian” enclave right in the heart of Holland Village. A hot spot for expatriates around the world, our modernly designed apartments, situated just beside Holland Village MRT and major bus-stops, features amenities that allow you to sit back, relax and take a breather.

The space
The humble abode maintains its historic British Colonial flavour with its cool green exterior, while holding true to a classic elegance throughout its interior. The impeccably clean and spacious room features a queen sized bed, a work table, fresh linens, towels, spare toiletries, all fully provided for. Also stocked with all the cookware, dishware, kitchen towels, and condiments, our kitchen is ready for you to whip up budget friendly meals when you are not out enjoying our fine local restaurants. Fully equipped with Optic Fibre Internet, work and play has never been made this easy!

Situated directly beside Holland Village Mrt and two major b
neighborhood_overview:
Amenities across the road include: 24hr operated food center, a multitude of cafés, bars, offering a wide variety of cuisines (Italian, Mediterranean, Chinese, Mexican, Japanese, Korean). You name it, we have it!

Nearby Jalan Merah Saga offers additional restaurants, baking shops and a little art galleries. Locals Supermarkets- Cold Storage & NTUC run all hours making late night grocery shopping possible.

All of Singapore's local banks, (DBS, OCBS, HSBC, Maybank, UOB) can be found across the road, allowing foreigners to set up a bank account in Singapore if needed.
host_about:
I am a true-blue Singaporean in my mid 20's with a hearty appetite for life. I love travelling, meeting new people and strongly believe that Singapore is a fantastic place to be, whether be it for work or travel. Having hosted since the early days of Airbnb, I am fairly experienced with this site but continuously endeavor to learn more from the people I come into contact with. Whether you are new to Airbnb and trying out this platform for the very first time, or a seasoned traveler, I hope to make your experience here in Singapore an exceptional one. 

All my apartments are meticulously maintained to a very high standard and each room is professionally cleaned by my dedicated housekeeping team. I am supported by an exceptional group of people and we look forward to making your stay a flawless one. Drop me a message anytime you have a question about Singapore and I’ll do my very best to answer them! 

Safe travels everybody! 

Rebekah Chua

name: HVIr1-Holland Village Condo, 1 min away from MRT
description:
Term - minimum 90 days stay ( URA compliance)
Swoop into Singapore’s alluring “Bohemian” enclave right in the heart of Holland Village. A hot spot for expatriates around the world, our modernly designed apartments, situated just beside Holland Village MRT and major bus-stops, features amenities that allow you to sit back, relax and take a breather. Term of Stay - 90 Days

The space
The humble abode maintains its historic British Colonial flavour with its cool green exterior, while holding true to a classic elegance throughout its interior. The impeccably clean and spacious room features a super-single bed, a work table, fresh linens, towels, spare toiletries, all fully provided for. Also stocked with all the cookware, dishware, kitchen towels, and condiments, our kitchen is ready for you to whip up budget friendly meals when you are not out enjoying our fine local restaurants. Fully equipped with Optic Fibre Internet, work and play has never been made this ea
neighborhood_overview:
Amenities across the road include: 24hr operated food center, a multitude of cafés, bars, offering a wide variety of cuisines (Italian, Mediterranean, Chinese, Mexican, Japanese, Korean). You name it, we have it!

Nearby Jalan Merah Saga offers additional restaurants, baking shops and a little art galleries. Locals Supermarkets- Cold Storage & NTUC run all hours making late night grocery shopping possible.

All of Singapore's local banks, (DBS, OCBS, HSBC, Maybank, UOB) can be found across the road, allowing foreigners to set up a bank account in Singapore if needed.
host_about:
I am a true-blue Singaporean in my mid 20's with a hearty appetite for life. I love travelling, meeting new people and strongly believe that Singapore is a fantastic place to be, whether be it for work or travel. Having hosted since the early days of Airbnb, I am fairly experienced with this site but continuously endeavor to learn more from the people I come into contact with. Whether you are new to Airbnb and trying out this platform for the very first time, or a seasoned traveler, I hope to make your experience here in Singapore an exceptional one. 

All my apartments are meticulously maintained to a very high standard and each room is professionally cleaned by my dedicated housekeeping team. I am supported by an exceptional group of people and we look forward to making your stay a flawless one. Drop me a message anytime you have a question about Singapore and I’ll do my very best to answer them! 

Safe travels everybody! 

Rebekah Chua

(We have different location and other options for Immediate lease if you can’t find your dates in this listing, please contact us directly for availability)

Enjoy a cosy stay in beautiful heritage conservation house just 15mins away from central. 7mins walk to Farrer Park MRT, Mustafa,City Square mall. Fully furnished studio with your own kitchen, bathroom and services provided.
Perfect for single, couple, business Travelers and family.

The space
Fully furnished studio, comes with your own private bathroom, kitchen, washer & dryer. you do not need to share with other guests, enjoy full privacy in your own space. Accommodate maximum 4 pax. queen bed with full bed set for 2 person and a big sofa bed sleeps comfortably for 2 person (extra bed set provided for sofa bed)

(Size)
neighborhood_overview:
Farrer Park is a historic neighbourhood in the central part of Singapore, known for its rich culture and good food. It is also highly accessible by bus, train or car and can get you to the Central Business District in less than 20 minutes. This location provides travellers with the option of being close to the bustling city district while still keeping to a very affordable cost. It is a 7 minutes walk to the Farrer Park MRT, and 5 minutes walk to the nearest bus stop.

The following landmarks can be reached in under 20 minutes by train:

Dhoby Ghaut (Orchard Road) – 10 minutes

City Square Mall – 8 min walk (supermarket, cinema, eateries)

Mustafa 8 mins walk (24 hours shopping mall)

Raffles City – 15 minutes

Raffles Place – 20 minutes

Marina Bay – 20 minutes
host_about: Providing Expat accommodation. All Serviced Studios comes with fully furnished, fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer in your own space, personal bathroom and complementary services: utilities, high speed wifi, cable TV, once a week Housekeeping, monthly maintenance. Numerous studios available in central CBD and North Central areas please check out our main profile for more options. Suitable for long term or company leases! Late check-in available!

name: Room with attached bathroom, 1min to Holland V MRT
description:
Swoop into Singapore’s alluring “Bohemian” enclave situated right in the heart of Holland Village. A hot spot for expatriates around the world, our modern apartments, situated just beside Holland Village MRT and two major bus-stops, features amenities that allow you to sit back, relax and take a breather.

The space
90 days of minimum stay (URA compliant)
The humble abode maintains its historic British Colonial flavour with its cool green exterior, while holding true to a classic elegance throughout its interior. The impeccably clean and spacious room features a Queen Sized bed, a work table, fresh linens, towels, spare toiletries, all fully provided for. Also stocked with all the cookware, dishware, kitchen towels, and condiments, our kitchen is ready for you to whip up budget friendly meals when you are not out enjoying our fine local restaurants. Fully equipped with Optic Fibre Internet, work and play has never been made this easy!

Situated dire
neighborhood_overview:
Amenities across the road include: 24hr operated food center, a multitude of cafés, bars, offering a wide variety of cuisines (Italian, Mediterranean, Chinese, Mexican, Japanese, Korean). You name it, we have it!

Nearby Jalan Merah Saga offers additional restaurants, baking shops and a little art galleries. Locals Supermarkets- Cold Storage & NTUC run all hours making late night grocery shopping possible.

All of Singapore's local banks, (DBS, OCBS, HSBC, Maybank, UOB) can be found across the road, allowing foreigners to set up a bank account in Singapore if needed.
host_about:
I am a true-blue Singaporean in my mid 20's with a hearty appetite for life. I love travelling, meeting new people and strongly believe that Singapore is a fantastic place to be, whether be it for work or travel. Having hosted since the early days of Airbnb, I am fairly experienced with this site but continuously endeavor to learn more from the people I come into contact with. Whether you are new to Airbnb and trying out this platform for the very first time, or a seasoned traveler, I hope to make your experience here in Singapore an exceptional one. 

All my apartments are meticulously maintained to a very high standard and each room is professionally cleaned by my dedicated housekeeping team. I am supported by an exceptional group of people and we look forward to making your stay a flawless one. Drop me a message anytime you have a question about Singapore and I’ll do my very best to answer them! 

Safe travels everybody! 

Rebekah Chua

name: Simple & Cozy 1 BD resort-like apt
description:
Guests can enjoy resort living at Parc Rosewood with full condominium facilities. There is a wide variety of good food, shopping and entertainment around the vicinity and the transport hub for the precinct is only a 10-minute walk away.

The space
Parc Rosewood is a development (ready in Aug 2014) of 15 blocks of 5-storey residential building with basement carpark, 10 swimming pools and full condominium facilities. You will be staying in my cozy one-bedroom apartment with patio on the ground floor.

You will be surrounded by a wide variety of good food, shopping and entertainment at Causeway Point Shopping Mall, Woodlands Civic Plaza, Woodgrove Food Centre & Market, Plaza 888 Food Centre & Market.

The transport hub for the precinct is only a 10-minute walk away, and it is very accessible to major expressways if you are driving. It is also near the Causeway to Johor Bahru, should you wish to make a day trip to visit our neighbour, Malaysia. If
neighborhood_overview:
My cozy and peaceful little suburban apartment is located in the upper north of Singapore, near the Causeway to Johor Bahru, the Zoo, Night Safari, Bird Park, the Science Centre and the Discovery Centre. You and your family may wish take a 20-minute short bus trip to visit our Malaysian neighbour, or visit the tourist highlights I have mentioned. If you would like to see the Singaporean countryside, you can enjoy the beauty and serenity at the Kranji Countryside (goat farm, frog farm, ornamental fish aquarium, vegetable farm, etc) and the Sungei Buloh WetLand Nature Reserve. For shopping, there are nice heartland shopping malls along the nearby MRT stations (Yishun, Choa Chu Kang, Bukit Batok, Jurong East, Boon Lay, Ang Mo Kio). Do ask me for more information.

Traveling downtown to Orchard Road, City Hall, Marina Bay takes about an hour by train.

Hope to host you soon! ☺
host_about:
I am a single Singaporean lady who likes travelling, good food and good music.  And of course, my lovely dog. :-)

I am a rather easy-going person and I would love to be your friend. So do let me know more about you and your family (and friends) if you would like to book my apartment.   

Hope to host you in Singapore! :-)

description:

neighborhood_overview: Bukit Timah is the most desired area for living in Singapore as it has great access to national parks and natural reserves, as well as heritage places and local amenities.
host_about:
Hi, This is David, I am an architect and university lecturer to teach architecture and design etc. I am definitely a tea person and I love design, travel, photography and meeting new friends. I know Singapore so well and so I am very happy to share with you whatever I know about the lion city, we call the little dot on the equator. 
I have now been living at Singapore for seven years now and I refurbished my design studio at Sixth Avenue in Bukit Timah, one of the most desired living places in the whole Singapore island. My place is super close to MRT about 50meters away. Close by the studio, it has a lot of local eateries, supermarket and 7-11 stores, pub as well. I also get the fiber WiFi installed in the whole studio for you to surf freely. Please do find the suitable bedrooms (Tatami room, single room and double room) for yourself and let me know your bookings if travel to Singapore. 
As to UK, I am sure you will love to stay in my newly furnished 3-bedroom cozy house for your stay in South Yorkshire to explore this steel city and typical English countryside. welcome your Long or short stay, please do not hesitate to contact me via (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)ngapore) or (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)(UK). I am looking forward to welcoming you soon with a cup of Tea.

大家好,我是David。歡迎您來到新加坡。我是在新加坡的一名大學講師,教授建築學方面的設計和理論。我喜歡設計,旅行,攝影和交友。同時我是一個愛茶人,因而新加坡的工作室可以給您提供一些在茶文化方面的獨特體驗。我在新加坡工作生活六年,我在武吉知馬路的工作室位置非常便利,可以給您在新加坡的出行住宿提供更多特性化的選擇。我在英國謝菲爾德的一套聯排別墅也才裝修好,隨時歡迎您和您家人朋友的光臨。長期入住請直接聯繫我(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)(新加坡)或者(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)(UK)。非常期待和您的會面,備茶以候。謝謝光臨。

Less than 6/7 dollars) Direct buses infront of the Condo along the main road to anywhere you need to go! (Direct to Orchard, CBD, Clarke Quay, only 5-10mins!)

- In Between 2 MRT Stations (Novena & Toa Payoh)

- Full of eateries and hidden gems. Balestier Market is 5 minutes walk from the condo, and is full of local flavors!

- Speaking of Flavors, Singapore is famous for its Chicken Rice, and there are TWO famous outlets, one just beside the condo at Loy Kee Chicken Rice, the other beside Balestier Market called Boon Tong Kee. Yumz!

- Shaw Plaza (just beside the apartment) has a cinema which houses the latest movies (movies in Singapore are cheap) plus it has a grocery store, pharmacy and other dining options!

- 24 Hour Gym is just around the corner (Fitness First) If not treadmills a
host_about:
Hi Everyone! 

If you're a student, or a young professional looking for a somewhere which is better than a hostel, but cheaper than a hotel, you've come to the right place!

4 rooms in total (in the same place) And 1 studio condo available!

I am always a message/phone call away should you have any questions about the apartment or Singapore in general (From the tourist sites, general knowledge of Singapore, where to unwind and relax etc)

neighborhood_overview:
Far at the other end of the dying red-light district of Geylang, is a peaceful, simple and conveniently located private apartment. Away from the blare of urbanization and traffic, yet close to the proximity of amenities, you are just less than 2-minute walk to Paya Lebar MRT (which is the interchange of East-West Line and Circle Line), several commercial malls/premises (PLQ, Singpost, Paya Lebar Square, Kinex, City Plaza, Tanjong Katong Complex and Grandlink Square), and all major supermarkets (2 NTUC FairPrice, 1 NTUC Finest, 1 Giant and 1 Hao).

Thanks to its awesome location and Singapore’s well-networked public transportation, you can reach the famous Old Airport Road Hawker Centre at Dakota (in approx. 3 mins), Bedok Interchange Hawker Centre or Bedok Mall at Bedok (in approx. 6 mins), nex mall at Serangoon (in approx. 8 mins), Bugis Junction or National Library (in approx. 8 mins), Raffles City at City Hall (in approx. 10 mins), core of CBD at Raffles Place (in approx.

neighborhood_overview: Our condo is located in a quiet part of Singapore and yet accessible to public transport options such as buses and MRT stations that are all walking distances away. Or if you are feeling lazy, there's a local coffeeshop 2min walk from the condo and another 2min brings you to a supermarket across the road. Else, walk to Star Vista where there are plenty of food options and shopping!

name: Queensway Cozy Room, Convenient with Nice View! 4
description:
A cozy single room in a private shared apartment situated above Queensway Shopping Centre! Perfect for Interns/Short Term Stay to Singapore

Beautiful views outside of natural tropical forest treetops, with the convenience of city living!

Plenty of Food Options around! Amenities a plenty!

The space
Cozy Relaxing Room in the outskirts of the city with a double bunk bed and basic furnishings.

The apartment is shared and has a feeling of a high end dorm. However privacy is ensured, and there are only friendly flat mates to assist you should you need to know anything about the surrounding area.

Guest access
Kitchen, Bathrooms, Laundry Area

Other things to note
- The apartment has a total of 5 rooms
- Highspeed 1GB wifi!
- Daily Cleaning provided to common areas within apartment
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated above Queensway Shopping Centre, it is super convenient, there are many sports shops which sell cheap sports items, there is also a 24 hour gym and fast food outlet (we don't recommenx doing both at the same time haha)

At the Cross Junction below the apartment, there is IKEA (to buy small stuff to make your stay as personalised as you want),

Anchorpoint across the street, which has a supermarket (Cold Storage), Pharmacy (Watsons) many restaurants and even a food court!

You also have Alexandra Village, where you can try local delights such as Chicken Rice, Satay, Prata and many many more delights!

Newly opened across the road is a Shopping Centre/Hotel as well with a Pub.

Sentosa and Resorts World are only 5 mins away by cab! You also will get to stop at Vivo City which is the biggest mall in Singapore!

Hort Park and Treetops Walk are only 5 mins away by walking
host_about:
Hi Everyone! 

If you're a student, or a young professional looking for a somewhere which is better than a hostel, but cheaper than a hotel, you've come to the right place!

4 rooms in total (in the same place) And 1 studio condo available!

I am always a message/phone call away should you have any questions about the apartment or Singapore in general (From the tourist sites, general knowledge of Singapore, where to unwind and relax etc)

I'm a very friendly albeit busy guy who has made friends with my guests, so don't treat me as a landlord who just ensures the place is clean and safe, I'm a friend.

Hope to hear from you soon!

host_about:
I'm currently a student in NTU, studying EEE. Would like to meet people and travel around! I've been to Malaysia(Johor Bahru, Melaka, Genting highland, Pengang), Thailand(Danok), China(Beijing, Hong Kong, Macau, Shenyang, Harbin), Russia (Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Vladimir, Suzdal, Nizhny Novgorod)......

I spend 10 days traveling alone in Russia and a 4 weeks summer school in Saint Petersburg to learn Russia. I can speak a little Russian.

Hosted guest from Canada, Hungary, Malaysia, China, India, Philippine, Indonesia, Spain, South Africa, Vietnam, US, Netherlands, Germany, Cyprus, UK......

Watch action movies. E.g Fast and Furious, Marvels, Mission Impossible,  Die Hard etc.

Enjoy good food and be a healthy chef! Steak, salmon, pasta, soups, porridge, fried rice.

Cycling, jogging and swimming during free time.

host_about: WorldQ is inspired by the idea originated from Brian Uzzi, a sociologist. Q reflects the "social intimacy". name: Orchid Country Club, Deluxe room 1
description:
A scenic sanctuary facing the panoramic Aranda Course and Seletar Reservoir, the 75-room Orchid Lodge is Orchid Country Club’s very own resort hotel.

The space
A scenic sanctuary facing the panoramic Aranda Course and Seletar Reservoir, the 75-room Orchid Lodge is Orchid Country Club’s very own resort hotel. Elegant interiors, modern design, and comfortable amenities all cater to a much needed getaway for guests in need of total relaxation.

Each guest room features:
- Balcony in all rooms overlooking the golf course
- Bedside room control system
- Cable TV channels
- Complimentary coffee & tea-making facilities
- Direct-control air-conditioning system
- Direct dial telephone with IDD/STD
- Electronic key card system
- In-room hairdryer
- In-room safe deposit box
- Iron & ironing board
- Free internet access

Complimentary club facilities for hotel guests:
- Gymnasium
neighborhood_overview:
It was in 1990 that the late Mr Ong Teng Cheong, then Secretary-General of NTUC, set out the reasons of developing a golf and country club for Singaporean workers. He envisioned in making golfing accessible and affordable to workers which also helped to strengthen their belief that progress of Singapore is shared by them, and that ‘golf will no longer be a game for the executives only’.

The first phase of the Club development was completed in September 1993. It included the Driving Range, Golf Clubhouse and the first of the three 9-hole courses, the Aranda Course. The second phase comprised the development of the Vanda and Dendro Courses, the Social Clubhouse and Orchid Lodge. Most of Phase II was completed by the end of 1994. By the fourth quarter of 1995, the Dendro Course and the Bowling Alley were opened for play. The long awaited Third phase development of the club featured extra parking lots at the new multi-storey car park. The Olympic Pool Changing Room also featu

description:
Cozy room in a two level penthouse with excellent views of the Singapore skyline from its floor to ceiling windows. The room has its own dedicated bathroom (toilet and and shower). The condominium has full facilities including a lap pool, gym and tennis courts.

The space
The room has a single bed, a desk and chair, drawers for clothes and a small closet. There is also a ceiling fan and air conditioning.

Guests will receive an access card to be able to enter the condominium project, a front door key to the flat as well as one room key. The card allows access to the gym.

Other things to note
The bed has sheets, a cover and a pillow. Toilet paper is provided; other amenities such as towels and soap are available upon request.
