name: EntireModern DesignerTerrace House
description:
*Please note a minimum of 5 nights is required for January 2019 bookings*

This is as central as it gets! Surry Hills is close enough to walk to the city with an array of great restaurants, cafés and a variety of nightlife choices right at your doorstep, yet situated in a leafy, quiet lane-way for peaceful sleeps with a friendly neighbourhood.

The space
Generous two bedroom modern fully renovated terrace with everything you need at your doorstep in the heart of Surry Hills yet very quiet and secure in leafy laneway.

Light-filled throughout yet cozy and comfortable within. Comfortably sleeps 4. Queen size bed in bedroom 2 and with balcony access from master bedroom which has a King bed. Open plan living area and access to sunny front courtyards. Balinese garden in back courtyard with an outside shower.

Full use of Wifi, Cable TV etc. Help yourself with basics, Coffee or tea, please feel free to use. Wifi included. No parties or smok
neighborhood_overview:
Surry Hills is well known for being the buzziest inner city suburb with a diverse range of bars, excellent restaurants and shopping. It is surrounded by parks and tree lined streets, charming laneways and many gorgeous heritage listed terraces. It champions as the suburb that has the most cycle lanes. It has the most number of designers, creative people living and working here as it's demographic in Sydney. Over 60% of people are creatives and over 90% are small entrepreneur businesses. Groceries, cafés and galleries are at my doorstep. Public transport are all within minutes walk.

Bus stops are all within 2-8 minutes walk.
Central Train station - 10 mins walk
20 mins walk to the inner city.
15 mins by bus to the city.
20 mins by bus to Bondi beach.

All in all, you're probably be saving close to $40 a day on taxis fares if you're further out as everything is close enough. If you're well travelled and keen to explore all that Sydney has to o
host_about:
Hi, I am a friendly Creative Director having lived in Surry Hills for the last 10 years plus. Hosted many housemates, guests and travelers with many good memories shared over the years. I love traveling and meeting new people and appreciate sharing life experiences. Sydney is a fantastic place to live and it has been my 7th city that I have lived so I'm easy going of people from all walks of life. Being a professional in the Creative industry I appreciate all sorts of art and design related stuff. So do feel free to use my library.

I am respectful of your privacy. I look forward to welcome you to Sydney in the near future!

name: Beautiful 2 Bedroom Apt Min Walk to the City
description:
If you are looking for something nice, spacious, convenient and close to everything, this is the place for you!

The space
We have a 2 bedroom apartment, in a very easy and handy location, minutes walk to the city, shops, restaurants and transport.

We are in Chippendale, there is plenty of good cafes, funky restaurants, wine bars and art galleries around,including the world famous White Rabbit Gallery. We are also 10 minutes walk to Redfern or Central train Stations, 20 min walk to the city, close to Broadway Shopping Centre and the new Central Park where you can do your shopping and 20 min walk to the buzzing Newtown, Surry Hills and Darling Harbour with all of their restaurants and pubs . It is very very easy to get to all Sydney's major attractions from here - you are one easy 15 min bus ride or train ride away from the Opera House and the Harbour Bridge. We are also minutes drive to Bondi Beach and walking distance to Royal Prince Alfred Hospital (
neighborhood_overview: Chippendale is a small suburb in Sydney,  and it is quickly becoming one of the coolest, most underground, creative and funky suburbs in Sydney with all it's cafes, art galleries, restaurants, bars, parks and it's big sustainable community, which keeps verge gardens full of fruit, vegetables and herbs for all to share!
host_about:
Me and my husband love to travel and we go away a lot. We started by using Airbnb to rent our place out when we were away, and became really passionate about hosting and sharing our home. 
I love to learn about people's stories and journeys whilst sharing my neighbourhood and its wonders.
I aim to give guests the experience I like having when I am travelling, the opportunity to live like a local in a unique, clean, convenient and homely place.
We care a lot about sustainability and the environment. We love travelling, getting to know new cultures and people, we love hiking, surfing, yoga, skiing, snorkelling, the movies, a good book and good food and wines.
I try to make each day count. 
I choose to be happy. 
I believe we must be the change we want to see in the world.
I believe no one is better than anyone and therefore we must take care of one another.

host_about:
My pleasure is to travel and to help other travellers.

neighborhood_overview:
Escape the crowds at Bondi Beach or Coogee, discover Maroubra Beach’s great cafes, amazing ocean surf and breathtaking coastal views.
FOOD: Enjoy the beach kiosk takeaway, local BBQ's or a delicious meal with stunning views at the Pavilion Beachfront Restaurant on the Promenade.
ACTIVITIES. The beach is fantastic. Sun, surf and sand.
SURFING – Maroubra is a 1 kilometre long beach.
FAMILY ACTIVITES - Swimming, relaxing, surfing, picnicking, BBQs, ball games, jogging, fishing and beach fossicking. There is a rock pool, an enclosed/shaded kids playground, a Skate Park, picnic tables, large grassy areas, shops, showers and toilets.
COASTAL WALK - To the north, stunning ocean views, connects Bondi, Bronte, Coogee and Gordons Bay with Maroubra Beach. To the south end of the beach, 70 hectares of bushland and sweeping headland views have been now dedicated to a new National Park to be located here.
host_about: Born in Jamaica. Arrived in Australia (via London) as a child. Went Ketogenic in 2015. I’m studying Psychology full time and I work in the Personal/Professional Development field. I am a Effective Action Coach, working with large groups. I also run courses in Communication & Pain Free Presentation skills for adults & Confidence/Self esteem programs for young people and teens. I cant live without grass fed, grass finished meat, wild caught fish, pastured eggs & fresh sprouts, ferments, Kombucha, Kefir, my family & friends, beauty, great sounds & raw chocolate. I have traveled to over 30 countries. I speak excellent English, basic French & awesome body language. I am a quiet introvert, who loves reading, learning & pondering the possibilities of life... With our thoughts  ... we make our world... (Thank goodness)

A remarkable elevated and stylish renovated 4 Br family beach home with panoramic vistas. Perfectly located only a short walk to either Fairlight or Manly beaches & the beautiful Sydney harbour.Cafes, restaurants and shops are only a 5min walk away

Guest access
All areas are accessible except for under the house and garage which are both locked.
neighborhood_overview: A short walk to Stockland shopping centre gives you access to Rays Pizza, balanced Thai or Balgowlah seafood restaurant or takeaway which has been awarded best seafood cafe in sydney.
host_about:
We are an activity family who's lifestyle revolves around the local beaches given the surf & sporting activities.

We travel like we live, "beach casual" no matter if it is Cape York or outback Queensland.

name: Charming cottage
description:
The space
This charming cottage (circa 1835) is in a prime location several minutes from Sydney's CBD and 15 minutes to the beautiful beaches of Bondi, Bronte & Tamarama.
The home boasts a modern kitchen and bathroom with miele appliances and one lovely double bedroom.
The living room is equipped with flatscreen t.v, wifi, and cable/satellite connection.
There is a lovely small courtyard in which breakfast, lunch & dinner can be taken and prepared from the BBQ.
With the city just a 4-5 minute walk, oxford st a 7 minute walk and the cottage nestled amongst everything surry hills (23rd most stylish neighbourhood in the world) has to offer this location is really perfect for any person wishing to explore all of sydneys finest.

(website hidden)

name: Fabulous 2-bed apt in Potts Point
description:
Fabulous 2-bed apt in Potts Point, Sydney's most desirable inner city suburb, with gorgeous city skyline views.

Steps to transport, restaurants, cafes and nightlife. CBD a 15-minute stroll away.

The ideal base from which to explore the city and the perfect place to watch Sydney's famous New Year's Eve fireworks!

The space
Fully-furnished 2-bedroom apartment on Victoria St, Potts Point.

Unbeatable location
- Potts Point is Sydney's most desirable inner city suburb
- steps to Kings Cross train station + buses to the city and the beaches
- fantastic range of restaurants, cafes and bars
- three supermarkets within a five-minute stroll
- 15-minute stroll to Sydney CBD
- no need for a car - everything is walkable!
- great views of the New Year's Eve fireworks from the balcony!

Spacious accommodation
- two double bedrooms (2nd bedroom setup as a study with a desk and a high quality sof
neighborhood_overview: Potts Point is Sydney's most desirable inner city suburb with a wide range of supermarkets, cafes, bars and restaurants.
host_about:
Hi! I'm a travel writer so my work takes me all over the world writing for newspapers and magazines. I'm English originally but have lived in Sydney for 12 years.

I work from home so love the convenience of being so close to the city and having so many great cafes, restaurants and bars around me.

name: Private Duplex near Manly
description:
Situated in a multi level house,the garden level has a separate two bedroom, full bathroom/laundry, kitchenette and rumpus room awaiting you. Short walk to magnificent Castle Rock Beach + stunning bush walks and a short bus ride to Manly it offers the best of everything. Up to 4 people

The space
It is a private area for guests only - a bit like a granny flat with separate entrance and 2 bedrooms.

Own kitchen, laundry, lounge, bathroom and bedrooms plus a deck.

As much or as little depending on guest preference.

It's walking distance to a very private Harbour beach and a short trip to Manly

Public transport is possible and a car is recommended

Guest access
Own kitchen, laundry, lounge, bathroom and bedrooms
neighborhood_overview: It's walking distance to a very private Harbour beach and a short trip to Manly
host_about: I enjoy travelling,meeting people and growing relationships and know how wonderful it is to find fantastic accomodation that suits the Budget. Sharing part of our house is one way of supporting others in their travels. You'll find me to be warm, hospitable generous and caring.

name: Sydney Opera House-20min walk
description:
The perfect base for seeing the sights in Sydney

The space
Welcome to Sydney!

We have just renovated our 1 bedroom apartment and included new flooring and fresh paint. Sunlight is now filtered through the translucent blinds which offer privacy without compromising on daylight.

Centrally located only 50m from the sparkling waters of Sydney Harbour.
Your new base in Sydney's Woolloomooloo, home to actors and celebrities, is the backdrop to this well located apartment and moments from the stunning landscaped Botanical Gardens - 30 hectares/75 Acres of gorgeous gardens nestled behind the iconic Opera House.

This apartment suite is the perfect base for the busy traveller. You will sleep well in a king size bed and the kitchen is fully equipped for self catering. If you are coming with a friend or one child then there is a sofa bed in the living space. This is an open plan apartment but comfortable for a family or close friends.
neighborhood_overview:
Woolloomooloo is a s close to the CBD as you can get without being right in the midst of high rises.

You will be within walking distance to some of the best attractions Sydney has to offer. The walk through The Botanical Gardens, Domain or Hyde Park is a great way to start your day.

Mrs Macquarie's Chair is a 15 minute walk away and offers one of the best vantage points of Sydney Harbour. This is the iconic Sydney view!
host_about:
Hi everyone! 
I love to travel and always enjoy meeting new people. I especially enjoy being a small part of the adventures and travels of others. 
I look forward to welcoming you to Woolloomooloo and introducing you to our beautiful City of Sydney.

name: The Wharf Apartments, Woolloomooloo
description:
The space
The Wharf in Woolloomooloo is an award winning apartment complex perfectly located on Sydney Harbour and enjoys spectacular views of the Sydney Harbour's foreshore, city sky line and the Royal Botanical Gardens.

Also located along the wharf promenade are some of Sydney leading restaurants and The Central Business / Shopping District, Sydney Opera House and the Royal Botanical Gardens are all within easy walking distance from the apartment. Bondi Beach is only a 10 minute drive.

The luxury apartment has 2 x big bedrooms, 2 x bathrooms, a waterfront balcony, a modern kitchen, a combined lounge and dining area, internal laundry, reverse cycle air-conditioning and 24 hour security onsite.

There is also a swimming pool, state of the art gym, sun bathing area and a coffee shop all within the complex.

There is a bus stop and taxi station out the front of the building and a train station close by.

Guest

name: Private garden studio with bathroom
description:
A private studio-style room with its own bathroom in our backyard. You have a separate entrance and there is plenty of parking. Public transport is close-by. We leave you to your own devices but are very happy to give you all the advice you need.

The space
We've built a new guest room with its own bathroom in our backyard. It's private, quiet and has leafy views across to the Japanese maple. Our house is home for our family of four, but you have your own separate space. We live in a suburban area near the bush but are close to both the city, Chatswood and the business centre of North Ryde. Depending which direction you are heading we are 5 - 15 minute walk from buses to the city, Chatswood and North Ryde. We travel by either train or bus to the city, depending on exactly where we are going. The bus is a 15-20 minute ride into the city. When travelling by train we usually go from Chatswood station.There is plenty of parking in our street and we do have wi-fi. We'
neighborhood_overview: I love the feeling of space, the trees and access to the bush; all within short distance from the city. The bus from half a block away takes just 16 minutes to get to the city, so you are very connected to a lot of the best things Sydney has to offer - including the harbour! Our place is also quiet, something I really appreciate.
neighbourhood: Lane Cove North, New South Wales, Australia

name: Apartment on Balmoral Beach Hill
description:
Beautiful new apartment close to Sydney Harbour's best beach and many attractions. Easy parking with transport and great bars and restaurants nearby. Everything you need to feel at home, relax and of course maximise your time in this incredible city.
Pets can stay on request and with approval. Single night weekend stay also on request and with approval

The space
Looking for a beautiful apartment to enjoy Sydney and all its splendour?? This refurbished property is only a short stroll down to the beach. Only 15 minutes to the bustling Sydney CBD or to relaxing Manly Beach.

Take advantage of the central location, spend your day at the beach then go out in Mosman and Neutral bay area at night, there is a full range of clubs, restaurants and pubs to suit all budgets with the local community bus service at your door making it easy to get around and get home stress free. If you're new to Sydney and want to go out on the town options are easy for there an
neighborhood_overview: Balmoral is a hidden treasure in the beautiful harbour of Sydney. It's close enough to the city and far enough away from the madness in what is truly the most scenic and cleanest harbour beach(as it face directly out to sea)
host_about:
Welcome! We strive to meld the comfort of home with the curiosity of travel. 
Please let us know how we can help make your trip unforgettable.

name: North Bondi, with views and deck
description:
A stylish, sun-lit two-bedroom apartment just minutes to the sand and surf, with views to Bondi Beach.

The space
A stylish, sun-lit two-bedroom apartment just minutes to the sand and surf, with views to Bondi Beach.

- 2 bedrooms, both with queen/double beds.
- Modern bathroom, with bath.
- Brand new, designer kitchen with dishwasher - it's fully-equipped with everything you need.
- Internal laundry with front-loading washing machine.
- Entertaining balcony, with views to beach + Weber BBQ and dining setting... perfect to linger over breakfast and coffee, or to watch the sun set with a cold beer.
- Art deco style with polished floorboards and high ceilings.
- Wifi
- Hotel-quality linen and towels supplied.
- Unmetered and untimed parking in street.

The apartment is two minutes' walk from North Bondi's cool cafes and village-like shops.

Our pick? The Depot for morning coffee and The Hi
host_about: I live in London with my husband Stuart and our two kids. We've stayed in Airbnbs all over the world, from New York to Sicily, and have also rented our own apartment in North Bondi to Airbnb guests.

name: QUIRKY WAY ROZELLE  artist's house
description:
Divine, magical house so near the city though you wouldn't know as it is so peaceful and almost rural out in the garden! Sweet and full of character, Quirky Way is a true charmer. People always comment on how it's even better than the pics!

The space
I have a gorgeous 'designy' but character-filled 2 bedroom weatherboard cottage in the inner city suburb of Rozelle, right near the city (5 mins by bus). I let the house periodically when I am away myself so it is often available but not always. Please email me with any queries.

The individuality and light in the house is the main thing you will notice. Also that a fertile sub-tropical garden can be seen and enjoyed from every room. The romantic, generously proportioned bedroom just about sits in the garden, which wraps around two sides. It looks out to the very handsome St Josephs church from the window, which glows pink and gold at sunset...an unimpeded view from the bed should you be feeling so inclin
neighborhood_overview:
Its so friendly and mostly very quiet!

SHOPPING/GROCERIES
Folks tell me they do very well just at the IGA EXPRESS in Rozelle. (649 Darling st, Rozelle)
It is a 10 min walk, up victoria Rd, turn right, a block or two down on your left,
amongst all the cafes etc.
Or there is the big WOOLIES in Balmain, if yr driving, or fancy a 20 min walk all along Evans st.

Or: there is a sweet little grocery store that has a lot of things you may need the next
street down. There is also a nice oval down there for a jog if you need one!
It’s called Easton Park Grocery Store (Denison St, cnr Alfred) and is run by locals
and, it is, well, nice:) friendly, local.You can walk thru the creamy brick housing estate
adjacently across the street to get there:) It’s a sweet little stroll!

BELLE FLEUR - 658 Darling St, Rozelle
Make world class chocolates. Truly delectable. Belgian cocoa...just divine!

BREAD : 660 Darlin
host_about:
I'm a long-time designer and writer, and now graduated as an art psychotherapist.
I love books, creating stuff with paper (have written a book on the subject), anything 'vintage' or 'old'...things with history, basically. I am a keen cook and gardener though slightly more successful at the former (thankfully the garden looks after itself!) I love music, talking and walking...oh god this is sounding like a lonely hearts ad! It isnt! I have a lovely beau a few kms away with whom I will stay if you are at mine! I have enjoyed quite a few airbnb experiences staying at others' places and love the idea of it all.

name: Beach/Airport. 1 or 2 bedrooms
description:
. The rooms are compact offering a double bed in 1 room and a Double bed in the 2nd room . We share 1 bathroom and toilet. You are more than welcome to share the apartment as you would your own home. My aim is to make you feel welcome, comfortable and at home.

The space
1st bedroom Private bedroom with linen and Towels provided. It is a cosy room with double bed, desk, built in wardrobe,
2nd bedroom has king single trundle bed with linen .. BIR It is a small compact room ideal for children.

10 mins from Sydney Airport. literally around the corner to Plaza, shops, cafes, restaurants, public transport supermarket and beach.
There is a huge RSL club in the same street, 2 minute walk.
Share kitchen and bathroom, living area and laundry. Cable TV.

Walk around the corner get a freshly made coffee or fish and chips and walk to Botany Bay which is a few mins walk and have a swim or just relax and take in the view.
The main
neighborhood_overview:
It is safe, friendly and only a few minutes walk to the Beach, Shops, Supermarket, Restaurants Cafes, Parks, RSL & Sailing Clubs, Schools, Hospital and only 7 klms to the Sydney International and Domestic Airport. Only 16 KLMS to city Central
No need for a car in Sans Souci.
Sans Souci is a French word that means "WITHOUT WORRY"
host_about:
Great fun. Professional working lady. Easy to get along with, excellent communication skills with all ages. I love a good sense of humour and like to believe I have one, good manners, common sense and good food are a must in my home. I love to cook, my specialties are garlic prawns with white wine and cream sauce tossed in pasta and a Thai red curry .
Loved watching the Game of Thrones and I have heaps of movies for you to watch on Netflix while relaxing at home.
My aim is to make your stay in my home  to be like you were at home.
I have been hosting for 6 years now and am very blessed to have met soo many awesome travellers.
I look forward to meeting you one day
Michelle

name: *FULLY FURNISHED ROOM*
description:
Fully furnished modern 3 bedroom plus landing/study townhouse on 3 levels in a quiet surrounding, offers a great privacy for house mates.

The space
The house is well equipped with Built-in and mirrored robes to all bedrooms, open plan gas kitchen, internal laundry with 3rd toilets and 2 bathrooms, tiled lounge/dining area, entertaining courtyard, alarm system and close to all amenities sharing with two friendly and fun professionals.

In terms of mobility we are also lucky with our location. Being close to James Ruse Drive and Great Western High way (M4) makes the transport easy to all directions. (We are literally in the center of Sydney with quick access to highways that links east and west as well as North and south bounds.

The famous Rose Hill Race Course is the largest entertainment center around the area. They have various shows throughout the year in which the trendy and classic horse racing can be named as the featured ones.
neighborhood_overview:
We have an absolutely nice and quiet neighborhood and we are grateful for that.

There is a primary school in Virginia St across the road not far from our house and so parents are expected to hang around during the drop off and pick up times (8:00AM and 2:00PM).

Also we are blessed to have Rosehill racecourse right near us. During the events you will get to see a good mix of colour, style and fashion around the area which it tempts you to think, you may as well dress to impress and join the event!
host_about: I am looking forward to welcome you in my beautiful Sydney home in the near future!

name: KT 1   inner city ( house )
description:
Room in a 3 bedroom terrace with two bathrooms in Redfern / Surry Hills.
Distance to Central Station ( 1.5 kilometer), 14 minutes by bus, 19 minutes walk, and 2 minutes walk to city bus stop ( 17 minutes to city center ).

Hello and welcome to Kepos Terrace :)

The space
I will try to provide as much relevant information concerning the house and the location , though if you have any queries please send a message.



Kepos Terrace is on the border of Surry Hills / Redfern and it is perfect for exploring Sydney with bus stops around the corner taking you in any direction, or there is much to see and do within walking distance. The nearest train station is Central Station.

The house is a typical inner city terrace house of 2 levels, with some lovely original features, 13ft high ornate ceilings and much natural light, in a tree lined street, situated in a cul-de-sac, thus it is very quiet with no traffic noise, which
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in an inner city area, close to the center of the city which is 'walk-able'. There are many people in the streets and the locals use the bike lane for commuting.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Paris! 

Welcome to Sydney and Kepos Terrace. 

I've lived and studied in Sydney all my life, and I love where I live. 
I'm an artist, so ask me a thousand questions about the Sydney art scene, but watch me blush if your query requires sports knowledge. 

I graduated with an honors degree with National Art School NSW, so there are a few of my paintings around the house, and I am currently working on my next piece.  

I do work full-time, and regularly I attend new shows and gallery openings after work,  and on the weekends I like to have no plans but to simply enjoy being around the house and sometimes having friends over. I am quite busy during the week,  but on the weekends I have more time to sit and talk with  you about my ideas and thoughts about places to go and things to do in Sydney, or even to plan to see events together.     

Regarding pets, I have a lovely cat named Roger, who is friendly and very well mannered. He will come for a pat if encouraged, or he will leave you alone,  (he gets a mention in every review).

I have done some traveling, and in 2009 I traveled through New York with airbnb. 

That's me in a nutshell! 

We look forward to meeting you.

name: Leafy Studio with Tranquil Pittwater View
description:
Relax on the private terrace surrounded by lush gardens and a tranquil view to Pittwater, drinking a glass of wine at the end of the day. This studio makes excellent use of the space and boasts superior furnishings.

License number
PID-STRA-2339
neighborhood_overview: The studio is on an elevated plateau above the village of Avalon, bordered by Pittwater on one side and the Pacific Ocean on the other. Our property is on a scenic and quiet, local traffic-only street. A five-minute walk will take you to an organic coffee shop, 7-11 store, pizza take away and bottle shop. The village of Avalon Beach is a 2-min drive away, where you'll find interesting shops, cafes, and restaurants. Our favourite - Bilgola Beach is a 4-min drive down the hill from the Studio.
host_about: Hello!  The kids have left home so it seemed like a good idea to share our space and the glorious northern beaches.  We both work from home, Phillip as a psychologist, Leigh as a landscape architect and this work takes us both travelling around the country where we've enjoyed many great Airbnb stays.

name: Sydney beach side family retreat
description:
This modern 4 bedroom fully furnished home is situated in a quiet street with ocean glimpses - and is less than 5 minutes' walk to Clovelly beach (fantastic for snorkelling). It comes with snorkelling gear. It is also a short walk to Bronte Beach, Coogee Beach and Gordons Bay. You can easily walk to Bondi Beach as well along the ocean cliff walkway.

The space
This modern 4 bedroom fully furnished home is situated in a quiet street with ocean glimpses - and is less than 5 minutes walk to Clovelly beach (fantastic for snorkelling).

It is also a short walk to Coogee Beach, Bronte Beach and Gordens Bay. Or you can easily walk to Bondi Beach along the ocean cliff walkway.

The light filled home is brand new and has 4 large bedrooms and 3 bathrooms.

name: Jacaranda self contained  accommodation near Manly
description:
A charming garden apartment, centrally located with amenities, provides a restful, quiet getaway near the popular destination of Manly.

The space
The location:
Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac onto Balgowlah golf course, Jacaranda offers you your private entrance to self-contained accommodation in a leafy garden setting.
We are central to a host of popular attractions, in particular beaches, walks, water ways and spectacular views around Manly and Middle Harbour.
Stockland shopping centre is close by and here you will find a large supermarket including seafood and vegetable markets, and several great restaurants. The vibrant culture of Manly is also nearby.
The bedroom:
We have a kingsize bed that can be split to make two single beds - its up to you! Storage is a large double, built in wardrobe plus bedside cabinets.

name: Large Queen Studio with Private Entrance
description:
A beautifully presented private studio situated below a stunning heritage home with your own entrance to come & go as you please. Privacy, space & a peaceful leafy outlook, use of the pool, close to parks & public transport to the City, Ryde, Rhodes & Macquarie Park.

The space
The Accommodation
The guest accommodation is a private space with ensuite, small fridge, lounge area, TV, microwave, kettle, toaster & Nespresso coffee machine. It has it's own entrance situated below a stunning heritage listed sandstone home in historic Hunters Hill. It is beautifully cool in summer & has underfloor heating so cosy & warm in winter. The bed is a comfortable Queen size & all linen & towels are supplied. We stock the fridge for your arrival with some basic breakfast supplies including cereal, juice, milk, bread etc & Nespresso capsules. The ensuite has a spacious shower but no bathtub. There is free wifi available. Please note that other than the microwave in your room

host_about: My husband & I are passionate travellers ourselves & love hosting friends in our home. With our daughter now having moved out we have had many friends use our downstairs retreat whilst holidaying or working in Sydney. We have decided to use airbnb to fill it for more of the time but envisage it to be like having like minded friends staying there. We are happy to be as sociable as you like or leave you to your own devices if you prefer. I am a personal trainer & chef so I am usually cooking up goodies in the kitchen or up in the park putting people through their paces. My husband Donald is semi retired & usually found pottering in his shed or attending to the garden & pool. We are keen sailors & often out on the waters of Sydney harbour. We are also keen skiers with a passion for good food & good wine. We look forward to meeting you & sharing our home with you.

name: Lovely Family Home Close to Manly!
description:
A light, spacious and very attractive 1920's house in a great location close to everything that Manly offers.

The space
The house has a prime location in Fairlight, just minutes from the harbour foreshore and all the attraction and amenities of Manly. It is a 2-storey brick 1920's house with lots of light and character. We have recently renovated the kitchen/dining room and the garden. There is a separate living room, a sunroom full of toys and 3 bedrooms. One has a queen bed, one a double and the third has two single beds (which could be joined to make a big queen). There is also a cot. There is a sunny deck with daybed and a leafy courtyard garden, perfect for alfresco meals and bbqs. Free wi-fi.

We are happy to discuss the rental of our car, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network.

Guest access
The whole house.

License number
PID-STRA-20417
neighborhood_overview:
The house is a five-minute walk from the lovely local harbour beach and rock pool at Fairlight. Here you can join the Manly Scenic Walkway. Manly is a 15 minute stroll in one direction. The bars, restaurants, beaches, aquarium, ferry, shops and atmosphere of Manly need no further promotion. Turn west at Fairlight Beach and the Scenic Walkway meanders for 2-3 hours along the harbour edge - it is one of the finest walks in Australia. Manly Dam and a 50m pool provide more watery pleasures nearby. There is a new modern shopping centre with Coles, butchers, grocers, Bakers Delight etc a 5-minute walk away in Balgowlah. Heading north, a glorious string of beaches ends at Palm Beach and beautiful Pittwater.

Finally, of course, you can catch a ferry to the city to explore a huge array of world-famous attractions. We are happy to discuss car rental, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network.
host_about: We are a professional couple (both Architects) with 3 children aged 16, 14 and 9. We are from England and settled in the Manly area 18 years ago. We bought this house in 2007. We love the outdoor lifestyle offered by the Northern Beaches and spend lots of time surfing, swimming, sailing and walking. We have travelled extensively overseas and as the children get older we hope to have more adventures.   Our house is in a fabulous holiday location and we don't like it to sit empty while we travel if someone else could be enjoying it.  We did several house swaps a few years ago and Airbnb has expanded our options for accommodation further.  Our children are very well-behaved and they are used to respecting other people's houses.  We have no animals but could possibly care for something small in a holiday home.

host_about:
My wife and I have lived here for 25 years - our 2 daughters have flown the koop and we now are keen to share this beautiful part of the world with visitors to our city. We work from home quite often so will gladly point you in the right direction to all the great tourist spots and fantastic eateries in the area.

Whilst our children were growing up we hosted foreign students as a means of broadening their understanding of the wider world. This was a great experience and we are now keen to host you for your short or medium term stay - and hopefully be part of a great experience as you discover this special part of the world.

Our home is really well located - just a short walk down to Bondi Beach and easily accessible to the City and key destinations. If you have a car it will work perfectly for you as we are just outside of the congestion areas and have easy free parking around us.

I am married, educated, warm, sincere, honest and fun loving. I was born in Cambodia (Chinese/Cambodian/Thai origin) and have been in Sydney for 39 years. I work in Education and Training Industry and currently I also run a Training Consultancy. My wife and I love traveling and we have been to many countries. We have two grown up children who have moved out and are successful in what they do.
We love home decoration, cooking and hanging out with nice friends of ours. We love big cities and at the same time we enjoy the tranquility of our suburb which is located at the centre of Sydney metropolitan areas. As I was an executive for a very large NGO and was and have been a government employee, I am very resourceful about Sydney, its people and culture. I love to get connected with people of all ages and nationalities to enjoy each other's company and to learn from each other.

I look forward to welcoming you to Sydney!

With kind regards,

Andrew  & Kurina

name: Charming flat in idyllic Waverton, close to CBD
description:
Live like a local while exploring iconic sights of Sydney. Charming cosy apartment inspired by a mix of midcentury modern and Scandinavian lines, awesome company guaranteed. Set in a quaint tree-lined lower north shore village, 5mins walk to the train station, 10mins train to the cbd, easy access to a variety of neighbourhoods (from the hip & trendy to the casual family-friendly types), cafe scenes, beaches, scenic walks & bushland. You'll love coming back here to relax, a home away from home.

The space
ABOUT MY FLAT
Relax and chill out in your own private sanctuary - a bedroom complete with a comfortable double bed, mirrored wardrobes, and a gorgeous green leafy outlook.

Put your feet up, make yourself at home and enjoy my spacious, light-filled apartment. Inspired by Scandinavian style meets mid-century modern, I've lovingly decorated my living & dining area with a mix of beautifully restored original 1960s pieces and Scandinavian lines.
neighborhood_overview:
THE NEIGHBOURHOOD
Waverton is a leafy area within walking distance to Balls Head Reserve, a bushland oasis with stunning views of the Harbour Bridge, City Skyline and Goat Island.

Surrounded by greenery, you will be surprised that you are only 10 mins train ride from the city.

Waverton Village - 5 mins walk
Quaint village with a supermarket, newsagent, bottle shop, chemist, restaurants, cafes, bakery, hairdresser, drycleaners, health practitioners, Waverton station - everything you need, really!

Crows Nest - 15 mins walk
Central shopping village with interesting shops, cosy cafes and loads of restaurants

Kirribilli/Milson's Point/Mcmahon's Point
Trendy cafes, pretty tree-lined streets, local pubs, Luna Park, and parks under the Sydney Harbour Bridge pylons - with full frontal views of Sydney Opera House.

Catch a scenic ferry ride to Circular Quay, Darling Harbour or Balmain from Milson's Point.
host_about:
Living in Sydney, while exploring the world

Hi there! I am a professional, living in Sydney for the past 5 years. It's kinda a given - to be on this site - and profess a love for travelling, but it's true! 

Stepping off a plane onto new ground. Seeing new faces, absorbing smells and sounds of different cultures. The unease of exploring unfamiliar territories. Observing similarities & differences of communities across the world. And the taste sensations of food from local kitchens. All these inspire my constant need for seeing new parts of the world, whenever I can. 

And while I'm in between travel, I enjoy exploring my current home city of Sydney - the culture, night life, arts & music scene, beaches and bush. I thought, since I currently have a spare room, why not open my home to fellow travellers?  By making it available on Airbnb, I can continue to meet new people and experience different cultures via the people travelling through Sydney - best of both worlds indeed. 

As my guest, you will be welcome to treat my place as your home away from home, a safe & comfy place to retreat to while you're in Sydney. If you like, I would also be delighted to share little hidden secrets of Sydney that I'm continuing to discover - cool little bars, best local gelato, secret gardens, little known best view points of Sydney skyline and the Harbour Bridge - from around the neighbourhood!

description:
The ocean and beach views from the living area of this 1 bedroom apartment with balcony are just brilliant. Air cond, high-speed internet, 42” TV, and separate bedroom with a queen bed make this the perfect holiday abode. There is an ensuite bathroom and linen and bath towels are provided for your stay. Cafes and restaurants are just metres from your front doorstep. The full sized kitchen also provides the option to eat in and enjoy the view from the dining area or the balcony. Come and enjoy!

The space
Being on the top (ninth) floor, the apartment is quiet and offers an ocean facing balcony and the separate bedroom faces the inner harbour and city. There are 6 stairs from the corridor to the front door, and 8 stairs leading down from the bedroom to the living area. Enjoy natural sunlight in both the living area and the bedroom, plus there are beautiful flow-through breezes. The queen size bed has a luxurious pillow top mattress to ensure the perfect night's
neighborhood_overview:
Manly's attractions include:
- 100 metres from the sand ... enjoy the sunrise over the ocean, a morning run or a surf
- Go for a bushwalk ... there are a number of popular scenic walking routes that link the beaches with the national parks
- Learn to surf with Manly Surf School
- Join the "Bold &Beautiful" for a 7am swim from Manly to Shelly Beach and back
- Get up close and personal to the migrating whale population
- Take a ferry and visit Sydney’s famous Taronga Park Zoo
- Kayak scenic waterways to secluded beaches
- Rent a bike and ride the dedicated bike track to Fairy Bower, or explore hidden trails on a bike tour with Manly Bike Tours
- Snorkel or scuba the Manly Marine Reserve
- Sail the harbour on a skippered cruise
- Learn to dig, spike and dive with Sydney Beach Volleyball School
- Have a swing at one of the golf courses in the Manly area
- Visit Q station
host_about:
I live with my husband in Sydney and we spend time in our terrace house in Paddington (about 30 mins from Manly) and our beach house on the south coast ... 3 hours south of Sydney at a little town called Manyana.
Manly is a wonderful holiday destination - it is very relaxing, but still manages to have a palpable vibe and energy!!  Maybe one day we will be able to live in Manly full-time - definitely something to look forward to in the future :-)
We love to travel, entertain friends at home and enjoy recreational activities like snow skiing, and to keep fit, I go to the gym and like to walk on the beach.

name: Luxury Potts Point apartment w/ Harbour views
description:
Our recently renovated designer apartment is centrally located in the very fashionable harbourside precinct of Potts Point. Access to Sydney’s best cafes, restaurants, shops & bars from your doorstep. Once inside, you’ll welcome the peace and quiet of this spacious high-rise apartment and the tranquillity of the sweeping city + harbour view. Stunning furnishings, modern conveniences and walking distance to the CBD make this perfect for a couple on holiday or a business traveller.

The space
Our spacious 1 bedroom apartment is drenched in natural sunlight due to it’s highly desirable North aspect. Inside, it’s very quiet and you’ll never tire of the expansive panoramic views of the CBD, Opera House and Harbour Bridge from the expansive balcony, lounge room, bedroom and even the shower!

With Kings Cross train station just moments away, you can be in the city in 2 minutes, work from the oversized kitchen island, or on a sunny day, on the balcony overlook
neighborhood_overview:
Potts Point has become one of the most desirable places to live around Sydney. The neighbourhood is vibrant and rich with culture and history. It’s situated within Sydney City, just a short 20-minute walk to the CBD. All public transport options (train, bus, taxi and Uber) are in the immediate vicinity.

All within easy walking distances...Victoria Street and Macleay Street are full of eateries for all tastes. For those who seek the nightlife, Kings Cross and Darlinghurst Road offer lots of nightclubs, bars and theatres. Or for the more subdued, there are plenty of parks, museums and bayside charm in the neighbouring suburbs of Woolloomooloo, Elizabeth Bay and Darlinghurst close by.

Check out the map below for our tips and recommendations.

host_about:
Hello,

I wish to welcome you to the Northern Beaches, Sydney, Australia.
I am an Australian, married to another Australian and and I live nearby.
The Holiday Rental I manage  myself and enjoy. 
Being your Hostess and providing a comfortable, homely, clean and welcoming place to stay brings me happiness and joy. 

Travelling is a passion of mine and experiencing other destinations around the World has made me a better person.

Things that I cannot live with out include: Good Food, Live Music, Sunshine and Warmth, The Outdoors, Sporting Events and my Family.

I like being a Host as I like meeting people and hearing about their lives, stories, dreams and hopes.

When we (my Husband and Myself) travel together we like to stay in Cities and we like to walk around to capture the atmosphere of the location and to try and talk to the local people of that Town or City.

My Motto is to be Happy, Friendly, Thankful and be Kind to your Neighbour.

Bright and sunny with modern furnishing, the apartment, which is the ground floor of the owner's residence with private entrance, sleeps two in a separate bedroom with queen size bed.

There is a modern bathroom with shower, wc, vanity basin, heater and heated towel rail. There is also a kitchenette with full size refrigerator, microwave, electric hotplate, electric kettle, toaster and coffee maker. Instant oats, milk, tea and coffee (Instant & Ground) supplied.

The Living room features a flat screen TV, Apple TV (Netflix, Stan, etc) hard disc player and recorder, Bluetooth music (iLink) player, 2.5 seater leather lounge, single lounge chair. Dining table seat
neighborhood_overview:
Newport Beach is one of Sydney's premier surfing beaches and is just 10 minutes away accessed by a pathway and stair opposite the apartment.

There are a number of walks around the Crown of the Hill reserve which take you to patches of remnant rainforest and spectacular coastal views.

Newport Village is also nearby and has a number of restaurants of varying price ranges as well as a bar, supermarket, delicatessens and liquor stores. A number of restaurants provide home delivery.

Newport is at the start of the Barrenjoey Peninsula which has some of Sydney's finest surfing beaches on the east and Pittwater, a sailor's paradise, to the west. There are several nearby golf courses and tennis courts for hire.

"The Newport", Justin Hemmes recent upgrade of the famous "Newport Arms Hotel" is 5 min. by car or a 20 min. walk away. Set on the stunning shores of Pittwater, it is a vibrant gathering place for all ages. Nestled amongst idyllic gardens, an

My place is a very comfortable semi-detached residence 10 minutes walk from the very famous Bond Beach, the famous Icebergs club and all the Hall St cafes and restaurants.

description:
The space
A beautiful room in a beautiful house in a beautiful garden in a beautiful neighbourhood!
This place is like the nicest area in Istanbul. Really green and natural, yet still in the city.
The area has been kept green and quite because of it's historical monument, the great Rumeli Castle. A castle which was build in 1452, just lying infront of us. The room has a nice view of it.
Another thing, theres only 5 min. walk distance to the Bogazici University.
In the photos you see only a single bed, but there's another hidden bed which pops out, so it can easily turn in to a double or two seperate singles. You will have access to the bathroom, kitchen and the living room. Aaand, wait for it,,, free breakfast on the terrace!!

The space
Hi all,
I am Daniele, an italian living in Istanbul since more than a decade.
The deal is a king-size bed in a nice large room with facilities. Large bathroom, fully furnished kitchen and a great living room with stunning Bosphorus view from a large balcony.

The neighborhood is really quiet for its position in the very city center.
You will sleep well without the noise of nightlife area but you'll be in Taksim entertainment area in less than 15 minutes by foot and underground. In less than 5 minutes you're in Kabatas Transit Hub with several lines for almost everywhere in the city.
Weekdays several restaurants are open in nearbyes for offices.

The real deal is combining the quietness of a small residential area with the proximity to transportation and the city center.

The space
Centuries old Byzantine construction restored into this unique accommodation which will certainly add a different dimension to your experience in Istanbul. Breathtaking view of the Bosphorus & providing utmost privacy, Room on a Hill is your ideal getaway in Istanbul. It is located near by Besiktas walking distance from the cozy Ortakoy on the European Side of the city, on the hills of Bosphorus.

The studio can accommodate 2 adults. There is a fully equipped kitchenette and a bathroom with toilet & shower. Room on a Hill shares the garden with the owner's villa but has entirely private entrance. Guests are welcome to use the garden & the garden furniture. Please feel free to tip the porter if you need help carrying your luggage up to the studio.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is clean and quiet centrally located in a safe neighborhood, very close to Taksim Square and to Istiklal Avenue (5 min. to walk) and offers great access to public transportation (Bus station 2 minutes to walk, Subway station 5 minutes to walk). Beyoglu is Istanbul’s most living and cosmopolitan quarter with a wealth of architectural styles, synagogues, Turkish baths, mosques, museums, traditional restaurants, cafés, antique shops and great nightlife. Istiklal Avenue, the more modern district of Istanbul built during the 19th century, is the hearth of Beyoglu.


Close to all your needs :
Pharmacy - 2 min
Change office - 2 min
Market - 2 min

At the same street there are a lot of restaurants with fair prices.

Istanbul Military Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Taksim Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Ataturk Cultural Center - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

name: Fully furnished penthouse, Beyoglu
description:
A fully furnished apartment in an Ottoman liberty style building in Beyoğlu. The location is very central, walking distance to Istiklal street, one of the main centers in Istanbul. There are many cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping, night life.

The space
The apartment is on the top (fifth) floor of the apartment building. It has one bedroom and one living room. It has also an equipped kitchen so you can cook by yourself if you'd like to. You can also just go out and try the delicious Turkish cuisine.

The penthouse is in the heart of Istanbul, furnished in an Ottoman liberty style building close to Istiklal street.

Istiklal street is one of the most famous and crowded place in Istanbul. You can find best shopping and dining options around. The night life is also very active near Istiklal street and parallel streets as well.

If you want to explore the historic peninsula, no problem, you are already very close if you stay in this
neighborhood_overview:
Tarlabasi neighborhood was a middle class Greek neighbourhood when it was founded at the beginning of 19th century. The area is full of houses of eclectic Ottoman liberty style buildings and building is one of them. By the 1950’s most of the Greek population of the area had to immigrate to Greece because of political reasons.

The area was deserted and by the 1980’s got an internal immigration from the east part of Turkey mostly of Kurdish origin. In the neighborhood very few Istanbulite Greeks remained, there is a big Kurdish community of rural origin, a gypsy community that settled down many years ago and work in the area as musicians, poor families from the East and the Black Sea coast, expats who fell in love with decadent touch and reasonable prices of the area, young artists, old artists, students.

In our building we have a mix of locals and expats.
host_about:
I am from Adana, a town in old Cilicia, have been living in Istanbul for quite a while. I have worked in tourism sector for a long time now I am retired and want to know new people. I can speak english and I can join you through your visit to show Istanbul or giving you some local information. 

I love cooking and feel myself lucky to know both eastern and wester cooking traditions of Turkey and willing to give half day cooking classes to whom it may interest.

name: Incomparable view/Spacious Kadıköy
description:
The space
This huge bedroom with a wonderful view of Istanbul in 180 degrees,has a double bed and a sofa that could be converted into a double bed too. So 4 people can easily stay and upon request one more bed can be put into the room as it is a spacious one.If you are planning to stay with your families and little kids, or with a group of friends it is ideal for you.

The room opens onto a huge terrace.
Located in the very heart of Kadıköy,it provides a quiet and hidden getaway from the maddening crowd. Situated on the Anatolian (Asian) side of Istanbul, Kadıköy is the biggest district on this side, very close to everything; cinemas, restaurants, bars, churches, mosques, High Streets and local food markets. And my flat is just in the middle of a High Street on 6th floor. When you go upstairs (yes, there is an elevator) you are completely detached from the crowd downstairs and it is such a relief!

See you in Istanbul.
host_about:
I  rent the rooms in  my two-storey flat in the heart of Kadıköy with a splendid view of old İstanbul; namely the classical view of mosques and towers. There are three rooms upstairs overlooking a huge terrace towards the view. Downstairs there are three other rooms; one living room and one study for common use and another comfortable bedroom  and a biggish kitchen as well as the balcony in front of the living room. 
It is a spacious house with plenty of positive energy, sunshine, laughter and good food. Impression from the guests come from the same direciton; they emphasize the view as well as the atmosphere at home. You do not feel that the rooms are prepared for rent, on the contrary, you feel home. 

Apart from being an academic and a sagittarius, I am a good cook, a hospitable landlady  and an open minded intellectual. I like meeting people from different cultures and adding values to my life. 
 
You are more than welcome..

name: Economic Apt @ Taksim SQ, Beyoglu
description:
The space
The Apartment is located in Taksim, the main transportation hub and the heart of the city. There are bus and taxi services nearby so you can easily get to any corner of Istanbul. The apartment is located on the second floor of a historical building. Close by you can find many cafes, restaurants and groceries. Reachable by metro, bus or taxi, within a short journey, are some of the gems of Istanbul such as Hagia Sophia, Spice Market, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace and Grand Bazaar. The kitchen is equipped with all necessary utilities. My guests are welcome to use it and help themselves with coffee and tea. Clean towels and bed sheets will be provided. There is a TV lounge, Wi-fi internet connection and also laundry facilities. If you are looking for a well located and independent stay in Istanbul, this is for you..I speak both English and Turkish, for any information just send me a message.
host_about: I'm a Designer who lives in Beyoglu. I would like to have news friends and to stay them house when i travel. If you really wanna stay heart of Istanbul just ask me :)

name: Terraced Ottoman Villa
description:
The space
The room I am renting out is in a renovated Ottoman villa with a terraced garden and a magnificent view on to the Bosphorous.
Within a 2 - minute walking distance to Büyükdere (a small Bosphorous village and shopping center) on the bus route connecting to the subway, which provides quick and easy access to Taksim - Kabatas and the historical Peninsula.
Stopping at interesting museums while taking a leisurely walk along the Bosphorous or going for a cup of Turkish coffee in the gardens of an Ottoman Sultan's hunting lodge or taking a ferry to Anadolu Kavagi (a picturesque fishing village) to climb up to its Ottoman Castle and have a look at the Black Sea ... are some of the attractions we can promise you.

There are quite a few other surprises if you're really up for Istanbul adventures ... Or you can just relax and read (or write) your book in a serene atmosphere just listening to the beautiful sounds of nature ...
Organic breakfa
host_about: I'm retired lawyer. Love to meet new people and traveling. Interested with organic agriculture, grow vegetables in the garden.

name: Designer Penthouse in Trendy Bebek
description:
The penthouse, featured in "House Beautiful Turkey" in the June 2012 issue is located in the chic and trendy neighborhood of Bebek.

Luminous 230 m2 indoor and 120 m2 terrace space overlooking the Bosphorus.

Only 3 minutes walk from the sea and Bebek center where you can enjoy great runs/strolls throughout the day, chill out in one of the many cools cafes, dine in some of the best restaurants in Istanbul or shop in the friendly local stores selling all kinds of produce.

The space
Fully surrounded by a terrace offering an amazing view of the Bosphorus, great place to sunbathe or chill out in the evening.

The apartment is only 3 minutes walk from the center of Bebek, which is surely one of the trendiest neighborhoods of Istanbul:
chic boutiques, bars, cafes and restaurants, kids' park, and small ferry pier allowing you to reach all sorts of places by boat.

High speed Wifi, full appliances, 52" LCD TV, cable and a
neighborhood_overview:
Bebek is is probably the most popular local residential neighborhood in Istanbul. It means "Baby" and has a long history. It still keeps its village charm with its residents, small food and vegetable sellers, hair dressers and vendors who have been living and working in the neighborhood for many years.
There's park with a play ground right in the center which is great for families with young kids.
For those who love to run or walk, the flat is 3 min walk from the Boshporus which provides kilometers of running/walking path with amazing views right on the sea.
host_about: A Turk, married with a lovely French woman, have two sons between 5-8 years of age. I enjoy traveling, photography and all kinds of sports. I mostly read non-fiction, interested in technology, political history and art/design. Lived in Switzerland and in Hong Kong for many years, then back to Istanbul and not in Paris since mid 2018. Bought this flat in Istanbul in 2009 and did a full renovation with the help of my cousin who's an interior architect. We lived in this Istanbul flat for 8 years and love the location as well as the space it offers.

description:
in the heart of the OLD CITY(Sultanahmet).Only 5-6 minutes walking distance to the Blue Mosgue,St.Sophia and Topkapi Palace. 24 hours hot water, privet bathrooms,free wi-fi,air-conditioning, and fridge in the each rooms.

The rooms at Apart Hotel Seatanbul have simple furnishings. They all feature an electric teakettle. A private bathroom with hairdryer is standard.

Daily breakfast is served in Seatanbul Cafe next to the hotel. There are many restaurants and cafes in the surrounding area that serve local and international dishes.

name: Bright and characterful in Galata!
description:
Our apartment is in a well-kept historic building very close to Galata Tower. It's attractive and comfortable with architectural details. The street is full of neighbourhood character yet quiet at night, with Şişhane Metro only 2 mins walk away.

We also offer a selection of 'experiences' with our local guides, to help you build your own genuine and memorable perspective on the city.

The space
This apartment is in an elegant 19th century building only 100m away from iconic Galata Tower. The whole building is managed by us, so we are able to keep the lovely original marble staircase and communal entrance hall in very good repair. There is one apartment on each of four floors.

The streets below are atmospheric with small, trendy boutiques and cafe-restaurants, yet are quiet and residential at night. Galata's pedestrianised area is just around the corner with its lively pavement cafes and restaurants plus all the buzz of this bohemian district.
neighborhood_overview: Galata has a genuine, very welcoming and diverse community with an intriguing mix of cafes, restaurants, small grocery shops and artistic boutiques. Elegant 19th Century buildings line cobbled streets, with discoveries waiting around every corner. No matter where you wander, you’ll always find your way back to Galata Tower, which has been a well-loved landmark for the last 700 years.
host_about:
Our historic apartments make comfortable, secure, private short term homes and we understand and respect the issues of social distancing.

Julia, Tarkan and manager Taskin are certified by the UK Institute of Hospitality for 'Coronavirus: Taking Proactive Action'. High-touch areas are disinfected with alcohol spray and apartments are cleaned more thoroughly than ever, though we had a great reputation for our cleanliness before too!

*****

We've been busy, building up a collection of lovely historical apartments in Galata, our favourite part of Istanbul. We've personally renovated most of them and stay in them ourselves whenever we can. Recently we've added a sweet flat in the UK's Cotswolds into the mix.

20 years ago we met in Istanbul, Tarkan's home city, while I was there for a photography assignment. Since then we've led international lives together, based in Istanbul, Singapore and now England, my original country. 

Along the way we've raised our son, Eren, across the cultures as we've steadily grown this holiday apartment project, our second baby. We see it as a way to find balance in our family life and to always have a home in our best-loved city.  

We understand from our own experiences, what makes a great city-break stay and we try our very hardest to deliver it to you in Istanbul. For this we've won i-escape's global Guest Award for 'Best City Apartment' two years running and Tripadvisor's Certificate of Excellence 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020 (2021 isn’t announced yet ;) 

We’re also listed in many guidebooks. 

Your questions and booking will be handled by us. On your arrival our manager Taskin and  friendly team with their natural Turkish hospitality, will welcome you to your apartment, pass over your keys and explain practicalities and the neighborhood. You'll have as much or as little help as you choose and we're sure you'll soon feel at home in the cosmopolitan and very welcoming local community.

"Life is a balance of holding on and letting go" said Rumi.
We agree, do you?!

name: LARGE, SAFE & COMFORTABLE FLAT
description:
The space
An ideal apartment in a very safe area of the city is available for short term rentals. There are 2 doublebeds in 2 bedrooms and & 1 sofabed for 2 persons and a pullout bed for 1 more person in the living hall. Both bedrooms have a balcony each. The large (50sqm) living hall is tastefully furnished and includes a big dining table for 8 people. You will have 2 sattelite TV, CD and DVD players, wireless internet connection, 4 ceiling fans (1 in two bedrooms, living room & kitchen each)air conditioning. There is A/C in the living hall.
Full kitchen ware such as dishwasher, kettle, toaster, coffee maker, 2 ovens (1 is micowave) etc. Other facilities include a washing machine, iron and hot water (boiler). Great location. 4-5 minutes to tube/subway & bus stop. Very easy to reach historical places like Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace, etc. Major shopping malls of Cevahir (the largest in Europe & second in the world), City's & Akmerkez are wit
host_about:
Hi!
This is your host Seyda Mari,
Now I offer to my prospective guests a real family home where I have been living for many years, I mean not one that is artificially decorated by 2nd hand stuff. Recently I started living alone and decided to let my flat as it is too big for one person & I have another accomodation facility. Throughout my life I have travelled a lot visiting almost all the European countries and also the USA & Canada in both of which I have lived for long periods, staying in all categories of accomodation, namely 5 & 4 star hotels as well as moderate or standard class inns, hostels & lodging houses thus I am quite experienced in the accomodation businmess. I also wish to do this as a hobby too because I need some kind of occupation to fill up a part of my time. 
So I am looking forward to meeting, hosting and helping my guests from abroad.
Sincere Regards
Mari

name: Terraced Ottoman Villa - Room 1
description:
The space
The room I am renting out is in a renovated Ottoman villa with a terraced garden and a magnificent view on to the Bosphorous.
Within a 2 - minute walking distance to Büyükdere (a small Bosphorous village and shopping center) on the bus route connecting to the subway, which provides quick and easy access to Taksim - Kabatas and the historical Peninsula.
Stopping at interesting museums while taking a leisurely walk along the Bosphorous or going for a cup of Turkish coffee in the gardens of an Ottoman Sultan's hunting lodge or taking a ferry to Anadolu Kavagi (a picturesque fishing village) to climb up to its Ottoman Castle and have a look at the Black Sea ... are some of the attractions we can promise you.

There are quite a few other surprises if you're really up for Istanbul adventures ... Or you can just relax and read (or write) your book in a serene atmosphere just listening to the beautiful sounds of nature ...
Organic breakfa

name: comfortable and  central location
description:
This flat is very centrally located in Beyoglu/ Istanbul. The historic Galata Tower is only a short walking distance away. Despite beeing very close to the city center, the street is pretty quiet.

The space
This flat is very centrally located in Beyoglu/ Istanbul. The historic Galata Tower is only a short walking distance away. Despite beeing very close to the city center, the street is pretty quiet. In this authentic street you can widness the unique lifestyle of local people.. It takes you a short walk to get to the very popular Istiklal street, the Tunnel (a short underground railway line in Istanbul) as well as to Asmali Mescid, a street very popular for its night life and Taksim Square (the city center of the European side).

The flat is comfortable and spacious. It is located on the 4th floor of a four-storey house. It can accommodate up to 4 people (1 studio and 1 living room). It is classically furnished and a fair place for this price.
host_about: Istanbul is a beautiful city; the district Beyoglu is the center of the European side of Istanbul. You should visit the capital of empires.

name: Studio in Galata area near Tram St.
description:
Conveniently located between Istiklal Street and Tophane Tram Station. Wifi, satellite tv, refregirator, iron, hair dryer, kettle, microwave owen. Accomodates up to 3 with sofa bed.5 minutes walk to Galata Tower and 10 minutes tram ride to old city.

The space
Perfect location; between Bosphorus, Istiklal Street and Galata Tower...5 minutes walk to istiklal street, Galata Tower, Tophane Tram Station and Taksim. Takes 10 minutes to get to old city in tram.

The studio offers microwave owen, mini sized no-frost refregirator and a sofa bed. Can accomodate up to 3. It's on the entrance floor (5 steps high) of a clean building and has a separate door. Safe and clean neighbourhood.

Dry cleaner/laundry shop, Restaurants, Cafes and Bars are just 5 minutes walking distance...
host_about:
Moved to Istanbul in 1999, since then I can not think of living else where. After working 15 years in travel business, decided to run a business of my own and loved it :)
   I think airbnb is great as it gives people the opportunity to explore different destinations at most reasonable accomodation rates and with more privacy.

Greetings from Istanbul, 
Ahmet.

name: Old Istanbul  view/ quiet  terrace
description:
The space
This room is on the second floor of a double storey flat in the heart of Kadıköy, In front of the room there is the splendid view of old İstanbul and you can open your eyes to this view. When the weather allows you can also have your breakfast at the terrace as well. There is a bathroom on your floor and guests can also use the kitchen and the living room (with a fireplace) downstairs.

Situated on the Anatolian (Asian) side of Istanbul Kadıköy is the biggest district on this side, very close to everything; cinemas, restaurants, bars, churches, mosques, High Streets and local food markets. And my flat is just in the middle of a High Street on 6th floor. When you go upstairs (yes, there is an elevator) you are completely detached from the crowd downstairs and it is such a relief!

The bed you see in the photo can easily be converted into a comfortable double bed. The price is only for person.

host_about:
I  rent the rooms in  my two-storey flat in the heart of Kadıköy with a splendid view of old İstanbul; namely the classical view of mosques and towers. There are three rooms upstairs overlooking a huge terrace towards the view. Downstairs there are three other rooms; one living room and one study for common use and another comfortable bedroom  and a biggish kitchen as well as the balcony in front of the living room. 
It is a spacious house with plenty of positive energy, sunshine, laughter and good food. Impression from the guests come from the same direciton; they emphasize the view as well as the atmosphere at home. You do not feel that the rooms are prepared for rent, on the contrary, you feel home.

name: Terraced Ottoman Villa - Room 3
description:
The space
The room I am renting out is in a renovated Ottoman villa with a terraced garden and a magnificent view on to the Bosphorous.
Within a 2 - minute walking distance to Büyükdere (a small Bosphorous village and shopping center) on the bus route connecting to the subway, which provides quick and easy access to Taksim - Kabatas and the historical Peninsula.
Stopping at interesting museums while taking a leisurely walk along the Bosphorous or going for a cup of Turkish coffee in the gardens of an Ottoman Sultan's hunting lodge or taking a ferry to Anadolu Kavagi (a picturesque fishing village) to climb up to its Ottoman Castle and have a look at the Black Sea ... are some of the attractions we can promise you.

There are quite a few other surprises if you're really up for Istanbul adventures ... Or you can just relax and read (or write) your book in a serene atmosphere just listening to the beautiful sounds of nature ...
Organic breakfa
host_about: I'm retired lawyer. Love to meet new people and traveling. Interested with organic agriculture, grow vegetables in the garden.

NON-SMOKING APT :)

Casa LoBueno is a family owned flat on the 2nd floor in a historical building by the Galata Tower,Beyoğlu. It is located between the metro exit (Şişhane)and the tram line to the Old City in walking distance to the main bus route, the Tunnel and the Bosphorus Pier

The extra SANITATION steps that are expected to be taken in the rece
neighborhood_overview:
About Istanbul & our neighborhood Galata :
Istanbul is a city where not only continents meet, but many traces from different cultures and old civilizations can be found and history is preserved . A synagogue, a church, a mosque all can be found in the same quarter.

A part of Istanbul over Europe another part being in Asia where you can find unique beauty, interesting nature and straits of Bosphorus for sightseeing.

Galata area being around Galata Tower is the most popular and cosmopolitan neighborhood of Istanbul. Actually it is the old and now popular retro downtown offering a wide variety of choices for shopping, design ateliers, entertainment, art galleries and dining, cafes, restaurants, pubs, bars...
A magnificient panaromic view from the Galata Tower towards the Old City, Golden Horn & the Bosphorus is a rare find view to see with bare eyes.

Imperial buildings, aqueducts, churches with preserved fresques and mozaics like St. Sophia, Ch
host_about:
I enjoy travelling in and outside of Turkey, and I prefer  exploring the cities. (Still exploring Istanbul!) Although I am an amateur, I am  enthusiastic about photography; children and architecture being my main subjects. 
I like good food, good coffee and good music, and I know how to find them. 

Together with my brother Izel, we have been hosting vacation rentals since 2012 and delighted having built up our global community. Travelers do come in as our guests and return their homes being our friends for life knowing they have a house in Istanbul :) 

Professionally, I am an architect specialized in conservation and restoration of old sites.

Looking forward to meeting with new people, I am open to developing new friendships and connections throughout the world.

name: Your home in Central Istanbul
description:
The space
The flat is located in a calm area called Sisli.

There are 2 Rooms available both for singles and couples. The apartment has central heating. There is cable tv and internet connection. The apartment has an equipped kitchen as well as towels, bed linen, wardrobe, big sitting room and breakfast.

It is close to a big supermarket. English and French spoken.

There is easy access to Taksim and Old Istanbul. Istiklal avenue in Taksim is great to visit. There are many cafes and restaurants from ottoman and turkish cousine. There are different night life options in Taksim such as traditional turkish night life combined with dinner, clubs and rock bars. Historic peninsula also known as Old Istanbul is easy to go. Around Sultanahmet Square you find Ottoman and Byzantine architecture. You can visit Sultanahmet Camii (Blue Mosque), Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia and Grand Bazaar in historic peninsula. And don't forget to try Sultanahmet

description:
Think of a space that is sophisticated, understated, comfortable and cosy, with wonderful objects from around the world and peaceful, very quiet yet very lively made with personality and soul.

The space
Please enjoy your stay in this relaxing and spacious flat in the heart of the charming and friendly neighborhood Beşiktaş.
Beşiktaş is a central, vibrant but not noisy neighborhood; 12 min walk from the central market and seaside, with a great selection of cafes, restaurants, bars, local shops. It is famous for its Fish Market during the day.

This is a 210 m2, fully furnished and fully equipped duplex flat on the 5th floor of a building. There are two bedrooms, one kitchen and one bathroom at each floor.
This floor holds a huge terrace, a bathroom, a kitchen, one single and one double bedroom.

The stairs to the upper floor is from the living room downstairs. Therefore, the living room is a shared area for all the residents of the
host_about:
Hi there! Im 40 years old Istanbulite, entrepreneur.

Originally graphic designer and running my own company. I moved to South of Turkey 5 years ago and running a small farm called 'Solmera Çiftliği' about permaculturel ecologic farming and producing good&healty food.  Renting my rooms in Istanbul to long stay erasmus students. 

Im interested in growing plants and vegetables, wood art, illustrations, music, nature, traveling and meeting new people from all of the world!

Im looking forward to host any easy going, open-minded and respectful students and travellers!

Thank you for looking...

name: Stylish & Cozy Apartment
description:
in perfect location to explore both the modern and ancient Istanbul!

Great connection to Metro, Tram, major pedestrian street (3 min walk) but still very calm and tucked away, protected from the 'Istanbul chaos' on the streets.

The space
Hi, my name is Jonas, an architect living in Istanbul for a bit more than three years now and I would like to offer you my house, so you can discover this interesting city on your own.

The apartment is a nicely renovated and furnished with a very warm atmosphere through its historic structure, all the wood and bricks. There is one bedroom with a 1.40m bed and a master bedroom with a kingsize, a bathroom with open shower and a small kitchen, but the heart is its cozy living room, that will make you feel at home immediately.

I think the pictures tell their story the best.

Guest access
The house is fully equipped: TV, WiFi, laundry machine, tumble dryer, dish washer, stove and
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in Beyoglu - the cultural, musical and artistic center of the city. You can enjoy nice food in restaurants with a breathtaking view, overlooking the Bosporus, go out to the various bars or just stroll up the vibrant Istiklal Caddesi.
host_about:
I'm a German architect, living in Istanbul for a bit more than 7 years now.

I would like to share my apartment with you, as a great opportunity for you to see the city from a different perspective, other than staying in a hotel. 
Apart from sharing my home (which will be totally yours for your stay) I am happy to share my favourite places - where to eat or to drink cay, where you get the nicest views or you can go dancing -  and many other secrets, that Istanbul has to offer ...

name: Asian Side Apartment with SEA VIEW
description:
The space
Three bedrooms flat with a cozy dining and living room with a beautiful marina and sea view.
One bathroom with a WC, internet connection, air conditioned, fully equipped kitchen, TV/ Satelite connection, a very silent and qualified district of the asian side just opposite to the marina.

The location of the apartment is fantastic. One block away from the seaside jogging path. Taxi can be easily halt on the road side. To go to the Europe side, you just need to take a taxi or bus to the port and take a ferry to the European side.You can reach in 10 minutes to the port where you can have boats to the Europen side. The boat takes only 20 minutes, just enough time for you to enjoy the fresh sea air.

Despite the convenience of the location, it is an exceptionally quite and safe neighborhood.

The flat is also only a 2 minutes walk to the seaside and Kalamış marina.. There are cafes and restaurants alongside the Marina also.
host_about: I am retired from private sector Worked for multinationals at managerial levels. Currently I am a training consultant working on my own. Giving training programs to employees of international companies. I have 2 grown up sons.My hobbies are: reading, swimming and jogging.

name: A nice stay in old İstanbul (Balat)
description:
Newly renovated private house in the historic area of Ayvansaray/Balat, within the walls of the Old City of Constantinople. Full kitchen, bathroom plus living room, internet, washing machine. Easy access to all Istanbul's most important sites.

The space
2 floored private house

Guest access
Guest can access a private bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom and small garden

Other things to note
All sheets and towels are provided. There is also a washing machine, disher and free wi-fi.
neighborhood_overview:
Until the 1920s Fener/Balat was an entirely Greek and Jewish area, filled with distinctive Greek-style houses. Then, at the end of the Greco-Turkish war came the great population exchange between Greece and Turkey, during which most of the Greeks departed. The area is now being rediscovered. UNESCO has put a preservation order on hundreds of local houses. New cafes and eateries are opening all the time and the go-ahead has been given for a new port complex on the Golden Horn. At the same time the area retains the unique feel of old Istanbul: children playing football in the streets, lines of washing strung between coloured stone houses, small, chaotic neighbourhood stores and traditional bakeries. There is local and organic bazaars on Tuesdays and Sundays on the neighbourhood.
We also have a small garden for those looking for calmness.
There is also the Patriarchate, the home of the Greek Orthodox Church, with its history and relics, various other sleepy Greek churches and n
host_about: All we need is love and peace!
